quotes.quote: Watch out for the fellow who talks about putting things in order! Putting things in order always means getting other people under your control.
quotes.author: Denis Dedirot

quotes.quote: Carefully watch your thoughts, for they become your words. Manage and watch your words, for they will become your actions. Consider and judge your actions, for they have become your habits. Acknowledge and watch your habits, for they shall become your values. Understand and embrace your values, for they become your destiny.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Catch on fire with enthusiasm and people will come for miles to watch you burn.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Inspiration comes from not only within ourselves, but also from watching life around us.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: To live peacefully just look up into the sky and watch how the clouds drift in total acceptance. Instantly, you shall find Peace
quotes.author: RVM

quotes.quote: When you stretch the truth, watch out for the snapback.
quotes.author: Bill Copeland

quotes.quote: The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: How lovely are the portals of the night, when stars come out to watch the daylight die.
quotes.author: Thomas Cole

quotes.quote: The cloud never comes from the quarter of the horizon from which we watch for it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: Meditation is to be aware of every thought and of every feeling, never to say it is right or wrong, but just to watch it and move with it. In that watching, you begin to understand the whole movement of thought and feeling. And out of this awareness comes silence.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: A watch can only tell us how much time it is, how much time has passed, or how much time must still pass before something will occur. These statements are related not to time itself but only to its measurement or calculation.
quotes.author: Medard Boss

quotes.quote: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Contemplation often makes life miserable. We should act more, think less, and stop watching ourselves live.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Listen to hear and watch to see.
quotes.author: Tatjana Urbic

quotes.quote: Learn from everyone. Follow no one. Watch for patterns. Work like hell.
quotes.author: Scott McCloud

quotes.quote: Every day on set, there was something to watch and learn.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

quotes.quote: Evolution is fascinating to watch. To me it is the most interesting when one can observe the evolution of a single man.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Water, the Hub of Life. Water is its mater and matrix, mother and medium. Water is the most extraordinary substance! Practically all its properties are anomalous, which enabled life to use it as building material for its machinery. Life is water dancing to the tune of solids.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: Water, thou hast no taste, no color, no odor; canst not be defined, art relished while ever mysterious. Not necessary to life, but rather life itself, thou fillest us with a gratification that exceeds the delight of the senses.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Water is fluid, soft, and yielding. But water will wear away rock, which is rigid and cannot yield. As a rule, whatever is fluid, soft, and yielding will overcome whatever is rigid and hard. This is another paradox: what is soft is strong.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: Everywhere water is a thing of beauty, gleaming in the dewdrops; singing in the summer rain; shining in the ice-gems till the leaves all seem to turn to living jewels; spreading a golden veil over the setting sun; or a white gauze around the midnight moon
quotes.author: John Ballantine Gough

quotes.quote: If there is magic on this planet, it is contained in water.
quotes.author: Loran Eisely

quotes.quote: Water is a common heritage, the value of which must be recognized by all. Everyone has the duty to use water carefully and economically.
quotes.author: European Water Charter

quotes.quote: We must treat water as if it were the most precious thing in the world, the most valuable natural resource. Be economical with water! Don't waste it! We still have time to do something about this problem before it is too late.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: All water has a perfect memory and is trying to get back to where it was.
quotes.author: Toni Morriaon

quotes.quote: Don't you realize that the sea is the home of water? All water is off on a journey unless it's in the sea, and it's homesick, and bound to make its way home someday.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: When the well's dry, we know the worth of water.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Still waters run deep. Shallow waters run dry frequently.
quotes.author: Thomas County Cat

quotes.quote: Water is the mother of the vine, the nurse and fountain of fecundity, the adorner and refresher of the world.
quotes.author: Charles Mackay

quotes.quote: All the waters run to the sea and yet the sea is not full, and from the place where they began, thither they return again.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes

quotes.quote: In one drop of water are found all the secrets of all the oceans.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: You can't trust water: Even a straight stick turns crooked in it.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Drinking water is like washing out your insides. The water will cleanse the system, fill you up, decrease your caloric load and improve the function of all your tissues.
quotes.author: Kevin R. Stone

quotes.quote: Water is life's mater and matrix, mother and medium. There is no life without water.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: Water is the only drink for a wise man.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A little water is a sea to an ant.
quotes.author: Afghan Proverb

quotes.quote: When you drink the water, remember the spring.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Clean water, the essence of life and a birthright for everyone, must become available to all people now.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Cousteau

quotes.quote: Water links us to our neighbor in a way more profound and complex than any other.
quotes.author: John Thorson

quotes.quote: The deeper the waters are, the more still they run.
quotes.author: Korean Proverb

quotes.quote: Water which is too pure has no fish.
quotes.author: Afghan Proverb

quotes.quote: It is the calm and silent water that drowns a man.
quotes.author: Ghanaian Proverb

quotes.quote: Filthy water cannot be washed.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: There's plenty of water in the universe without life, but nowhere is there life without water.
quotes.author: Sylvia A. Earle

quotes.quote: Water is the basis of life and the blue arteries of the earth! Everything in the non-marine environment depends on freshwater to survive.
quotes.author: Sandra Postel

quotes.quote: It is water, in every form and at every scale, that saturates the mind. All the water that will ever be is, right now.
quotes.author: National Geographic

quotes.quote: Many a calm river begins as a turbulent waterfall, yet none hurtles and foams all the way to the sea.
quotes.author: Mikhail Lermontov

quotes.quote: The cold and crystal clear water, it falls gently on the sleeper, cleansing the mind and soothing the soul.
quotes.author: El Fuego

quotes.quote: A waterfall cannot be silent, just as the wisdom! When they speak, the voice of power speaks!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is a waterfall in every dream. Cool and crystal clear, it falls gently on the sleeper, cleansing the mind and soothing the soul.
quotes.author: Virginia Alison

quotes.quote: The waterfall winks at every passerby.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Grace is finding a waterfall when you were only looking for a stream.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hunt

quotes.quote: There’s hope at the bottom of the biggest waterfall.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: My mind is a raging torrent, flooded with rivulets of thought cascading into a waterfall of creative alternatives.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Don't go chasing waterfalls / Please stick to the rivers and the lakes that you're used to / I know that you're gonna have it your way or nothing at all / But I think you're moving too fast.
quotes.author: Lisa "Left Eye" Lopes

quotes.quote: What are the natural features which make a township handsome? A river, with its waterfalls and meadows, a lake, a hill, a cliff or individual rocks, a forest, and ancient trees standing singly. Such things are beautiful; they have a high use which dollars and cents never represent.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I was disappointed with Niagara—most people must be disappointed with Niagara. Every American bride is taken there, and the sight of the stupendous waterfall must be one of the earliest, if not the keenest, disappointments in American married life.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: From the waterfall he named her, / Minnehaha, Laughing Water.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Life is naked. A nude body is the truest and noblest symbol of life. If I draw a mountain as a heap of human forms and paint a waterfall in the shape of tumbling human bodies, it is because I see in the mountain a heap of living things, and in the waterfall a precipitate current of life.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: You know you are in Africa at Victoria Falls because there is nothing anyplace to keep you from stepping off into the cataract, not a handrail, not an inch of barbed wire... the falls represent death for the taking.
quotes.author: Norman Rush

quotes.quote: These are the Victoria Falls, the brightest trinket / In the globe-trotter's box of well-worn curios.
quotes.author: William Plomer

quotes.quote: An American tourist much pleased Aunt Olive by announcing that he would now have to send a cable to Niagara, saying, 'Turn on more water.'
quotes.author: Lyndall Gregg

quotes.quote: And listen to the faucets, like the rush of a waterfall heard through thick woods just as the birds began to sing early one morning years ago in the hills outside Florence.
quotes.author: Kevin Prufer

quotes.quote: Do not feel sad for your tears as rocks never regret the waterfalls.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The harness of waterfalls is the most economical method known for drawing energy from the sun.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: As long as I live, I'll hear waterfalls and birds and winds sing. I'll interpret the rocks, learn the language of flood, storm, and the avalanche. I'll acquaint myself with the wild gardens, and get as near the heart of the world as I can.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Water is the driving force of all nature.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: If there is magic on this planet, it is contained in water.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.quote: Just let go - and fall like a little waterfall.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: Waterfalls are exciting because they have power, they have rainbows, they have songs, and they have boldness and craziness!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is a hidden message in every waterfall. It says, if you are flexible, falling will not hurt you!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Don't go to restaurants that have waterfalls if you have a kidney condition.
quotes.author: Alan King

quotes.quote: Over the course of the Earth's history, waterfalls as grand as Niagara have come and gone without any human witnesses. So, in geological terms, our love affair with Niagara has been as fleeting as it has been intense. And today, the future of this relationship rests firmly in our own hands.
quotes.author: Narrator (Naked Planet)

quotes.quote: Oh God, my God I seek You / I wanna move when You move / You're more than I could long for / I thirst for You / You're an ocean to my soul / To my soul / Your love is like a waterfall, waterfall / Running wild and free / You hear my heart when I call, when I call / Deep calls, too deep / Your love is like a waterfall, waterfall / Raining down on me
quotes.author: Chris Tomlin

quotes.quote: I've lost control / I paddle, but you're too strong / But I gotta trust your flow / Cause boy, I'm in your waterfall / Oh, I've lost control / And babe, it's a relief to know / I got you keeping me afloat / When I'm in your waterfall
quotes.author: Mikkel Storleer Eriksen

quotes.quote: People may come, people may go / Just as long as the water's slow / But watch out when you're / Headed for the waterfall / Dry land is just a love away / Warm sun and a place to lay / I see your future / The water above you calm and clear
quotes.author: Bobby Rivkin

quotes.quote: Two watermelons cannot be held under one arm.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: There were happy days, with watermelon, and sad days of whiskey.
quotes.author: Lewis Nordan

quotes.quote: Pick up a sesame seed but lose sight of a watermelon.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: If you focus on only the seeds in a watermelon, you missed the sweetness of the meat.
quotes.author: Wally Amos

quotes.quote: That's all right if you've got a watermelon. Never let the seeds stop you from enjoying the watermelon.
quotes.author: Jo Swerling

quotes.quote: I love watermelons but I believe you got to kill it to eat it.
quotes.author: Sergeant R. Lee Ermey

quotes.quote: I just wanna taste it, I just wanna taste it / Watermelon sugar high / Tastes like strawberries on a summer evenin'
quotes.author: Harry Edward Styles

quotes.quote: It's watermelon weather / That summer kind of weather / When people get together and sing
quotes.author: Guy Webster/Webster Music

quotes.quote: For it's the sweetheart kissin' season / And all the world's in rhyme / When it's watermelon sweet love tellin' time
quotes.author: Guy Webster/Webster Music

quotes.quote: Watermelon. A delightfully rounded ball of wondrous green exterior; that rolled with unparalleled fervor upon any friction less surface; with the tiniest of thrust
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: One of the most adulated fruits at the vendor's imperiously embellished establishment, / Was the relished watermelon.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I brutally tore through the skin of the succulent watermelon, / urged myself into the action of devouring blood red chunks of the fruit.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: All I want is a ravishing watermelon; titillating my tongue beyond the point of no control
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: After about 60 days, tiny watermelon fruits appear on the vines. Over the warm summer months, these watermelon fruits grow bigger and bigger.
quotes.author: Julie Murray

quotes.quote: A watermelon that breaks open by itself tastes better than one cut with a knife.
quotes.author: Hualing Nieh Engle

quotes.quote: Life is like eating a watermelon, you know you're going to get some seeds; just spit them out and take another bite.
quotes.author: Jeff Steinmann

quotes.quote: When one has tasted watermelon, he knows what the angels eat.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Watermelon it's a good fruit. You eat, you drink, you wash your face.
quotes.author: Enrico Caruso

quotes.quote: No matter how the watermelon is shaped, you know it is a watermelon from the outward appearance. Similarly--no matter what color or how the person is shaped, you know it is a human being.
quotes.author: Evelyn Murray Drayton

quotes.quote: If people have time and patience, they will be able to count the number of seeds in a watermelon. But not one person can tell you how many watermelons will grow by planting one seed.
quotes.author: Evelyn Murray Drayton

quotes.quote: With every watermelon you cut, there is an opportunity to cut a distasteful or unappetizing watermelon. Still, this does not keep us from purchasing watermelons.
quotes.author: Evelyn Murray Drayton

quotes.quote: Big watermelon--yes; sweet--yes, luscious--you bet! That was probably the best tasting watermelon I had ever eaten in my entire life.
quotes.author: Evelyn Murray Drayton

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the humble watermelon. It contains Vitamin A which is essential for healthy eyes and boosts immunity.
quotes.author: Gordon Rock

quotes.quote: And what's more, watermelon needn't just be enjoyed as a sweet snack. It works well in dozens of recipes, sweet and savory.
quotes.author: Gordon Rock

quotes.quote: The inside of a watermelon should display good, crisp red flesh. Melons should not be mealy and water soaked.
quotes.author: Lonnie T. Lynch

quotes.quote: In China and Japan watermelon is a popular gift to bring to a host.
quotes.author: Katie Potter

quotes.quote: Every part of watermelon is edible, even the seeds and rinds.
quotes.author: Katie Potter

quotes.quote: Eating watermelon is really fun. The juice runs down your face. But it's even more fun to spit the seeds at your sister!
quotes.author: Katie Potter

quotes.quote: You remind me of watermelon seeds / So hard to put a finger on / Shooting off to escape the slightest pressure / And yet, once firmly secured / You are the source of great enjoyment / And even pleasure.
quotes.author: David Thomasson

quotes.quote: Watermelon is 92% water and 8% sugar, so it is aptly named, and remained among the most refreshing and thirst quenching fruits of all.
quotes.author: Eugene A Defelice

quotes.quote: Waves are toys from God.
quotes.author: Clay Marzo

quotes.quote: Listen to the sound of waves within you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Waves are the practice of water. To speak of waves apart from water, or water apart from waves, is a delusion.
quotes.author: Suzuki Roshi

quotes.quote: Waves are not measured in feet or inches, they are measured in increments of fear.
quotes.author: Buzzy Trent

quotes.quote: Let the waves carry you where the light can not.
quotes.author: Mohit Kaushik

quotes.quote: You can never ride on the wave that came in and went out yesterday.
quotes.author: John Wanamaker

quotes.quote: The boisterous sea of liberty is never without a wave.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A wave is never found alone, but is mingled with the other waves.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: There are always waves on the water. Sometimes they are big, sometimes they are small, and sometimes they are almost imperceptible. The water's waves are churned up by the winds, which come and go and vary in direction and intensity, just as do the winds of stress and change in our lives, which stir up the waves in our minds.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Waves are inspiring not because they rise and fail, but because each time they fall. They never fail to rise again.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Only those who row the boat make waves.
quotes.author: Christina Dodd

quotes.quote: Waves are not as dangerous as fear of waves.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: The wave does not need to die to become water. She is already water.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: A wave isn't like a skate ramp or mountain; everything's moving around, and you have to time how to move along with it. That's easier with a slow wave.
quotes.author: Kelly Slater

quotes.quote: Stop running after the waves. Let the sea come to you.
quotes.author: Elif Safak

quotes.quote: Waves keep coming, that's the one thing you can count on in life.
quotes.author: Gerry Lopez

quotes.quote: There is not secret to balance. You just have to feel the waves.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The winds and the waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: Wild waves rise and fall when they arriveÂ and that's what makes the calm sea alive.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: There is no new wave, only the sea.
quotes.author: Claude Chabrol

quotes.quote: The wave is the same thing as the water, the effect is the cause in another form.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: The sea is a desert of waves, A wilderness of water.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: For a surfer, it's never-ending. There's always some wave you want to surf.
quotes.author: Kelly Slater

quotes.quote: Every wave, regardless of how high and forceful it crests, must eventually collapse within itself.Â
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: Every wave is new until it breaks.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Waves, once they land on the beach, are not reversible.
quotes.author: Grace Paley

quotes.quote: You never really know what's coming. A small wave, or maybe a big one. All you can really do is hope that when it comes, you can surf over it, instead of drown in its monstrosity.
quotes.author: Alysha Speer

quotes.quote: There's no way to move without making waves.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Waves are not measured in feet or inches, they are measured in increments of fear.
quotes.author: Buzzy Trent

quotes.quote: Famous people feel that they must perpetually be on the crest of the wave, not realising that it is against all the rules of life. You can't be on top all the time, it isn't natural.
quotes.author: Olivia de Havilland

quotes.quote: You and I are all as much continuous with the physical universe as a wave is continuous with the ocean.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: I insist upon the view that all is waves.
quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

quotes.quote: You have come from God, you are a spark of his glory you are a wave of that ocean of bliss you will get peace only when you again merge in Him.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Every wave, regardless of how high and forceful it crests, must eventually collapse within itself.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: Just take your time - wave comes. Let the other guys go, catch another one.
quotes.author: Duke Kahanamoku

quotes.quote: The song of the curved line is called happiness.
quotes.author: Rene Crevel

quotes.quote: You can either see yourself as a wave in the ocean or you can see yourself as the ocean.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When the life is wavy, keep your mind smooth.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Life comes at us in waves. We can't predict or control those waves, but we can learn to surf
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Life is like a road with so many twist, turns; blind curves; Stop signages and much more, giving us a wavy ride to reach destination.
quotes.author: Midhat Hafiz

quotes.quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: It's easy to not feel misplaced if this tidal wave of appreciation is coming your way.
quotes.author: Christoph Waltz

quotes.quote: Life is a wave, which in no two consecutive moments of its existence is composed of the same particles.
quotes.author: John Tyndall

quotes.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Weakness is what brings ignorance, cheapness, racism, homophobia, desperation, cruelty, brutality, all these things that will keep a society chained to the ground, one foot nailed to the floor.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Every weakness contains within itself a strength.
quotes.author: Shusaku Endo

quotes.quote: To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: No one wants to believe they are weak, but we all have weakness inside us. We have strength, too, but there are times when the circumstances in our lives are so overwhelming that we easily succumb to that weakness.
quotes.author: Sarah A. Denzil

quotes.quote: If your weakness is love then you are extremely strong.
quotes.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quotes.quote: Power corrupts the few, while weakness corrupts the many.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Don’t weaken yourself by surrendering to your weaknesses. Strengthen yourself by conquering your weaknesses.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Within our perceived weaknesses and imperfections lies the key to realizing our true strength.
quotes.author: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Credulity is the man's weakness, but the child's strength.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: No one enjoys feeling weak, whether it is emotionally, spiritually or physically. There is something within the human spirit that wants to resist the thought of weakness. Many times this is nothing more than our human pride at work. Just as weakness carries a great potential for strength, pride carries an equally great potential for defeat.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Weakness is subjective. We are weak for the people we love. And to others, we are the rigid mountains.
quotes.author: Dr. Upasana Gupta

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: All cruelty springs from weakness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: A person’s strength was always his weakness, and vice versa.
quotes.author: Viet Thanh Nguyen

quotes.quote: When you go looking for rescue, you end up trapped in your own weakness.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Love's weaknesses are better than hate's strengths.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to expose a weakness in yourself. Exposing a weakness is the beginning of strength.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: To rush into explanations is always a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Once we know our weaknesses they cease to do us any harm.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Weakness and ambivalence lead to war.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.quote: Be careful who you share your weakness with. Some people can’t wait for the opportunity to use them against you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Even the strongest enemy had a weakness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The weak may be joked out of anything but their weakness.
quotes.author: Johann Georg Ritter von Zimmermann

quotes.quote: My strength and my weakness are twins in the same womb.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When wealth is lost, nothing is lost. When health is lost, something is lost. When character is lost, all is lost.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: It is neither wealth nor splendor; but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: I am grateful for the blessings of wealth, but it hasn't changed who I am. My feet are still on the ground. I'm just wearing better shoes.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: He is rich or poor according to what he is, not according to what he has.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas not money.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The real measure of your wealth is how much you'd be worth if you lost all your money.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Wealth stays with us a little moment if at all. Only our characters are steadfast, not our gold.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The way to wealth depends on just two words, industry and frugality.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In every well-governed state wealth is a sacred thing. In democracies it is the only sacred thing.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Wealth is power, and power is the only thing about which contemporary culture cares.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: But wealth is a great means of refinement and it is a security for gentleness, since it removes disturbing anxieties.
quotes.author: Donald Grant Mitchell

quotes.quote: Our wealth is often a snare to ourselves, and always a temptation to others.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Wealth is the Conjurer's Devil, Whom, when he thinks he hath, the Devil hath him.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Wealth is the smallest thing on earth, the least gift that God has bestowed on mankind.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: All wealth is the product of labor.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Seek not greater wealth, but simpler pleasure. Not higher fortune, but deeper felicity.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Wealth is nothing more or less than a tool to do things with. It is like the fuel that runs the furnace or the belt that runs the wheel only a means to an end.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Wealth is the slave of a wise man. The master of a fool.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
quotes.author: Chinese (on comparable worth)

quotes.quote: Earth is dearer than gold.
quotes.author: Estonian (on nature)

quotes.quote: With wealth comes responsibility.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: True wealth is not of the pocket, but of the heart and of the mind.
quotes.author: Kevin Gates

quotes.quote: All wealth is the product of labor.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: To be wealthy and honored in an unjust society is a disgrace.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A man is rich in proportion to the number of things which he can afford to let alone.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Wealthy people have not disappeared, they are just not so willing to show off their wealth.
quotes.author: Martin Parr

quotes.quote: The wealth of a soul is measured by how much it can feel; its poverty by how little.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: There is only one true wealth in all the universeâ€“living time.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The first wealth is health.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is no wealth but life.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Riches don't make a man rich, they only make him busier.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Being rich is not about how much money you have or how many homes you own; it's the freedom to buy any book you want without looking at the price and wondering if you can afford it.
quotes.author: John Waters

quotes.quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little, for there is never want where the mind is satisfied.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: Wealth, like happiness, is never attained when sought after directly. It comes as a by-product of providing a useful service.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Wealth does not necessarily mean having millions and millions of pesos. Being wealthy simply means having the financial resources to support your chosen lifestyle. Wealth is nothing more than having money to fund your particular needs at any given time.
quotes.author: Francisco Colayco

quotes.quote: If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Being wealthy isn't just a question of having lots of money. It's a question of what we want. Wealth isn't an absolute, it's relative to desire. Every time we seek something that we can't afford, we can be counted as poor, how much money we may actually have.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Wealth can only be accumulated by the earnings of industry and the savings of frugality.
quotes.author: John Tyler

quotes.quote: Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The only question with wealth is, what do you do with it?
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Wealth is not about having a lot of money; it's about having a lot of options.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: It is great wealth to a soul to live frugally with a contented mind.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Wealth is conspicuous, but poverty hides.
quotes.author: James Reston

quotes.quote: Wealth is well known to be a great comforter.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Quilters never grow old, they just go to pieces.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Yesterday's weaving is as irrevocable as yesterday. I may not draw out the threads, but I may change my shuttle.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode

quotes.quote: What Reason weaves, by Passion is undone.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The mind can weave itself warmly in the cocoon of its own thoughts, and dwell a hermit anywhere.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: We're each single threads woven together in a tapestry God has created. Only he sees the full picture, but not even a sparrow falls without his knowing.
quotes.author: Francine Rivers

quotes.quote: Weave in faith and God will find the thread.
quotes.author: Kabir Das

quotes.quote: Weaving is a work of mindfulness, of taking time to give attention to the details that will contribute to the woven piece's unity.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We all should know that diversity makes for a rich tapestry, and we must understand that all the threads of the tapestry are equal in value no matter what their color.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Properly practiced, knitting soothes the troubled spirit, and it doesn't hurt the untroubled spirit, either.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Zimmerman

quotes.quote: We all have our own life to pursue, our own kind of dream to be weaving, and we all have the power to make wishes come true, as long as we keep believing.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: You see, when weaving a blanket, an Indian woman leaves a flaw in the weaving of that blanket to let the soul out.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: In Silence there is eloquence. Stop weaving and see how the pattern improves.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Nature uses only the longest threads to weave her patterns, so that each small piece of her fabric reveals the organization of the entire tapestry.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Knitting is very conducive to thought. It is nice to knit a while, put down the needles, write a while, then take up the sock again.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: I do regard spinning and weaving as a necessary part of any national system of education.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Man does not weave this web of life. He is merely a strand of it. Whatever he does to the web, he does to himself.
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: Sometimes strands spend a long time seeking each other, fumbling without light, and interweave without knowing that it is exactly what the web wants.
quotes.author: Emmi ItÃ¤ranta

quotes.quote: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men; and among those fibers, as sympathetic threads, our actions run as causes, and they come back to us as effects.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: O, what a tangled web we weave when first we practise to deceive!
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Destiny itself is like a wonderful wide tapestry in which every thread is guided by an unspeakably tender hand, placed beside another thread and held and carried by a hundred others.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Weave beautifully your small thread in the grand tapestry.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: If we are to achieve a richer culture, rich in contrasting values, we must recognize the whole gamut of human potentialities, and so weave a less arbitrary social fabric, one in which each diverse human gift will find a fitting place.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: A good life is like a weaving. Energy is created in the tension. The struggle, the pull and tug are everything.
quotes.author: Joan Erikson

quotes.quote: He who is false to the present duty breaks a thread in the loom, and you will see the effect when the weaving of a life-time is unraveled.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: In the tapestry of life, we're all connected. Each one of us is a gift to those around us helping each other be who we are, weaving a perfect picture together.
quotes.author: Anita Moorjani

quotes.quote: Work with love, it is to weave the cloth with threads drawn from your heart.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: For in the days we know not of did fate begin weaving the web of days that wove your doom.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: We sleep, but the loom of life never stops, and the pattern which was weaving when the sun went down is weaving when it comes up in the morning.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Our weavings in the cosmic web are not self-contained. Rather, they are part of the design of our collective humanity.
quotes.author: Lisa Hunt

quotes.quote: Some people weave burlap into the fabric of our lives, and some weave gold thread. Both contribute to make the whole picture beautiful and unique.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: On theÂ web, you are what you publish.
quotes.author: David Meerman Scott

quotes.quote: The web is fascinating and transformative, but it's an easy, flashy, get-rich-quick option to the hard graft of proper industry.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: AÂ webÂ site is the only medium of semipermanent communication where you can express yourself.
quotes.author: David Rusenko

quotes.quote: The web's strength lies precisely in its unique position as the world's first universal platform.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote: The danger of the web is that you can go from idea to public announcement in under ten minutes.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The goal of theÂ webÂ is to serve humanity. We build it now so that those who come to it later will be able to create things that we cannot ourselves imagine.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: TheÂ webÂ makes people hypocritical, it encourages to take pseudonymes.
quotes.author: Jean-Louis Murat

quotes.quote: TheÂ webÂ of our life is of a mingled yarn, good and ill together.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: TheÂ webÂ of life both cradles us and calls us to weave it further.
quotes.author: Joanna Macy

quotes.quote: There is aÂ webÂ of life into which we are born, from which we can never fall.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: The concept of theÂ webÂ is of universal readership.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: Doing research on theÂ WebÂ is like using a library assembled piecemeal by pack rats and vandalized nightly.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: TheÂ webÂ does not just connect machines, it connects people.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: The web of life, love, suffering and death unites all beings.
quotes.author: Alex Grey

quotes.quote: The web continues to be a source of important photographs you see nowhere else.
quotes.author: Bruce Jackson

quotes.quote: On the web, we all become small-town visitors lost in the big city.
quotes.author: Alison Gopnik

quotes.quote: Viewing theÂ webÂ as a platform for generosity is very different than seeing an opportunity to turn it into an ATM machine.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: TheÂ webÂ of trust is built at eye level, peer to peer.
quotes.author: Jeff Jarvis

quotes.quote: The web is functionally fantastic, but it's a tool. A terrific place to present information but not, at this stage, a tenably emotional location.
quotes.author: Kevin Roberts

quotes.quote: The power of the Web is in its universality. Access by everyone regardless of disability is an essential aspect.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: TheÂ webÂ itself doesn't as much change the way we do things as it changes the ease with which we do things. And that changes the way we do everything.
quotes.author: David A. Siegel

quotes.quote: TheÂ webÂ is a vast collection of completely uncontrolled heterogeneous documents.
quotes.author: Larry Page

quotes.quote: The next wave of the Web is going to be user-generated content.
quotes.author: John Doerr

quotes.quote: On the web, no subject is sacrosanct. No one, from icon to unknown, is off-limits.
quotes.author: Willow Bay

quotes.quote: WebÂ standards keep you out of the dustbin of history.
quotes.author: Joshua Greenberg

quotes.quote: One reason you should not use web applications to do your computing is that you lose control.
quotes.author: Richard Stallman

quotes.quote: The web of domination has become the web of reason itself, and this society is fatally entangled in it.
quotes.author: Herbert Marcuse

quotes.quote: Web analytics is a fire extinguisher. Your website is on fire and you're burning cash.
quotes.author: Jim Sterne

quotes.quote: Designing a website can be a bit like being a kid and inheriting a sweetshop. It's easy to get carried away. There are so many choices. A website can be like an attic that never fills up. Space is not the problem. Attention is.
quotes.author: Gerry McGovern

quotes.quote: The vast majority of small business owners want nothing to do with figuring out a website. They are neck-deep in their business trying to keep it going.
quotes.author: Andrew Yang

quotes.quote: Don't think of your website as a self-promotion machine, think of it as a self-invention machine.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: The power of a website comes from the people using it, not the people making it.
quotes.author: Chris Edwards

quotes.quote: Remember, the web isn't about control. If a visitor to your site is familiar with using a browser's native form doodad, you won't be doing them any favors if you override the browser functionality with your own widget, even if you think your widget looks better.
quotes.author: Jeremy Keith

quotes.quote: A website should be designed such that a visitor should go the cart with confidence and not to your contact page with confusion
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Domain names and websites are Internet real estate.
quotes.author: Marc Ostrofsky

quotes.quote: Only astrophysicists new about the Internet 20 years ago. Today my cat has a website.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: A website without SEO is like a car with no gas.
quotes.author: Paul Cookson

quotes.quote: A personal website is vital, but it needs to change and evolve.
quotes.author: Cory Trepanier

quotes.quote: A bad website is like a grumpy salesperson.
quotes.author: Jakob Nielsen

quotes.quote: A website is a window through which your business says hello to the world.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: I used to have a lot of faith in humanity before the advent of the website "comment" section.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: The objective of a website is to bring a visitor who brings another visitor.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If there's one thing you learn by working on a lot of different websites, it's that almost any design ideaâ€”no matter how appallingly badâ€”can be made usable in the right circumstances, with enough effort.
quotes.author: Steve Krug

quotes.quote: In the information age, build a website before you build a workplace.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Looking at the proliferation of personal web pages on the net, it looks like very soon everyone on earth will have 15 Megabytes of fame.
quotes.author: MG Siriam

quotes.quote: Good website practice and optimizing for conversion usually makes for good search engine optimization. These work together to ensure you drive quality traffic and can persuade that traffic to help you meet your business goals.
quotes.author: Marc Ostrofsky

quotes.quote: Website without visitors is like a ship lost in the horizon.
quotes.author: Dr. Christopher Dayagdag

quotes.quote: When a human being becomes a set of data on a website like Facebook, he or she is reduced. Everything shrinks. Individual character. Friendships. Language. Sensibility.
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.quote: Websites promote you 24/7: No employee will do that.
quotes.author: Paul Cookson

quotes.quote: Don't forget: when you start a website, it's not yet a trusted site. So you have to bring people from a trusted site to your site to build up the trust in your site.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: No one comes to your website to be entertained. They have questions they think you can answer. Content answers questions.
quotes.author: Jay Baer

quotes.quote: Ultimately, users visit your website for its content. Everything else is just the backdrop.
quotes.author: Jakob Nielsen

quotes.quote: In the information age, a website can generate such a high income which even a factory cannot generate.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Create a website that expresses something about who you are that won't fit into the template available to you on a social networking site.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.quote: If you run a website that doesn't have something that's terrible on it, you are not trying hard enough. You have to fail, fail, fail. You have to fail and fail miserably many times.
quotes.author: Erik Wemple

quotes.quote: Filter a website, and you protect a student for a day. Educate students about online safety in the real world environment, and you protect your child for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Christopher Harris

quotes.quote: People tend to think of the web as a way to get information or perhaps as a place to carry out ecommerce. But really, the web is about accessing applications. Think of each website as an application, and every single click, every single interaction with that site, is an opportunity to be on the very latest version of that application.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Jane Brontë

quotes.quote: No matter how old you both get... Never stop holding hands, never stop dancing, and never stop saying "I love you."
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote:
You don't marry someone you can live with...
You marry the person who you cannot live without.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The goal in marriage is not to think alike, but to think together.
quotes.author: ROBERT C. DODDS

quotes.quote: What greater thing is there for two human souls than to feel that they are joinedâ€¦ to strengthen each otherâ€¦ to be at one with each other in silent unspeakable memories.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Weddings to me are wondrous because they are so filled with tomorrows.
quotes.author: Mary Forsell

quotes.quote: Marriage is not a simple love affair, it's an ordeal, and the ordeal is the sacrifice of ego to a relationship in which two have become one.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote:
Two souls with but a single thought,
Two heart that beat as one.
quotes.author: Franz Joseph von Munch-Bellinghausen

quotes.quote: Now join hands, and with your hands your hearts.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: On wedding day you should look like yourself at your most beautiful.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: I chose my wife, as she did her wedding gownâ€¦not for a fine glossy surface, but such qualities as would wear well.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: After all there is something about a wedding-gown prettier than in any other gown in the world.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Weddings remind us that our lives have meaning and that love is the strongest bond, the happiest joy, and the loveliest healing we can ever experience.
quotes.author: Daphne Rose Kingma

quotes.quote:
May your hands be forever clasped in friendship
And your hearts forever joined in love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We have the greatest pre-nuptial agreement in the world. It's called love.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Always get married early in the morning. That way, if it doesn't work out, you haven't wasted a whole day.
quotes.author: Mickey Rooney

quotes.quote: Happy marriages begin when we marry the ones we love, and they blossom when we love the ones we marry.
quotes.author: Tom Mullen

quotes.quote: Don't marry for money; you can borrow it cheaper.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote:
From this day forward, you shall not walk alone.
My heart will be your shelter and my arms will be your home.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is no such cozy combination as man and wife.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: All weddings are similar, but every marriage is different.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Two souls, one heart.
quotes.author: French saying

quotes.quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Weddings are meant to be a celebration of love, but all too often this sentiment gets hijacked by the pressures of delivering a "perfect day."
quotes.author: Kate Watson

quotes.quote: A wedding is an event. Marriage is a life time. Invest more in your marriage than your wedding and success is inevitable.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Union gives strength.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make / not just on your wedding day, but over and over again / and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a golden ring in a chain, whose beginning is a glance and whose ending is eternity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love is a vessel that contains both security and adventure, and commitment offers one of the great luxuries of life: time. Marriage is not the end of romance, it is the beginning.
quotes.author: Esther Perel

quotes.quote: A strong marriage is one in which both people understand that the other person needs to have outside interests and activities which help them to feel happy and fulfilled. A strong marriage is one where both people understand that it is more important to be happy than it is to be right.
quotes.author: Joe Amoia

quotes.quote: In every marriage more than a week old, there are grounds for divorce. The trick is to find, and continue to find, grounds for marriage.
quotes.author: Robert Anderson

quotes.quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Do everything you can to support your partner's well-being, and respect your partner as you would your best friend.
quotes.author: John Gerson

quotes.quote: When you give each other everything, it becomes an even trade. Each wins all.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.quote: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Marriage is for the mature, not the infantile. The fusion of two different personalities requires emotional balance and control on the part of each person.
quotes.author: Archie Lee

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Compatibility doesn't determine the fate of a marriage, how you deal with the incompatibilities, does.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: More marriages might survive if the partners realized that sometimes the better comes after the worse.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Happily ever after is not a fairy tale. It's a choice.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: Make a list of three of the happiest moments in your marriage. Spend a few minutes each day briefly reliving those moments in your mind. The results will amaze you.
quotes.author: Lucia

quotes.quote: There is no greater happiness for a man than approaching a door at the end of a day knowing someone on the other side of that door is waiting for the sound of his footsteps.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Marriage: a ceremony in which rings are put on the finger of the lady and through the nose of the gentleman.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Ruth Graham

quotes.quote: Marriage is neither heaven nor hell, it is simply purgatory.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Treat marriage like a diamond necklace; if broken, fix it, but do not throw it away.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: It is better to get married with the mindset that you are going to give rather than get.
quotes.author: Paul Silway

quotes.quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: A wedding is a party, not a performance. If at the end of the day, you are married to the one you love, then everything went perfectly.
quotes.author: David Tutera

quotes.quote: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Marriage is a lot like a roller coaster. You have extreme highs and you can have some pretty extreme lows, but the ride is worth it.
quotes.author: Teresa Collins

quotes.quote: Marriage is not consist upon happiness, it consists upon accountability, before considering the happiness, think about the accountability.
quotes.author: Kamaran Ihsan Salih

quotes.quote: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
quotes.author: Barbara Hershey

quotes.quote: May every memory that you share of dreams you've seen come true, help make this special anniversary day a happy one, for the two of you.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: Love is the emblem of eternity, it confounds all notion of time, effaces all memory of a beginning, all fear of an end.
quotes.author: Germaine De Stael

quotes.quote: You were made perfectly to be loved â€“ and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Six happy years together. Such a perfect matching. You're entering the 7 year itch zone. This is no time for scratching.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.quote: I want you for always, days, years, eternities.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: Love is not the dying moan of a distant violin - it's the triumphant twang of a bedspring.
quotes.author: S. J. Perelman

quotes.quote: Strike an average between what a woman thinks of her husband a month before she marries him and what she thinks of him a year afterward, and you will have the truth about him.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: I think you have to be willing to take a bullet for somebody if you're going to stand up there, take your vows, and be married to them for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.quote: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: Our wedding was many years ago. The celebration continues to this day.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: There is no mystery â€” that's the beauty of it. We are entirely explicable to each other, and yet we stay. What a miracle that is.
quotes.author: Kamila Shamsie

quotes.quote: An anniversary is a time to celebrate the joys of today, the memories of yesterday, and the hopes of tomorrow.
quotes.author: S.J. Perelman

quotes.quote: The bonds of matrimony are like any other bonds â€“ they mature slowly.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: One of the good things that come of a true marriage is, that there is one face on which changes come without your seeing them; or rather there is one face face which you can still see the same, through all the shadows which years have gathered upon it.
quotes.author: G. Macdonald

quotes.quote: The sum which two married people owe to one another defies calculation. It is an infinite debt, which can only be discharged through eternity.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The older I get, the less time I want to spend with the part of the human race that didn't marry me.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: After about 20 years of marriage, I'm finally starting to scratch the surface of what women want. And I think the answer lies somewhere between conversation and chocolate.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.quote: To have you in my life is wondrous. Yet all good things, allegedly, come to an end, piffle, says I, for you, undoubtedly, will forever be my lover and best friend.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: I think we take it for granted that if you are with your husband after 30 years, then he is the love of your life.
quotes.author: Sue Townsend

quotes.quote: Love is a symbol of eternity. It wipes out all sense of time, destroying all memory of a beginning and all fear of an end.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Today, we're marked with another year, and I'm glad to have my sweetheart near. With gratitude I thank you for your time. And hope that we continue to rhyme.
quotes.author: Blake Flannery

quotes.quote: After 45 years of marriage, when I have an argument with my wife, if we don't agree, we do what she wants. But, when we agree, we do what I want!
quotes.author: Jacques Pepin

quotes.quote: A year gone by in the blink of an eye. Meals, conversations, and laughing. Wondering what the future holds for us. We'll look back years from now. With gratitude for having each other. And we'll know we had a good time.
quotes.author: Blake Flannery

quotes.quote: The arms of love encompass you with your present, your past, your future, the arms of love gather you together.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.quote: In that book which is my memory, On the first page of the chapter that is the day when I first day when I met you, Appear the words, â€˜Here begins a new life.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known and even that is an understatement.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: As we grow old together, as we continue to change with age, there is one thing that will never changeâ€¦I will always keep falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Karen Clodfelder

quotes.quote: Like sunshine in the summer and rain in the winter, I know I can count on my husband to be there through every season of my life.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: The best time to love with your whole heart is always now, in this moment, because no breath beyond the current is promised.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: Come, let's be a comfortable couple and take care of each other! How glad we shall be, that we have somebody we are fond of always, to talk to and sit with.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The bride and groomâ€“May their joys be as bright as the morning, and their sorrows but shadows that fade in the sunlight of love.
quotes.author: Minna Thomas Antrim

quotes.quote: If there ever comes a day when we can't be together, keep me in your heart. I'll stay there forever.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: I'll meet you at the altar, I'll be the one in white!
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: I felt very unstressed on my wedding day. I'm very grateful for that... spending the day on my own, being super quiet and happy and just puttering around doing my own thing.
quotes.author: Sonya Walger

quotes.quote: No matter what challenges might carry us apart, we will always find a way back to each other.
quotes.author: Leo

quotes.quote: When the wedding march sounds the resolute approach, the clock no longer ticks, it tolls the hour. The figures in the aisle are no longer individuals, they symbolize the human race.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: On my wedding day. I didn't want a natural, blushing-bride look - I had a full-on hairdo and red lips. I thought it would be disingenuous to do the whole virginal look, so even though I had the white dress, I had pink net underneath.
quotes.author: Sophie Ellis Bextor

quotes.quote: Watching you walk out of my life does not make me bitter or cynical about love. But rather makes me realize that if I wanted so much to be with the wrong person how beautiful it will be when the right one comes along.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: On wedding day you should look like yourself at your most beautiful.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: I will spend an eternity loving you, caring for you, respecting you, showing you every day that I hold you as high as the stars.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: There is no greater happiness for a man than approaching a door at the end of a day knowing someone on the other side of that door is waiting for the sound of his footsteps.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Harry Met Sally

quotes.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead. The consciousness of loving and being loved brings a warmth and a richness to life that nothing else can bring.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The day of the wedding went like these things generally do, full of anxious moments interspersed with black comedy.
quotes.author: Janet Street-Porter

quotes.quote: The fantasy of the wedding day is that it represents undeniable public and private truth that you have been chosen. For that one day, you are the most valuable creature in the world a treasure, a princess, a prize.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Live each day as if it were the last day of your life because, so far, it is.
quotes.author: Richard Jeni

quotes.quote: What greater thing is there for two human souls than to feel that they are joined for life to strengthen each other in all labor, to rest on each other in all sorrow, to minister to each other in all pain, to be one with each other in silent, unspeakable memories at the moment of the last parting.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Hold my hand and we are halfway there, hold my hand and I'll take you there.
quotes.author: Maria

quotes.quote: The groom always smiles proudly because he's convinced he's accomplished something quite wonderful. The bride smiles because she's been able to convince him of it.
quotes.author: Judith Mcnaught

quotes.quote: As sure as the sun will rise every morning and set in the evening just the same, I will love you all the days of my life.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: This ring means that I choose to spend the rest of my life with you. I promise to love you in the nurturing and selfless way that you love me. I've changed so much since I've known you. Your love has given me the strength to be softer. You've taught me kindness and compassion. You make me better.
quotes.author: Portia de Rossi

quotes.quote: With all the strength; Love encompasses compassion, determination, tolerance, endurance, support, faith and acceptance of whom you love.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Couples who make it aren't the ones who never had a reason to get divorced; they are simply the ones who decided early on that their commitment to each other was always going to be bigger than their differences and their flaws.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: A man's got two shots for jewelry: a wedding ring and a watch. The watch is a lot easier to get on and off than a wedding ring.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: A wedding ring is a symbol of commitment; a promise, a pledge, and a vow. The promise is to forsake all others, to stay devoted and true; the pledge is to honor that promise selflessly, to see the whole thing through; and the vow is to keep that pledge unwaveringly, until the days are few. It is a mutual agreement to become one instead of two.
quotes.author: J.W. Lord

quotes.quote: For years my wedding ring has done its job. It has led me not into temptation. It has reminded my husband numerous times at parties that it's time to go home. It has been a source of relief to a dinner companion. It has been a status symbol in the maternity ward.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Love has been described as a three-ring circus: First comes the engagement ring, then the wedding ring, and after that the suffering.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: In marriage there are no manners to keep up, and beneath the wildest accusations no real criticism. Each is familiar with that ancient child in the other who may erupt again. We are not ridiculous to ourselves. We are ageless. That is the luxury of the wedding ring.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.quote: Oh! How many torments lie in the small circle of a wedding ring.
quotes.author: Colley Cibber

quotes.quote: Wedding rings: the world's smallest handcuffs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I don't understand why you have to wear a wedding ring to warn people off. You should be able to be faithful to that person without anything on your body to show that you are with someone.
quotes.author: Sam Smith

quotes.quote: The wedding ring goes on the left ring finger because it is the only finger with a vein that connects to the heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The first thing I did when I sold my book was buy a new wedding ring for my wife and asked her to marry me all over again.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Always wear your wedding ring. It will remind you that you're always connected to your spouse and it will remind the rest of the world that you're off limits.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Love is pure and as sacred as a wedding ring, so if I say ' I do ' then it's loyalty over everything.
quotes.author: LaTruth Hampton

quotes.quote: A wedding ring is sort of a tourniquet worn on one's finger to stop circulation
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is amazing at how small a price may the wedding ring be placed upon a worthless hand; but, by the beauty of our law, what heaps of gold are indispensable to take it off!
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: People are often enamored with my Super Bowl ring. But it's my wedding ring that I'm most proud of. And having a good marriage takes even more work than winning a Super Bowl.
quotes.author: Trent Dilfer

quotes.quote: Love is not always created at the altar. Love doesn't need a wedding ring.
quotes.author: Marion Davies

quotes.quote: No wedding ring. I wondered when I began to notice such things.
quotes.author: Gillian Flynn

quotes.quote: No couple buying wedding rings wants to be reminded that someday one of them will have to accept the other one's ring from a nurse or an undertaker.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: Our wedding rings are really the only material thing that we own that really means something. And we didn't really realize that until they were gone.
quotes.author: Tim Scatena

quotes.quote: We celebrate our marriage and family. We don't hide our wedding rings.
quotes.author: Aja Graydon

quotes.quote: People's hands fascinate me. It's tempting to look at a businessman's left hand and see if there's an indentation from a missing wedding ring. Or maybe there's a tan line and the skin is pressed down where's he's worked a ring off his finger.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: When you're in a relationship, you're always surrounded by a ring of circumstances... joined together by a wedding ring, or in a boxing ring.
quotes.author: Bob Seger

quotes.quote: Give a man a finger, he'll put a wedding ring on it!
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: The course of the line we indicated as forming our grandest terrestrial fold [along the shores of Japan] returns upon itself. It is an endless fold, an endless band, the common possession of two sciences. It is geological in origin, geographical in effect. It is the wedding ring of geology and geography, uniting them at once and for ever in indissoluble union.
quotes.author: Charles Lapworth

quotes.quote: Beauty is Nature in perfection; circularity is its chief attribute. Behold the full moon, the enchanting golf ball, the domes of splendid temples, the huckleberry pie, the wedding ring, the circus ring, the ring for the waiter, and the "round" of drinks.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: The purity and sacredness of love are like that of a wedding ring. So, when you say “I do”, it’s loyalty over everything.
quotes.author: LA Truth Hampton

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a golden ring in a chain, whose beginning is a glance and whose ending is eternity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: I wear my wedding ring. We talk about when we're going to get married again, which we hope is going to take place some time in this incredibly hectic calendar year.
quotes.author: Jim Lampley

quotes.quote: I'd like to dispel the myth that when you put a wedding ring on a woman, her brain stops.
quotes.author: Marilyn Quayle

quotes.quote: When a day that you happen to know is Wednesday starts off sounding like Sunday, there is something seriously wrong somewhere.
quotes.author: John Wyndham

quotes.quote: The only way I can get through Wednesday is by avoiding people who call it Hump Day.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Wednesdays were the best thing about Atlantis. The middle of the week was a traditional holiday there. Everyone stopped work and celebrated the fact that half the week was over.
quotes.author: Walter Moers

quotes.quote: On Wednesday, when the sky is blue, and I have nothing else to do, I sometimes wonder if it's true That who is what and what is who.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: They didn't want it good, they wanted it Wednesday.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Wednesdays are like Mondays in the middle of the week!
quotes.author: Lee Fox Williams

quotes.quote: Wednesday's child is full of woe.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: On Wednesdays we wear pink.
quotes.author: Mean Girls

quotes.quote: Help!!!! Why is Wednesday spelled like that !!!!
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.quote: When people refer to 'Back in the Day,' it was a Wednesday. Just a little fun fact for you.
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.quote: Monday for wealth, Tuesday for health, Wednesday the best day of all: Thursday for crosses, Friday for losses, Saturday no luck at all.
quotes.author: Old English Rhyme

quotes.quote: It's Wednesay!I'm breathing.I'm healthy.I'm truly blessed.I'm grateful for this day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When Wednesday morning came the weather was very fine, / And the sun in the heavens brightly did shine, / And continued so all the live long day; / Then Miss Mouat guessed that land to the norward lay.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: Wednesday will never be lonely when it has days all around it.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Wednesdays will always bring smiles for the second half of the week.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Wednesday is the angel of the week because she balances the days evenly for us, Sun, Mon, Tues ---Wednesday---Thu, Fri, Sat.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: A Wednesday with no rain is a dry hump day.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Wednesdays will always bring smiles for the second half of the week.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Happy Wednesday! Cast your love to all, trust in the team to which you are joined, and do not do wrong to others for your own self gratification.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: On Wednesday, when the sky is blue, / and I have nothing else to do, / I sometimes wonder if it’s true / That who is what and what is who.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: They didn’t want it good, they wanted it Wednesday.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: She got the magazine on a Wednesday morning, and on Thursday announced our marriage was over.
quotes.author: David Gest

quotes.quote: And perhaps, I'm a Tuesday night and you're a Wednesday morning the way we'll never even notice how we blend into each other.
quotes.author: Danabelle Gutierrez

quotes.quote: You must have had more snow at Goldmersham than we had here; on Wednesday morning there was a thin covering of it over the fields and roofs of the houses, but I do not think there was any left the next day. Everybody used to Southampton says that snow never lies more than twenty-four hours near it, and, from what we have observed ourselves, it is very true.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Starting down again on Wednesday morning we ran past the Paradise and heard a little bird singing there amidst the spray and mosses, a delicate note seeming out of place amidst such gigantic desolation.
quotes.author: F.S. Dellenbaugh

quotes.quote: Half-way unto the end—the week's high noon. / The morning hours do speed away so soon! / And, when the noon is reached, however bright, / Instinctively we look toward the night.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: And if I loved you Wednesday, / Well, what is that to you? / I do not love you Thursday— / So much is true.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
