quotes.quote: You can't be happy with a woman who pronounces both d's in Wednesday.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: A sunny Wednesday morning in Gotham City. The sort of Wednesday that makes you wish it were Sunday.
quotes.author: Narrator

quotes.quote: It's just another run-of-the-mill Wednesday. The calendar's full of 'em.
quotes.author: Jeff

quotes.quote: Wednesday morning was the last time we talked / I guess she figured it was better if she walked / It could've been me just the same / There's no winner in this game / Oh, Wednesday morning was the last time we talked
quotes.author: Gerald Beckley

quotes.quote: This house goes on sale ev'ry Wednesday morning / And taken off the market in the afternoon. / You can buy a piece of it if you want to / It's been good to me if it's been good for you.
quotes.author: Robert H. Bannard

quotes.quote: I stare at the lawn, it's Wednesday morning / It needs a cut but I leave it growing / All different sizes and all shades of green / Slashing it down just seems kind of mean
quotes.author: Courtney Barnett

quotes.quote: On Wednesday I did not opine / Your life would ever be one with mine, / Though if it were we should well combine.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: At half-past two on a Wednesday morn / A most peculiar Glug was born; / And later on, when he grew a man, / He scoffed and sneered at the Chosen Plan. / 'It's wrong!' said this Glug, whose name was Joi. / 'Bah!' said the Glugs. 'He's a crazy boy!' / And they climbed the trees, as the West wind stirred, / To hark to the note of the guffer bird. / It seems absurd, / But they're awfully fond of the guffer bird.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: I feel at times like the Creator about the middle of the week. He must have wondered what it was going to be like, as I do.
quotes.author: Gertrude Bell

quotes.quote: Sometimes there's nothing but Sundays for weeks on end. Why can't they move Sunday to the middle of the week so you could put it in the out tray on your desk?
quotes.author: Russell Hoban

quotes.quote: I like to be present at the meeting, in the middle of the week, feeling, as I sit among the people gathered, some of them deaf, hearing hardly a spoken word and others with failing sight, that as the Lord passed around amongst them He might give me a blessing too.
quotes.author: John Wanamaker

quotes.quote: Happy Wednesday! Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Smile increases value of face, Anger spoils beauty of soul, faith is force of life, confidence is companion of success, so keep smiling. Good Morning have a beautiful wednesday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happy Wednesday! Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Focus on good thoughts and good things will happen. Happy Wednesday stay positive. Think positive. Do positive a very good morning.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Make the most of the Indian hemp seed and sow it everywhere.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I don't know what they have done to pot in the last thirty years, but it rocks!
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: That stoner thing cuts across political lines.
quotes.author: Cheech Marin

quotes.quote: They have done study after study on this issue of marijuana—every administration since, like, FDR. You know what they found out? It makes you want to eat SpaghettiOs right out of the saucepan. That's the worst thing.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Life seems to be very complicated in every place of the world. Most of us are anxious from time to time. Most of us are depressed from time to time. We want to change that. In many cases. such a change can be brought forward by cannabis. That's why people use it.
quotes.author: Raphael Mechoulam

quotes.quote: Mom, I'm selling weed. It's as close to recession-proof as it gets.
quotes.author: Hunter Parrish

quotes.quote: In the past we had a little smoke, the odd toke... Everyone has a little smoke once in a while, you know. It's one of life's little pleasures.
quotes.author: Rhys Ifans

quotes.quote: You have to allot at least seven and three-quarters minutes of fake interest in the person holding the weed. Say something nice about them or their stuff, like, 'Cool pipe,' or, 'Wow, that's a neat lizard.'
quotes.author: Doug Benson

quotes.quote: If you're Jewish, do not smoke weed and go to the Anne Frank house. That is a terrible combination; you will think the Nazis are after you.
quotes.author: Dan Levy

quotes.quote: It's more of a herb. I don't regret saying that at all. I think everyone smokes weed and people who say they don't are lying.
quotes.author: Joss Stone

quotes.quote: To the merry man, every weed is a flower; to the afflicted man, every flower is a weed.
quotes.author: Finnish Proverb

quotes.quote: Ignorance is an evil weed, which dictators may cultivate among their dupes, but which no democracy can afford among its citizens.
quotes.author: William Henry Beveridge

quotes.quote: Slavery they can have anywhere. It is a weed that grows in every soil.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: What is a weed? A plant whose virtues have not been discovered.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: O thou weed, who act so lovely fair, and smells't so sweet, that the sense aches at thee, would thou hadst never been born!
quotes.author: (Othello) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Only in the use of the Indian weed he might be thought a little excessive. He took it, he would say, as a solvent of speech. Marry—as the friendly vapour ascended, how his prattle would curl up sometimes with it! the ligaments which tongue-tied him, were loosened, and the stammerer proceeded a satist [statesman]!
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: I hate museums; there is nothing so weighs upon my spirits. They are the catacombs of nature. One green bud of spring, one willow catkin, one faint trill from a migrating sparrow would set the world on its legs again. The life that is in a single green weed is of more worth than all this death.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Go oft to the house of thy friend, for weeds choke the unused path.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When I was a kid I inhaled frequently. That was the point.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Why is marijuana against the law? It grows naturally upon our planet. Doesn’t the idea of making nature against the law seem to you a bit . . . unnatural?
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: That is not a drug, it’s a leaf.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: I will never give up the ganja – God's own weed.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: I enjoy smoking cannabis and see no harm in it.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: It's actually growing from the ground straight to you, so it's just like eating a vegetable. You know what I'm saying? Cancer and diseases that never had a cure, now all of a sudden you got people taking chemotherapy, and they're also having a toke, and they live longer.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.quote: I do smoke, but I don't go through all this trouble just because I want to make my drug of choice legal. It's about personal freedom. We should have the right in this country to do what we want, if we don't hurt anybody.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: I have to do what's right, weed is for the people, it's the peoples weed.
quotes.author: Jonah Hill

quotes.quote: Feller told me one time they got a weed down here and they call it loco weed. When the horses and cows eat it they get wilder than all get out.
quotes.author: Eric 'Hoss' Cartwright

quotes.quote: Nobody forgets about $300 worth of blow... unless they smoked a whole bag of weed first!
quotes.author: Christy

quotes.quote: Weed isn't supposed to be some money-grubbin' business model! It's a gift from God! And not something to exploited by some stupid towel!
quotes.author: Towelie

quotes.quote: Now I am a plant, a weed, / Bending and swinging / On a rocky ledge; / And now I am a long brown grass / Fluttering like flame; / I am a reed; / An old shell singing / For ever the same; / A drift of sedge; / A white, white stone; / A bone; / Until I pass / Into sand again, / And spin and blow / To and fro, to and fro, / On the edge of the sea / In the fading light-- / For the light fades.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: A day of worry is more exhausting than a week of work. Worry upsets our whole system; work keeps it in health and order.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: If you want to see how enlightened you are, go spend a week with your family.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: The key to a winning season is focusing on one opponent at a time. Winning one week at a time. Never look back and never look ahead.
quotes.author: Chuck Noll

quotes.quote: Weeks passed like boats waiting to sail into the starless dawn, we were full of aimless endless darkness.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Seven days without laughter makes one weak.
quotes.author: Mort Walker

quotes.quote: The middle of the week is a great time to reflect on what was done and still needs to be done before the end of the week.
quotes.author: David Dweck

quotes.quote: Most people spend more time planning a one-week vacation than they spend planning their life.
quotes.author: Michael Hyatt

quotes.quote: No one measures a life in weeks and days. You measure life in years and by the things that happen to you.
quotes.author: Sara Zarr

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled by the calendar. There are only as many days in the year as you make use of. One man gets only a week's value out of a year while another man gets a full year's value out of a week.
quotes.author: Anthony Charles Richards

quotes.quote: Holy Week is a good occasion to go to confession and to take up the right path again.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: All days from the week are typical, that's all nothing less, nothing more.
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.quote: A week is an eternity between lovers.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: A week is a long time in the life of a child.
quotes.author: Maxwell Grantly

quotes.quote: Start your week off right by getting back to what is really important honoring God.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The way to be with God in every season is to strive to be near Him every week and each day.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Good character is not formed in a week or a month. It is created little by little, day by day. Protracted and patient effort is needed to develop good character.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Combine that with the fact that we only had one week to get everything taken care of and to get to know one another, whereas most shows get two weeks. It looked like we would never have a chance.
quotes.author: Tatyana Ali

quotes.quote: A new week means new goals. New goals means new success. No goals mean no success and no success means a wasted week.
quotes.author: Onyi Anyado

quotes.quote: Successful weight loss takes programming, not willpower.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: While weight loss is important, what's more important is the quality of food you put in your body - food is information that quickly changes your metabolism and genes.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.quote: You know what the secret to weight loss is? Don't eat much.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: Eat, drink and be merry, for tomorrow ye diet.
quotes.author: William Gilmore Beymer

quotes.quote: If you wish to grow thinner, diminish your dinner.
quotes.author: Henry Sambrooke Leigh

quotes.quote: One way to get thin is to re-establish a purpose in life.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: When we lose twenty pounds... we may be losing the twenty best pounds we have! We may be losing the pounds that contain our genius, our humanity, our love and honesty.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Inside some of us is a thin person struggling to get out, but they can usually be sedated with a few pieces of chocolate cake.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: To lengthen your life, shorten your meals.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Both belly bulge and love handles are about excess body fat, not lack of muscle. Crunches and ab exercises are therefore not the solution. The best way to reduce these problem areas is to reduce your overall body fat percentage, and we all know that that requires diet and exercise.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: For 24 years of my adult life, by choice I weighed well over 200 lbs. I say by choice because you see I have never accidentally eaten anything.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: We never repent of having eaten too little.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The sovereign invigorator of the body is exercise, and of all the exercises walking is the best.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Ultimately, the only power to which man should aspire is that which he exercises over himself.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Never use food as a drug. But feel free to use exercise as an anti-depressant.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Eat your vegetables. Brush your teeth. Sweat once in a while. Get plenty of rest. Don't smoke. Laugh more. There are certain tenets to health that are pretty commonsensical and that we all know we should practice routinely.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.quote: Anything you adopt temporarily only begets temporary results, and fluctuating your weight up and down is not lifespan favorable.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: One of the great things about juicing is that you know exactly what you're putting into your body something most of us simply can't claim on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Candice Kumai

quotes.quote: Eat less, taste more.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The biggest weight loss secret? Manage your emotions or they will keep mismanaging you.
quotes.author: Brian Vaszily

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you're not doing what is best for your body, you are the one who lose.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: Frequently, visualization is the key to lose weight. Imagine yourself with your desired body, and work for it. At some point in the future, this wish will come true.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: God gave you a body that can lodge almost. Only need to convince the mind
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Don't dig your own grave with your knife and fork.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I know what I have to do if I want to lose weight and stay healthy: eat a proper diet and exercise. All I've got to do is apply it.
quotes.author: John Candy

quotes.quote: The more you allow yourself to desire a healthy and thin body, and you embrace the picture of this body, the more you'll be able to make it a reality.
quotes.author: Anne Ricci

quotes.quote: In order to succeed at losing weight, you need to stop punishing yourself for failing with your healthy eating plan. Fully love and accept yourself, and everything will be a lot easier.
quotes.author: Anne Ricci

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to be a bodybuilder, but nobody wants to lift no heavy-ass weights.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: Some people are born to lift heavy weights, some are born to juggle golden balls.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: The pain you feel today is the strength you'll feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Once you can squat with 180 kilograms, your arms and shoulders will come along much more receptively...If you want big arms and shoulders, your first priority is to be sure that your leg/hip/back structure is growing and becoming powerful.
quotes.author: Stuart McRobert

quotes.quote: The barbells and dumbbells you hold in your hands and the way you use them have stories to tell.
quotes.author: Craig Cecil

quotes.quote: Weight lifting is about lifting the impossible, overcoming the unachievable. If you don't lift things that are hard, and only do the things you can do, it's only going to get boring. Unless you want to lift beyond your limits to get stronger, to achieve new goals, and to be satisfied, you got to lift past these challenges, and still lift the things you think are impossible to really understand how your true strength will show. Lift how I lift, see how I lift, watch how I lift, learn how I lift, and your true strength will come forth and be revealed
quotes.author: Chasers Holmes

quotes.quote: Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Just remember, somewhere, a little Chinese girl is warming up with your max.
quotes.author: Jim Conroy

quotes.quote: Most champions are built by punch the clock workouts rather than extraordinary efforts
quotes.author: Dan John

quotes.quote: The chief difference between big-game fishing and weightlifting is that weightlifters never clutter up their library walls with stuffed barbells.
quotes.author: Ed Zern

quotes.quote: If you start lifting weights, you will expect to put weight on, as muscle is heavier than fat. But you have to look more at your body shape - you will get heavier - but you might get smaller and heavier at the same time, which is fine. And it doesn't really matter what you weigh as long as you are happy with your shape and size!
quotes.author: Victoria Pendleton

quotes.quote: Heavy lifting doesn't need to be heavy spending if we do the job right.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: BodybuildingÂ is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: If you think lifting weights is dangerous, try being weak. Being weak is dangerous.
quotes.author: Bret Contreras

quotes.quote: Any program will produce gains in a beginning weightlifter--these easily-obtained improvements shouldn't be the primary goal, however. The more important goal for beginning and intermediate training programs is to establish a proper foundation that will allow maximal long term improvements.
quotes.author: Greg Everett

quotes.quote: Maybe lifting someone else's weight makes yours a little more bearable
quotes.author: Tarryn Fisher

quotes.quote: The best activities for your health are pumping and humping.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between your bodybuilding goals and bodybuilding success.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Set your bodybuilding goals high and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Compared to the challenges or raising an autistic child, weightlifting is a relief.
quotes.author: Melanie Roach

quotes.quote: What makes a weightlifting program successful? Your hard work and dedication.
quotes.author: Greg Everett

quotes.quote: Working chest, delts, tris, and biceps works approximately 10% of your overall lean body mass. Working hard on deadlifts (bent legged, trap Bar, or sumo) or squatting (not necessarily at the same time) works more like 70% of your musculature at once and sends a strong message to your body to get better at growing now!
quotes.author: Wesley Silveira

quotes.quote: Power should be reserved for weightlifting and boats, and leadership really involves responsibility.
quotes.author: Herb Kelleher

quotes.quote: Each workout is like a brick in a building, and every time you go in there and do a half-ass workout, you're not laying a brick down. Somebody else is.
quotes.author: Dorian Yates

quotes.quote: You know you've reached middle age when your weightlifting consists merely of standing up.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Lifting weights is obviously important, because you want to be strong and fast and all of that, but it's not one of those things you gotta go and try to bench as much as you can every day. A bench press isn't going to help you throw a 15-yard out or a deep comeback. It's not about that. It's about training right.
quotes.author: Mark Sanchez

quotes.quote: Opposition is a natural part of life. Just as we develop our physical muscles through overcoming opposition - such as lifting weights - we develop our character muscles by overcoming challenges and adversity.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: It's all about mechanics; all the weight-lifting in the world can't help you if you're not running correctly.
quotes.author: Ron Bramlett

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: Advice is like a stranger--if welcome, he stays the night; if not welcome, he returns home that day.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes the hurdles aren't really hurdles at all. They're welcome challenges, tests.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.quote: All living souls welcome whatever they are ready to cope with; all else they ignore, or pronounce to be monstrous and wrong, or deny to be possible.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: A smile is the universal welcome.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.quote: Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: Large corporations welcome innovation and individualism in the same way the dinosaurs welcomed large meteors.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Clouds can never hide the sun forever; so don't complain about clouds but never forget to welcome the sun.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Welcome those big, sticky, complicated problems. In them are your most powerful opportunities.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: We must welcome the future, remembering that soon it will be the past; and we must respect the past, remembering that it was once all that was humanly possible.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Welcome anything that comes to you, but do not long for anything else.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: A table full of welcome makes scarce one dainty dish.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The advice that is wanted is commonly not welcome and that which is not wanted, evidently an effrontery.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Despise not death, but welcome it, for nature wills it like all else.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: No one can be so welcome a guest that he will not annoy his host after three days.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: There are people who come into our lives as welcome as a cool breeze in summer- and last about as long.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Small cheer and great welcome makes a merry feast.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: This being human is a guest house. Every morning a new arrival. Welcome and entertain them all! -
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Compromise is the welcome mat to deception.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: Think to yourself that every day is your last; the hour to which you do not look forward will come as a welcome surprise.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Welcome the challenges. Look for the opportunities in every situation to learn and grow in wisdom.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The truth is seldom welcome, especially at dinner.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: We welcome passion, for the mind is briefly let off duty
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Because no one needs to live for ever. I think that sometimes you can outstay your welcome.
quotes.author: Gemma Malley

quotes.quote: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Welcome to the free world. We give people the power to choose. They can even choose the wrong thing. Beautiful, isn't it?
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: When you're locked up in here for life, you learn to welcome the little freedoms.
quotes.author: Alexander Gordon Smith

quotes.quote: I want to say a very sincere thank you for this welcome home - it is a wonderful welcome home.
quotes.author: Michael D. Higgins

quotes.quote: As they marched, the crowds lining the route broke into applause, a sweet and deeply felt spontaneous pattering that was a sort of communal embrace. Welcome home.
quotes.author: Lance Morrow

quotes.quote: I'm always travelling and spend a lot of time in airports so I know what it feels like to get a personal welcome home. I wish I got more of them.
quotes.author: Ben Eine

quotes.quote: Welcome home, sweet girl, it will be all be fine.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: I'll come get you, and I'll say: Welcome home.
quotes.author: Tegan Quin

quotes.quote: Small cheer and great welcome makes a merry feast.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: So, you are very welcome to our house. It must appear in other ways than words, Therefore, I scant this breathing courtesy.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Once again...welcome to my house. Come freely. Go safely; and leave something of the happiness you bring.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Good company, good wine, good welcome, can make good people.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A table-full of welcome!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: When we are generous in welcoming people and sharing something with them-some food, a place in our homes, our time-not only do we no longer remain poor: we are enriched.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Welcome, my old friend, Welcome to a foreign fireside.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Welcome home my dear, you are arrived.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: And kind the voice and glad the eyes that welcome my return at night.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: Welcome home to my native place bent upon returning bosom all day burning.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: For each and all I bid thee a grateful welcome home.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: And when the old man saw him come , well you know how we welcomed him,
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: To be welcomed by a hundred men each one has worn the leek.
quotes.author: Alan Parry Booth

quotes.quote: In the lovely hotel alexandra I was welcomed with hugs and with smiles.
quotes.author: Alan Parry Booth

quotes.quote: Though few understand it a life heaven loaned to be welcomed back home.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Kind voices bade him turn and rest and gentle faces welcomed him.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Where we love is home, home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: Our valleys may be filled with foes and tears; but we can lift our eyes to the hills to see God and the angels, heaven's spectators, who support us according to God's infinite wisdom as they prepare our welcome home.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Un-thread the rude eye of rebellion, and welcome home again discarded faith.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A smile is the universal welcome.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.quote: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: So all they welcomed him and closed the door and gat them gladly.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: To be welcomed and what an experience is the flow of its air.
quotes.author: Liam Ó Comain

quotes.quote: Once duly welcomed and adored how should I part with thee?
quotes.author: John Keble

quotes.quote: Every house was an inn where all were welcomed and feasted.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A master welder can strike an arc blindfolded, with one hand, upside down, in a snowstorm.
quotes.author: Steven Robert Farnsworth

quotes.quote: I became a welder. I was actually becoming an Engineer and I joined the wrong queue. And so I became a welder, without knowing what a welder was.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: Once you become successful, people know where you live, the type of house you live in, the kind of car you drive, the clothes you wear, and so it would be patronising to go and talk like a welder. Welding's a mystery to me now. You can't go back, your life changes every day.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: The Welder Way means rolling up your sleeves and getting it done. Â It means no divas. Â It means complete support for the artistic vision in charge â€“ a philosophy of â€œwhat can I do to help you?â€
quotes.author: Allyson Currin

quotes.quote: You are a welder if you have sun burn in the winter.
quotes.author: Walter

quotes.quote: Whether you function as welders or inspectors, the laws of physics are implacable lie-detectors. You may fool men. You will never fool the metal.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Welders make more money than philosophers. We need more welders and less philosophers.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: I'd always been scared of people with tertiary education and high intellects in case they found me wanting. I thought they viewed me as just a welder who knew a few jokes.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: It's what they do. If you're a welder and all of the sudden you're not the most popular welder on the block, are you going to quit welding? It's the same with any other occupation. Nobody should expect them to quit doing what they do.
quotes.author: Ray Waddell

quotes.quote: Nobody starts out knowing everything. You have to start at the bottom and pick people's brains. When I got out of the service, I became a sheet-metal worker. I was an apprentice for five years. I found out who the top people were in my trade, and I asked to work with them. I asked them a lot of questions. How can we do this a little faster, a little cheaper, a little better? Once they know where you're coming from, they open up.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Gaytan

quotes.quote: A workman at my farm showed me a broken metal bar. He fitted the two ends together, then subjected the joint to intense heat in the process of welding so that, as he explained, "the molecules flowed together in fusion." He told me that if he were to use a sledgehammer to hit the welded bar with force, it might break, but most likely not at the point where it had been welded. He was telling me that the metal bar could become strongest at its hitherto weakest place.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Steel can take on no other form than its current one for the person who cannot work with it. But any form is its current one for the machinist or blacksmith.
quotes.author: Robert Pirsig

quotes.quote: Forging has a way of taking hold of you until it becomes part of who you are.
quotes.author: Robert Thomas

quotes.quote: You are a welder if you have sun burn in the winter.
quotes.author: Chantique Inti Decor

quotes.quote: Welding is more than just grabbing a stick and going to work. There's a lot of science and knowledge involved.
quotes.author: Mike Kuehnl

quotes.quote: If you plan on becoming a TIG welder, you better plan on doing lots and lots of burning.
quotes.author: Marty Rice

quotes.quote: That lady welder and I are just friends. Just because I'm a welder, you know, doesn't mean I'm carrying a torch for her.
quotes.author: Herman Munster

quotes.quote: Boy, if my folks would only let me work. Then I could do all the things I want to do. I could take you dancing, the way you like to go, places you like to go to. You know, they need welders. They need 'em worse than soldiers.
quotes.author: Frank 'Frankie' Hauser

quotes.quote: The welfare state is the outcome of diverse forces over nearly four centuries of developing social policy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Speaker Newt Gingrich says that what is wrong with the present system is not that people abuse welfare but that welfare abuses people.
quotes.author: Daniel Schorr

quotes.quote: Your health and well being should be your number one priority, nothing else is more important.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: Happiness is absolutely a feeling and a state of well-being, but the key to happiness is understanding that it is created through action.
quotes.author: Kristi Ling

quotes.quote: Good well-being leads to good working performance.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The well-being and welfare of children should always be our focus.
quotes.author: Todd Tiahrt

quotes.quote: This welfare for wealthy companies wastes taxpayer dollars, harms the environment, and makes a mockery of the recent reductions in federal social spending programs.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Welfare distorts behavior, makes one less personally responsible and reduces the role of private charity. This principle applies to corporate welfare.
quotes.author: Larry Elder

quotes.quote: The welfare of our children is our main concern and their best interests are our first priority
quotes.author: Eddie Murphy

quotes.quote: Being truly happy in life involves you feeling more in control of the direction your life is going.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: The welfare state is not really about the welfare of the masses. It is about the egos of the elites
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: We should measure welfare's success by how many people leave welfare, not by how many are added
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Good health is a duty to yourself, to your contemporaries, to your inheritors, to the progress of the world.
quotes.author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quotes.quote: Welfare's purpose should be to eliminate, as far as possible, the need for its own existence.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The welfare of the people in particular has always been the alibi of tyrants.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Welfare is monetary methadone.
quotes.author: Adam Carolla

quotes.quote: Welfare makes you dependent upon someone to take care of you.
quotes.author: Charles Evers

quotes.quote: Welfare reforms and the whole happy exploitation movement are not baby steps. They are big stepsâ€“in a seriously backward direction.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: Welfare is not a retirement plan.
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: The welfare of a child is not to be measured by money only, nor by physical comfort only.
quotes.author: Lindley, L.J

quotes.quote: Self-esteem is as important to our well-being as legs are to a table. It is essential for physical and mental health and for happiness.
quotes.author: Louise Hart

quotes.quote: Let us have but one end in view, the welfare of humanity; and let us put aside all selfishness in consideration of language, nationality, or religion.
quotes.author: John Comenius

quotes.quote: The well-being and the hopes of the peoples of the world can never be served until peace as well as freedom, honor and self-respect is secure.
quotes.author: Ralph J. Bunche

quotes.quote: Well-being cannot exist just in your own head. Well-being is a combination of feeling good as well as actually having meaning, good relationships and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.quote: The trouble with always trying to preserve the health of the body is that it is so difficult to do without destroying the health of the mind.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Once you go on welfare it changes you. Even if you get off welfare, you never escape the stigma that you were a charity case. You're scarred for life.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: The welfare and the future of our societies depend on our capacity to remain mobilized so as to improve the health of every mother and child.
quotes.author: Jean Ping

quotes.quote: The welfare of each is bound up in the welfare of all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Private sincerity is a public welfare.
quotes.author: C. A. Bartol

quotes.quote: Welfare should be a safety-net, not a hammock.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't make a wish you aren't willing to come true. Don't dream a dream you aren't willing to pursue. Don't love a man you can't say, I do.
quotes.author: Willowy Whisper

quotes.quote: If there's a single lesson that life teaches us, it's that wishing doesn't make it so.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.quote: Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Everyone wishes that the man whom he fears would perish.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: I wish for sorrow to be a full stop and happiness to be a comma in my life.
quotes.author: Luffina Lourduraj

quotes.quote: A wise woman wishes to be no one's enemy; a wise woman refuses to be anyone's victim.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: No one is perfect and everyone wishes they could change something about themselves.
quotes.author: Julia Jones

quotes.quote: It is hard to contend against one's heart's desire; for whatever it wishes to have it buys at the cost of soul.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: May you find grace to do what needs to be done.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.
quotes.author: Sally Nicholls

quotes.quote: How sleep the brave, who sink to rest, By all their country's wishes blest!
quotes.author: William Collins

quotes.quote: When envoys are sent with compliments in their mouths, it is a sign that the enemy wishes for a truce.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Good wishes alone will not ensure peace.
quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

quotes.quote: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Man is free at the moment he wishes to be.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I'm not that rebellious. There's a part of me that wishes I was that.
quotes.author: Miranda Cosgrove

quotes.quote: If you have one wish, wish for everything to be exactly as it is. Then wait patiently for your wish to come true.
quotes.author: Stephen Russell

quotes.quote: Every girl wishes she was Juliet in some version of their life.
quotes.author: Hailee Steinfeld

quotes.quote: But darling, I wish you well On your way to the wishing well
quotes.author: Patty Griffin

quotes.quote: You should never wish for wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Rachel Cohn

quotes.quote: With persistent prayer, the desired wish shall be fulfilled.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A man of the world must seem to be what he wishes to be thought.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Whoever wishes peace among peoples must fight statism.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: When you wish someone joy, you wish them peace, love, prosperity, happiness. All the good things.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune, and idleness, its opposite, never brought a man to the goal of any of his best wishes.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: A wise unselfishness is not a surrender of yourself to the wishes of anyone, but only to the best discoverable course of action.
quotes.author: David Seabury

quotes.quote: That is ever the way. Tis all jealousy to the bride and good wishes to the corpse.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The concept of total wellness recognizes that our every thought, word, and behavior affects our greater health and well-being. And we, in turn, are affected not only emotionally but also physically and spiritually.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: He who takes medicine and neglects to diet wastes the skill of his doctors.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: If you don't take care of yourself, the undertaker will overtake that responsibility for you.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, or not to anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Wellness is the compete integration of body, mind, and spirit - the realization that everything we do, think, feel, and believe has an effect on our state of well-being.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: The trouble with always trying to preserve the health of the body is that it is so difficult to do without destroying the health of the mind.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: So many people spend their health gaining wealth, and then have to spend their wealth to regain their health.
quotes.author: A.J. Reb Materi

quotes.quote: A healthy body is a guest chamber for the soul: a sick body is a prison.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Know, then, whatever cheerful and serene supports the mind supports the body too.
quotes.author: John Armstrong

quotes.quote: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind and spirit. When one is free from physical disabilities and mental distractions, the gates of the soul open.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: If man thinks about his physical or moral state he usually discovers that he is ill.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Our children's health and well-being are dependent on our commitment to promoting food access and good eating habits at home, at school and in the community.
quotes.author: Rod Blagojevich

quotes.quote: In a disordered mind, as in a disordered body, soundness of health is impossible.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Your body hears everything your mind says.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.quote: The part can never be well unless the whole is well.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The scientific truth may be put quite briefly; eat moderately, having an ordinary mixed diet, and don't worry.
quotes.author: Robert Hutchison

quotes.quote: In minds crammed with thoughts, organs clogged with toxins, and bodies stiffened with neglect, there is just no space for anything else.
quotes.author: Alison Rose Levy

quotes.quote: To me, good health is more than just exercise and diet. Its really a point of view and a mental attitude you have about yourself.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Health is a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.
quotes.author: World Health Organization

quotes.quote: He who has health has hope; and he who has hope has everything.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: If you have health, you probably will be happy, and if you have health and happiness, you have all the wealth you need, even if it is not all you want.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: If you want to enjoy health, start this very moment to cleanseyour consciousness of all wrong thinking and rid it of every thought except the thought of LOVE.
quotes.author: James B. Schafer

quotes.quote: What man is happy? He who has a healthy body, a resourceful mind, and a docile nature.
quotes.author: Thales Of Miletus

quotes.quote: Diseases of the soul are more dangerous and more numerous than those of the body.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine, but a broken spirit dries the bones..
quotes.author: Proverbs 17:22

quotes.quote: The mind has great influence over the body, and maladies often have their origin there.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Moliere

quotes.quote: He's a sort of a cross between a ferris wheel and a werewolf, but with a lovable streak—if you care to blast for it.
quotes.author: Fredric March

quotes.quote: You hear him howlin' around your kitchen door / You better not let him in / Little old lady got mutilated late last night / Werewolves of London again.
quotes.author: Warren Zevon

quotes.quote: A werewolf is always larger in the eye of the frightened.
quotes.author: John Fort

quotes.quote: A lonely journey in a snowstorm on All Souls’ Night, when the dead travel fast. The traveler takes refuge in a marble sepulchre, the tomb of a mysterious Austrian countess, and is attacked by a werewolf.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: A werewolf - a very dubious pretext, one I can hardly accept. Werewolves are the unhealthy machinations of timid little minds. Now, be off with you.
quotes.author: Sybilla

quotes.quote: Oh the werewolf, oh the werewolf / Comes stepping along / He don't even break the branches where he's gone / Once I saw him in the moonlight, when the bats were a flying / I saw the werewolf, and the werewolf was crying.
quotes.author: Michael Hurley

quotes.quote: Hearts set aflame by the spell of the full moon / A circle of fire that burns in the night / Cannot be stopped it's the curse of werewolf / A child of the night that howl to the moon.
quotes.author: Fredrik Nilsson

quotes.quote: Lycanthropy is in his blood, / And spreads to those he slays. / Uncontrolled metamorphosis, / Undetectable by day. / But when the moon is waxing, / And all the world's asleep. / Through woods and fields, / The werewolf he will creep.
quotes.author: Andrew Paul Williams

quotes.quote: A muzzle / on a werewolf / Will never tame / its bite / Whose jaws retract, / with fangs intact / Enraged, / —to prowl the night.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: But, notions of the werewolf, both in folklore and popular culture, have one thing in common; it is fear of the unknown and suspicion against strange and unfamiliar people. The savage image of the werewolf, being uncivilized and nocturnal, fits well: it is a way of expressing fears of what is believed to be wrong with society […] werewolves reveal our fear of what lurks inside, the beast hidden in us all that has the potential to change a rational and moral person, leaving only dreaded animal behaviour and appetites of lust, hunger, and rage.
quotes.author: Tommy Kuusela

quotes.quote: Another werewolf thing. Like most animals, we spent a large part of our lives engaged in the three Fs of basic survival. Feeding, fighting and reproduction.
quotes.author: Kelley Armstrong

quotes.quote: Some werewolves are hairy on the inside.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Werewolves are much more common animals than you might think.
quotes.author: Daniel Pinkwater

quotes.quote: Werewolves did not consider wolves one of their own; in fact, wolves were inferior. They were hunters, strong and ravenous like them, but they weren't as big or as intelligent.
quotes.author: Janiera Eldridge

quotes.quote: Whether you're a vampire or werewolf, love is still love. Betrayal is still betrayal.
quotes.author: Nathan Parsons

quotes.quote: You can't kill rock and roll without a silver bullet because she's a werewolf.
quotes.author: Anthony Langston

quotes.quote: If being a werewolf is really a curse, you've got to treat it honorably. If werewolves are going to carry on, there has to be an incredibly powerful force. There is the business of the craving, the hunger for the kill. It has to be deeply pleasurable and more than an appetite for meat. There has to be a sensual dimension to it.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.quote: We have all seen werewolf transformations hundreds of times on screen.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.quote: The truth is, if a werewolf behaved like this psychopath it wouldn't be because he was part animal, but because he was still too human. Only humans kill for sport.
quotes.author: Kelley Armstrong

quotes.quote: The werewolf is neither man nor wolf, but a satanic creature with the worst qualities of both.
quotes.author: Warner Oland

quotes.quote: In America, the colors sing, they don't just glower at you. The West Coast especially is fantastic. It seems like you can do whatever you want here.
quotes.author: Stanley Donwood

quotes.quote: I've always felt alone and isolated, and living on the West Coast, there's no poetry community out here, and if there is, it's really spread out - because it's LA, it's spread out.
quotes.author: Victoria Chang

quotes.quote: Late afternoon on the West Coast ends with the sky doing all its brilliant stuff.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: This country, and the West Coast, especially, is bad at preserving any cultural legacy.
quotes.author: Esa-Pekka Salonen

quotes.quote: When I left the West Coast I was a liberal. When I landed in New York I was a revolutionary.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: I live on the West Coast of the United States, and yet the air that I breathe is sometimes the same air that was being breathed in China the day before.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: When you think of YG, you think of the West Coast, L.A., the lifestyle; that's what the brand about. That's what 4Hunnid represents.
quotes.author: YG

quotes.quote: No, I don't think about the myth of the West. It's not the kind of thinking I do. That's more suited to people who live in big towns on the West Coast or East Coast, people who stay under a roof, in a room, all the time.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee Jones

quotes.quote: I feel like too many people on the West Coast, they're too needy. They feel they need Snoop or Game. I never did any tracks with any West Coast artists. Not because I didn't want to, but because I didn't feel like that's what I had to do in order to get on. I just did music.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: I always like going to the West Coast. I don't know if it's a certain field, team, whatever it is, but I usually seem to do well here.
quotes.author: Freddie Freeman

quotes.quote: If only I'd stayed on the West Coast, I might have made something of myself.
quotes.author: Mitch Kapor

quotes.quote: It's hard for me not to play on the West Coast. I love it out there.
quotes.author: John Daly

quotes.quote: Going Back to Cali' is one of my favorite songs because of all the East Coast - West Coast rivalry.
quotes.author: ASAP Ferg

quotes.quote: Attitude is attitude, whether you're a West Coast gangster or East Coast gangster, you know?
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.quote: A lot of people think that it was about Biggie on the East Coast and 2Pac on the West Coast. It wasn't like that. Big ran New York. 2Pac ran America.
quotes.author: Cormega

quotes.quote: I have a West Coast rhythm section and a New York rhythm section. I've got them spread out all over the place.
quotes.author: Marian McPartland

quotes.quote: I'm so much more of an East Coast girl than a West Coast girl.
quotes.author: Lexa Doig

quotes.quote: I'm getting comfortable with West Coast style, which is more laid-back than British style.
quotes.author: Cat Deeley

quotes.quote: I was born and raised in Los Angeles. I split my time between the West Coast and the East.
quotes.author: Tessa Thompson

quotes.quote: I represent the West Coast culture.
quotes.author: YG

quotes.quote: We didn't build the interstate system to connect New York to Los Angeles because the West Coast was a priority. No, we webbed the highways so people can go to multiple places and invent ways of doing things not thought of by the persons building the roads.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Please, all you MCs out there, all you fans out there, don't think Big gonna make a record dissing 2Pac or the West Coast because it's not going down like that. I can't even see me wasting my time or my talent to disrespect another black man.
quotes.author: The Notorious B.I.G.

quotes.quote: There's a great documentary on Tupac called 'Resurrection' about the last few years of Tupac's life and how he transformed. And, ironically, how this East Coast rapper became this West Coast icon, back when all that Death Row/Sean Combs stuff was going on.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: I don't want to bring a European city or an east-coast city to the West Coast.
quotes.author: Eric Garcetti

quotes.quote: I'm a dirty south goon - damn right, I ain't no West coast gangster.
quotes.author: Jorge Masvidal

quotes.quote: A lot of people don't know I'm from the West Coast. My swag is different. Me being from Young Money, affiliated with them, some people think I'm from down South. They think maybe I'm from New Orleans like them. It's just good to show people and build outside of Young Money, build my brand outside of that.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: If size really mattered, the whale, not the shark, would rule the waters.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: If you swim with sharks, make sure you have the appetite of a whale.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Swallowed up in the belly of the whale of infatuation, I now needed to distract myself in order to stay happy. Because our unknowable future shadowed the countenance of my soul.
quotes.author: Aspen Matis

quotes.quote: Whales are killed today to supply the limited demand for whale meat or to be used in pet foods or as fodder for fur-bearing animals used in the fur trade.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: I wanted to make connections between Whale's past and present.
quotes.author: Bill Condon

quotes.quote: The Whale is found in seas and oceans, indulging there in fishlike motions, But Science shows that whales are mammals.
quotes.author: Eliis Parker Butler

quotes.quote: Not a mightier whale than this In the vast Atlantic is; Not a fatter fish than he Flounders round the polar sea.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: The whale that wanders round the pole Is not a table fish, you cannot bake or boil him whole nor serve him in a dish.
quotes.author: Hilaire Beloc

quotes.quote: And enormous mother whales lie dreaming suckling their whale-tender young and dreaming with strange whale eyes wide open in the waters of the beginning and the end.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: A purple whale proudly sweeps his tail towards Nineveh; glassy green surges between a mile of roaring sea.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Tumble and rumble, and grumble and snort, Like a whale to starboard, a whale to port; Tumble and rumble, and grumble and snort, and the steamer steams thro' the sea, love!
quotes.author: Sydney Thompson Dobell

quotes.quote: I see a Whale in the south-sea, drinking my soul away.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: But to both the dolphin refused its doll, Till the whale was oblidged to whale them all.
quotes.author: Katharine Lee Bates

quotes.quote: The grey gull sat on a floating whale. On a floating whale sat he. And he told his tale of the storm and the gale. And the ships that he saw with steam and sail, as he flew by the Northern Sea.
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the midst of the mammoth ocean; there exists the preposterously huge whale.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: If you were going to drown her in the swirling and ferocious waves of the ocean after the whale overtoppled her boat; drown me to the bottom instead.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: In the belly of the whale. I'm highly nutritious here.
quotes.author: Newsboys

quotes.quote: How to exit a whale's digestion? It might behoove me to be heaved.
quotes.author: Newsboys

quotes.quote: Fishing for the humpback whale. A tractor for a whale winch.
quotes.author: Nic Jones

quotes.quote: They say the whale that swallowed Jonah to put me through the test. Sometimes I get that feeling that same ol' whale swallowed me.
quotes.author: Joe Bonamassa

quotes.quote: When the whale get strike and the line runs out and the whale makes a flunder with its tail.
quotes.author: Mary

quotes.quote: Whale, swim with me whale we will go far into the sea.
quotes.author: Yellow Ostrich

quotes.quote: Gotta a whale of a tale to tell you lad. It's a whale of a tale or two.
quotes.author: Hans Zimmer

quotes.quote: The real threat to whales is whaling, which has endangered many whale species.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Whales in mid-ocean, suspended in the waves of the sea great heaven of whales in the waters, old hierarchies. And enormous mother whales lie dreaming suckling their whale-tender young and dreaming with strange whale eyes wide open in the waters of the beginning and the end.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Whales are drinking all our water and eating our sailors.
quotes.author: Maddox

quotes.quote: A whale is as unique as a cactus. But don't ask a whale to survive Death Valley. We all have special gifts. Where we use them and how determines whether we actually complete something.
quotes.author: Max De Pree

quotes.quote: Whales are killed today to supply the limited demand for whale meat or to be used in pet foods or as fodder for fur-bearing animals used in the fur trade.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: A whale in the shallow water of the River Thames is like a human lost in the heat of the Sahara desert.
quotes.author: Laila Sadler

quotes.quote: The whale is endangered, while the ant continues to do just fine.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Chances are, disabled or not, you don't grow all of your food. Chances are, you didn't build the car, bike, wheelchair, subway, shoes, or bus that transports you. Chances are you didn't construct your home. Chances are you didn't sew your clothing (or make the fabric and thread used to sew it). The difference between the needs that many disabled people have and the needs of people who are not labelled as disabled is that non-disabled people have had their dependencies normalized.
quotes.author: AJ Withers

quotes.quote: Being confined to a wheelchair doesn't bother me as my mind is free to roam the universe, but it felt wonderful to be weightless.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Be gone, sorrow, sickness, wheelchairs, and cancer! Enough of you, screams of fear and nights of horror! Death, you die! Life, you reign!
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: My disability exists not because I use a wheelchair, but because the broader environment isn't accessible.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: Gather the wheelchairs in a circle, and then summon the cripples. Would anybody care for a glass of discrimination
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: For me, the wheelchair symbolizes disability in a way a cane does not.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.quote: Faith: a device of the mind, fed by the soul, that functions like crutches to a man in a wheelchair.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: The battle to find a workplace that's wheelchair accessible is a feat in itself, let alone an employer who's going to be cool about employing someone with a disability in a job you actually want to do.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: If There's A Wheel, There's A Way.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can take them in a wheelchair and put them in a pool, so they can move their arms and legs. In a pool disabled people can do things that they can't normally do otherwise.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: In wheelchair sports, people thought athletes with disabilities were courageous and inspirational. They never give them credit for simply being competitive.
quotes.author: Jean Driscoll

quotes.quote: Old ladies in wheelchairs with blankets over their legs, I don't think so...retired mermaids.
quotes.author: Milton Jones

quotes.quote: There is so much pain in the world, and most of these people keep theirs secret, rolling through agonizing lives in invisible wheelchairs, dressed in invisible bodycasts.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Disability is as visual as race. If a wheelchair user can't play Beyonce, then Beyonce can't play a wheelchair user.
quotes.author: Maysoon Zayid

quotes.quote: As far as wheelchairs are concerned, the floors are a dream.
quotes.author: Liz Craft

quotes.quote: If we see someone in a wheelchair, we assume they cannot walk. It may be that they can walk three, four, five steps. That, to them, means they can walk.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.quote: Money cannot buy health, but I'd settle for a diamond-studded wheelchair.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Every person with a disability has a slightly different kind of disability. Not everybody has the same problems. Usually the wheelchairs are the wheelchairs. It's the same height and so on. It's a problem.
quotes.author: Itzhak Perlman

quotes.quote: Whimsy doesn't care if you are the driver or the passenger; all that matters is that you are on your way.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: Most people don't see the edginess in my work. They think it's all fantasy and whimsy.
quotes.author: Niki de St. Phalle

quotes.quote: More than whimsy, joy is a weapon we use to fight life's battles.
quotes.author: Margaret Feinberg

quotes.quote: What's life without whimsy?
quotes.author: Dr Sheldon Cooper

quotes.quote: When wisdom gives way to whimsy and ethics fall to the excitement, it is highly likely that the ground beneath me will ‘give way’ and it is I who will ‘fall.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: If you're alive, kick into drive. Chase whimsies. See if you can turn dreams into a way to make a living, if not an entire way of life.
quotes.author: Kevin Smith

quotes.quote: How often do they rescue or ruin us, through whimsy or design or a combination of both, the adults to whom we entrust our care!
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: Be it in the form of a zillion molecules of whimsical deliriousness that we gave shape to; preposterously deluging every bit of the ecstatically vibrant atmosphere;
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Pathetically whimsical, childish and whimsical and wise; and now, relenting, after all, the softer welcome of your eyes.
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: Her soul's light shines through, but her soul cannot be seen. It is something elusive, whimsical, tender, wanton, infantile, wise and noble.
quotes.author: Joyce Kilmer

quotes.quote: In nonsense and impossibilities. This made a whimsical philosopher before the spacious world his tub prefer.
quotes.author: Lord John Wilmot

quotes.quote: When you first girded for this arduous track, and under various whimsical pretexts endowed another with your damned defects, could you have dreamed in your despondent vein.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: When I needed just lavishness; I perhaps sought the company of my whimsical grandfather the most—as he could virtually lay every priceless gift of the Universe at my feet—at even the tiniest of my babyishly false cry.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Faces cheerful, full of whimsical mirth, lined by the wind, burned by the sun; bodies enraptured by the abounding earth, as whose children we are brethern: one.
quotes.author: Robert Nichols

quotes.quote: Give me death instead; the most concluding connotation of life; wholesomely devastating even the most whimsical knot of my nonchalantly pugnacious and sadistically crucifying existence.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Artists are esoterically whimsical,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: This whimsical virgin forget; women other adiaiire, who will melt with your fire, and laugh at the little coquette.
quotes.author: George Gordon Lord Byron

quotes.quote: This made a whimsical philosopher, before the spacious world, his tub prefer.
quotes.author: Lord John Wilmot

quotes.quote:
Gentle, whimsical, laughing, heaven-sent;
and, for a day, fair peace have given me in this, the city of my discontent!
quotes.author: Vachel Lindsay

quotes.quote: The pleasure of gratifying whim is very great. It is known only by those who are whimsical.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: The caprice of our temper is even more whimsical than that of Fortune.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: I still like to live in a whimsical world that seems more romantic and fantasy-related because real life seems so hard.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: We shouldn't be afraid to embrace whimsy, that nagging idea that life could be magical; it could be special if we were only willing to take a few risks.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: Very rare, the intelligence of the heart. The intelligence of the whimsical brain is less rare, less attaching, sometimes tedious.
quotes.author: Storm Jameson

quotes.quote: Fashion is a tyrant from which there is no deliverance; all must conform to its whimsical.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Time give us enough time and our best-supported decisions will seem wobbly, our certainties whimsical.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: Our whole life is an attempt to discover when our spontaneity is whimsical, sentimental irresponsibility and when it is a valid expression of our deepest desires and values.
quotes.author: Helen Merell Lynd

quotes.quote: A fellow who lives in a windmill has not a more whimsical dwelling than the heart of a man that is lodged in a woman.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Today it's economically crucial and personally rewarding to create something that is also beautiful, whimsical, or emotionally engaging.
quotes.author: Daniel H Pink

quotes.quote: I've learned to respect the whimsical.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: Do not listen to those who weep and complain, for their disease is contagious.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Complaining only takes away energy from today and never solves the problems for tomorrow.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: You can never win when you wear the ugly cloak of self-pity and the sour sound of whining.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: No misfortune is so bad that whining about it won't make it worse.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.quote: On the path to success, you will notice that the successful ones are not whiners, nor do they complain often.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: A complaining tongue reveals an ungrateful heart.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Life isn't fair. It's true, and you still have to deal with it. Whining about it rarely levels the playing field, but learning to rise above it is the ultimate reward.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Whining shows a lack of character. If you don't like the way something is, do something to change it.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Don't whine, complain, or make excuses.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: If there's no wind, row.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: If you have time to whine and complain about something then you have the time to do something about it.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Pressure will squeeze whining out of losers and winning out of achievers.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Everyone makes choices in life. Some bad, some good. It's called living, and if you want to bow out, then go right ahead. But don't do it halfway. Don't linger in whiner's limbo.
quotes.author: Maria V. Snyder

quotes.quote: It takes a genius to whine appealingly.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: If you're a sniveler, a whiner, a complainer, you will never be happy. We all have that side. Get a little stoical and just take the pain.
quotes.author: Federick Lenz

quotes.quote: The sooner we realize that the world has changed, the sooner we can accept it and make something of what we've got. Whining isn't a scalable solution.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: If you are a complainer, you might have already spent your help quota.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Whining is not only graceless, but it can be dangerous. It can alert a brute that a victim is in the neighborhood.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Shiftless persons find their chief happiness in complaining.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: Whiners usually play alone.
quotes.author: Cynthia Lewis

quotes.quote: The tendency to whining and complaining may be taken as the surest sign symptom of little souls and inferior intelects.
quotes.author: Lord Jeffrey

quotes.quote: There's lot of whiners in every crowd.
quotes.author: R. Lee Ermey

quotes.quote: Complainers change their complaints, but they never reduce the amount of time spent in complaining.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: If something goes wrong, don't whine about it. Have a spine about it. Adjust, adapt, and move forward.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Complaining about a problem without posing a solution is called whining.
quotes.author: Teddy Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Stop whining: start enjoying. And when you look back at the past, make sure you're smiling.
quotes.author: Alex Smith

quotes.quote: Don't whine. Find the positive in difficult situations.
quotes.author: Tony Dicicco

quotes.quote: God wants you to become a winner, not a whiner.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Whiskey will always be a part of my life.
quotes.author: Artie Lange

quotes.quote: It is true that whisky improves with age. The older I get, the more I like it.
quotes.author: Robert Black

quotes.quote: Courage is a vitamin best swallowed with whiskey.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: My favorite drink is a cocktail of carrot juice and whiskey. I am always drunk but I can see for miles.
quotes.author: Roy 'Chubby' Brown

quotes.quote: He told me I had to have a whiskey every day to get better.
quotes.author: Peter Cole

quotes.quote: Whiskey makes my baby, feel a little frisky.
quotes.author: Luke Bryan

quotes.quote: For God's sake bring me a large Scotch. What a bloody awful country.
quotes.author: Reginald Maudling

quotes.quote: The true pioneer of civilization is not the newspaper, not religion, not the railroad but whiskey!
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Give an Irishman lager for a month and he's a dead man. An Irishman's stomach is lined with copper, and the beer corrodes it. But whiskey polishes the copper and is the saving of him.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We got more provisions for our whiskey than the same money, which we paid for the liquor, would have bought; so after all it proved a very profitable investment.
quotes.author: Buffalo Bill

quotes.quote: Love makes the world go round? Not at all. Whiskey makes it go round twice as fast.
quotes.author: Compton Mackenzie

quotes.quote: I like my whisky old and my women young.
quotes.author: Errol Flynn

quotes.quote: Whisky making is an act of cooperation between the blessings of nature and the wisdom of man.
quotes.author: Masataka Taketsuru

quotes.quote: When life hands you lemons, make whisky sours.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: The water was not fit to drink. To make it palatable, we had to add whisky. By diligent effort, I learned to like it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When asked for his hangover cure, I take the juice of two bottles of whisky.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Whiskey is carried into committee rooms in demijohns and carried out in demagogues.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I'm on a whisky diet. I've lost three days already.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a bad whisky. Some whiskies just happen to be better than others.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Whiskey, like a beautiful woman, demands appreciation. You gaze first, then it's time to drink.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Brown has an inordinate taste for whiskey.
quotes.author: Sharon Rose

quotes.quote: The whiskey on your breath could make a small boy dizzy;But I hung on like death:Such waltzing was not easy.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: What whiskey will not cure, there is no cure for.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: I contented myself with whiskey, for medicinal purposes. It helped numb my various aches and pains. Not that the alcohol actually reduced the pain, it just gave the pain a life of its own, apart from mine.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Always carry a flagon of whiskey in case of snakebite and furthermore always carry a small snake.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: A good gulp of hot whiskey at bedtime it's not very scientific, but it helps.
quotes.author: Alexander Fleming

quotes.quote: Whiskey is by far the most popular of all remedies that won't cure a cold.
quotes.author: Jerry Vale

quotes.quote: Whiskey has killed more men than bullets, but most men would rather be full of whiskey than bullets. What I like in a good author is not what he says, but what he whispers.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Whiskey claims to itself alone the exclusive office of sot-making.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Too much of anything is bad, but too much good whiskey is barely enough.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: One whisper, added to a thousand others, becomes a roar of discontent.
quotes.author: Julie Garwood

quotes.quote: It is harder to kill a whisper than even a shouted calumny.
quotes.author: Mary Stewart

quotes.quote: Ever notice that the whisper of temptation can be heard farther than the loudest call to duty.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: A whisper can be stronger, as an atom is stronger, than a whole mountain.
quotes.author: Louise Nevelson

quotes.quote: It is impossible that the whisper of a faction should prevail against the voice of a nation.
quotes.author: Lord John Russell

quotes.quote: That whisper you keep hearing is the universe trying to get your attention.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Listen to the whisperings of the Spirit, the gift of revelation to which you are entitled.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: His whisper was the softest sound I ever knew, which seemed to bring the loudest heartbeat.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Ignore the whisper of fear, let your inner ability to take over because it's meant to be your guide.
quotes.author: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.quote: All whispers and echoes from a past that is gone teem into the sleeper's brain, and he is with them, and part of them.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: Within the whispers of love, I found my heart. Within a glimmer from a ray, I found my soul. Within both, I found myself.
quotes.author: Raneem Kayyali

quotes.quote: Sometimes you want to whisper in God's ear, 'God, we know you are in charge, but why don't you make it slightly more obvious?'
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: The whisper of a pretty girl can be heard further than the roar of a lion.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Listen to the whispers or soon you will be listening to the screams.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Our murmuring is the devil's music.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.quote: Let choice whisper in your ear and love murmur in your heart. Be ready. Here comes life.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We are more prone to murmur at the punishment of our faults than to lament them.
quotes.author: Marguerite Gardiner

quotes.quote: Listen to the murmur of water and you'll hear Mother Nature.Listen to the stillness beneath, and there you'll find God.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: The murmurs of many a famous river on the other side of the globe reach even to us here, as to more distant dwellers on its banks;many a poet's stream, floating the helms and shields of heroes on its bosom.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The whispering of the truth is stronger than the thunderstorm of the untruth!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When you whisper about something, it's too big, and you can't get it under control and take control of it.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: I want to whisper poetry into your mind and imprint love letters to your soul and dance with you in an empty white room of potential
quotes.author: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.quote: The whispers of shared ecstasy are choral.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: The whisper of the dusk is night shedding its husk.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: In the whisper of the leaves appears an interchange of love.
quotes.author: William Jones

quotes.quote: No matter how softly you whisper a prayer, God hears and understands.
quotes.author: Tonto Dikeh

quotes.quote: Sometimes a whisper speaks volumes.
quotes.author: Scott Sheddan

quotes.quote: God whispers to us in our pleasures, speaks in our conscience, but shouts in our pain: it is His megaphone to rouse a deaf world.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Now come the whispers bearing bouquets of moonbeams and sunlight tremblings.
quotes.author: Aberjhani
