quotes.quote: As for murmurs, mother, we grumble a little now and then, to be sure; but there's no love lost between us.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: White lies always introduce others of a darker complexion.
quotes.author: William S. Paley

quotes.quote: Those who think it is permissible to tell white lies soon grow color-blind.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: White is not a mere absence of color; it is a shining and affirmative thing, as fierce as red, as definite as black. God paints in many colors; but He never paints so gorgeously, I had almost said so gaudily, as when He paints in white.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Beauty is not just a white girl. It's so many different flavors and shades.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: When it is not on the side of civil rights, then the law is not right, it is white.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: When we're unemployed, we're called lazy; when the whites are unemployed it's called a depression.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: You cannot make a revolution in white gloves.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: Lawyers are men who will swear black is white--if they are paid for it.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: A man's reputation has been very aptly compared to a sheet of white paper; if it be once blotted, it can hardly ever be made to look as white as before.
quotes.author: Richard De Bury

quotes.quote: There are many humorous things in the world; among them, the white man's notion that he is less savage than the other savages.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The white man knows how to make everything, but he does not know how to distribute it.
quotes.author: Sitting Bull

quotes.quote: The white light streams down to be broken up by those human prisms into all the colors of the rainbow. Take your own color in the pattern and be just that.
quotes.author: Charles R. Brown

quotes.quote: A lucky man is rarer than a white crow.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: So remember when you tell those little white lies that the night has a thousand eyes.
quotes.author: Bobby Vee

quotes.quote: I call white the most powerful non-color; it's clean, optimistic, powerful.
quotes.author: Jason Wu

quotes.quote: Just as white light consists of colored rays, so reverence for life contains all the components of ethics: love, kindliness, sympathy, empathy, peacefulness and power to forgive.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: This world is white no longer, and it will never be white again.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: You may not know it, but at the far end of despair, there is a white clearing where one is almost happy.
quotes.author: Joan Baez

quotes.quote: The snow goose need not bathe to make itself white. Neither need you do anything but be yourself.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: When we don't have information, we go to the simplest outlook, to black and white. But then we have to lie to ourselves. Black is never as black as you're painting it and white is never as white.
quotes.author: Patricia Sun

quotes.quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: I want to be the white man's brother, not his brother-in-law.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: White privilege is the other side of racism.
quotes.author: Paula Rothenberg

quotes.quote: White. A blank page or canvas. So many possibilities.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: Some white people hate black people, and some white people love black people, some black people hate white people, and some black people love white people. So you see it's not an issue of black and white, it's an issue of Lovers and Haters.
quotes.author: Eden Ahbez

quotes.quote: One puts on black robes to scare the hell out of white people, while the other puts on white robes to scare the hell out of blacks.
quotes.author: Mo Udall

quotes.quote: When we tell little white lies, we become progressively color-blind. It is better to remain silent than to mislead.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Little white lies are told by humans all the time. Indeed, lying is often how we get through each day in a happy little bubble. We spend time and energy rationalizing our own behaviors, beliefs and decision-making processes.
quotes.author: Barry Ritholtz

quotes.quote: Those who think it is permissible to tell white lies soon grow color-blind.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: Enough white lies can scorch the earth black.
quotes.author: Isaac Marion

quotes.quote: There are no white lies, there is only the blackest of destruction, and a white lie is the blackest of all.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as white lies; a lie is as black as a coalpit, and twice as foul.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: White lies always introduce others of a darker complexion.
quotes.author: William S. Paley

quotes.quote: The perjurer's mother told white lies.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: The prevarication and white lies which a mind that keeps itself ambitiously pure is as uneasy under as a great artist under the false touches that no eye detects but his own, are worn as lightly as mere trimmings when once the actions have become a lie.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A degree of lying - you know, white lies - seems to be inherent in all languages and all forms of communication.
quotes.author: Matthew Lesko

quotes.quote: The simplest falsehoods are the strongest.
quotes.author: Kate Morton

quotes.quote: All lies, white or black, disgrace a gentleman, although I grant there is a difference: to say the least of it, it is a dangerous habit, for white lies are but the gentleman ushers to black ones.
quotes.author: Frederick Marryat

quotes.quote: So remember when you tell those little white lies that the night has a thousand eyes.
quotes.author: Bobby Vee

quotes.quote: I suppose everyone tells little white lies. Quite often they're necessary to make someone feel better or prevent feelings from being hurt. Whoppers? No, that's dangerous and they'll boomerang.
quotes.author: Richard Chamberlain

quotes.quote: A white lie is always pardonable. But he who tells the truth without compulsion merits no leniency.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: A safety net of small white lies can be the bedrock of a successful marriage. You wouldn’t believe how cheaply I can do a kitchen renovation.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: I don't like being lied to, so I only lie about the stupid things. White lies, basically.
quotes.author: Enrique Iglesias

quotes.quote: A world without any lies at all is not a good world, because it's artless and because there are no white lies, no flattery.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: Each time you are honest and conduct yourself with honesty, a success force will drive you toward greater success. Each time you lie, even with a little white lie, there are strong forces pushing you toward failure.
quotes.author: Joseph Sugarman

quotes.quote: Thank you, people who say 'Wow, you're really photogenic,' for not saying what you really mean: 'Wow, you're really ugly in person.'
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: She tells enough white lies to ice a wedding cake.
quotes.author: Emma Alice Margaret Asquith

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is the home of the three little white lies: 'The Ferrari is paid for,' 'The mortgage is assumable,' and 'It's just a cold sore!
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: But little white lies here and there is human nature. Everybody does that.
quotes.author: Lucy Hale

quotes.quote: The average person tells a few white lies.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: I like the idea of what happens when someone tells a small white lie - which I think is the premise of the show - and how it has ripple effects, so really it's also about raising the stakes of this little lie.
quotes.author: Darren Star

quotes.quote: White lies keep social dignity intact and are far more prevalent than most people realize. Several studies have found that an average person is lied to from 10 to 200 times a day - mostly just to keep a conversation going, to avoid conflict, or to establish a connection with someone.
quotes.author: Pamela Meyer

quotes.quote: Don't tell lies, ever. No matter what - not even little white lies.
quotes.author: Margaret Keane

quotes.quote: It is in games that many men discover their paradise.
quotes.author: Robert Wilson Lynd

quotes.quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton was the one who asked why.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There are so many great things in life; why dwell on negativity?
quotes.author: Zendaya

quotes.quote: Why waste time learning, when ignorance is instantaneous?
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: The common question that gets asked in business is, why? That's a good question, but an equally valid question is, why not?
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Here we are trapped in the amber of the moment. There is no why.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: There is no force like success, and that is why the individual makes all effort to surround himself throughout life with the evidence of it ; as of the individual so should it be of the nation.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: A love of reading shows empathy, the desire to understand how others live or act or might act - and why.
quotes.author: Celeste Ng

quotes.quote: For as long as there's anyone to ask 'Why?' the answer will always be Why not?
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: All knowledge meets an end at the question... Why?
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: There is always the question why and there is always life, Which doesn't need an answer.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: To ask why we fall in love is to ask why the leaves fall. And to ask how we stay in love is to ask how the trees stay.
quotes.author: Jimvirle/Jinvirle

quotes.quote: Maybe the whys and the hows aren't as important as just the knowing.
quotes.author: Tawdra Kandle

quotes.quote: Start by asking the question Why. This is because behind the question why there lies answers to your question.
quotes.author: D. S. Mashego

quotes.quote: No oppressive order could permit the oppressed to begin to question: Why?
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: Great art is an escape from the agony of why.
quotes.author: Robert A. Kearse

quotes.quote: Those who know how will always work for those who know why.
quotes.author: Sam Chandler

quotes.quote: Those who are growing great are always asking why? If they fail or lose, they ask why? If they succeed or win too, they ask why?
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Don't ever take a fence down until you know why it was put up.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Life is hard for everyone. That's why there's such a nice reward at the end of it.
quotes.author: Aidan Quinn

quotes.quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Why does watching a dog be a dog fill one with happiness?
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Life is so short, so there is no reason why you shouldn't live it to the fullest expression of yourself.
quotes.author: Coy Bowles

quotes.quote: Why do you not practice what you preach?
quotes.author: St Jerome

quotes.quote: If halfway love is all you want or all you care to give, why bother with love at all and only halfway live.
quotes.author: Marty Robins

quotes.quote: If you're going to do something, strive to do it better than anyone else. Do it all the way. If you're going to half-ass it, why bother?
quotes.author: Ashley Lorenzana

quotes.quote: Life was messy. Always had been and always would be and that was just the way it was, so why bother complaining? You either did something about it or you didn’t, and then you lived with the choice you made.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: But if you sit around thinking what to do and end up not doing anything, why bother even thinking about it? You're better off going out on the town and having a good time. No, we have to think and act. That's what we're doing here, and that's what you have to do.
quotes.author: Elvia Alvarado

quotes.quote: Middle Age is that perplexing time of life when we hear two voices calling us, one saying, 'Why not?' and the other, 'Why bother?'
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: If there is no God, why bother to tell the truth? Why not steal?
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: I believe that when you're in love you have to pour your heart and soul out to your partner... or why bother? So in that sense I'm an incurable romantic when it comes to men.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.quote: School is practice for the future, and practice makes perfect and nobody's perfect so why bother.
quotes.author: Tre Cool

quotes.quote: I like working really fast. The best ideas are the first ones that come into your head - so why bother thinking of any more?
quotes.author: Charli XCX

quotes.quote: If winning isn't everything why bother to keep the score?
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: Actually I like working kind of fast, because if you got it, why bother doing it over and over?
quotes.author: Alan Cumming

quotes.quote: But, once you get a taste for shutting people up, it's hard to stop. Why bother winning the debate when it's easier to close it down?
quotes.author: Mark Steyn

quotes.quote: The more you learn, the more you know. The more you know, the more you forget. The more you forget, the less you know. So why bother to learn.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Why bother with Google when I have a wife who knows everything about everything!
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.quote: If I am thinking the same as everyone why bother pushing to get it published?
quotes.author: Chuck Eddy

quotes.quote: I wonder why bereaved people even bother with mourning clothes when the grief itself provides such an unmistakable wardrobe.
quotes.author: Jandy Nelson

quotes.quote: You don't do characters that are the same as you, otherwise why bother to act?
quotes.author: Tom Selleck

quotes.quote: I don’t regret not saying goodbye. Why bother when you’re a stranger?
quotes.author: Unknown Hunter

quotes.quote: You have to think anyway, so why not think big?
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Some people see things that are and ask, Why? Some people dream of things that never were and ask, Why not? Some people have to go to work and don't have time for all that.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: You see things; and you say 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Life's two most important questions are Why? and Why not? The trick is knowing which one to ask.
quotes.author: Gordon Livingston

quotes.quote: The common question that gets asked in business is, 'why?' That's a good question, but an equally valid question is, 'why not?
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Why not seize the pleasure at once, how often is happiness destroyed by preparation, foolish preparations.
quotes.author: Jane Austern

quotes.quote: Ten years from now you'll laugh at whatever's stressing you out today. So why not laugh now?
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: My life has always been unplanned. So when something comes along, I feel like, Why not give it a try? It's fun to experiment like that.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: In all my work, I try to say - 'You may be given a load of sour lemons, why not try to make a dozen lemon meringue pies?
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: There are those who look at things the way they are, and ask why... I dream of things that never were, and ask why not?
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.quote: Instead of Criticizing Someone's Success, Why Not Learn Something Valuable from It?
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: I may not know why, but I do know why not and this is where I stand.
quotes.author: J.R.Rim

quotes.quote: You find yourself refreshed by the presence of cheerful people. Why not make an honest effort to confer that pleasure on others? Half the battle is gained if you never allow yourself to say anything gloomy.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Someone ought to do it, but why should I? Someone ought to do it, so why not I? Between these two sentences lie whole centuries of moral evolution.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying about what people say of you, why not spend time trying to accomplish something they will admire.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Friend: We are here. Already here. Within. A train approaches a wall at a fatal rate of speed. You hold a switch in your hand, that accomplishes you know not what: do you throw it? Disaster is otherwise assured. It costs you nothing. Why not try?
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: Widowers marry again because it makes their lives easier. Widows often don't, because it makes their lives harder.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: I should say, one of the things about being a widow or a widower, you really, really need a sense of humor, because everything's going to fall apart.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: Widows are divided into two classes — the bereaved and relieved.
quotes.author: Victor Robinson

quotes.quote: A widow is a fascinating being with the flavor of maturity, the spice of experience, the piquancy of novelty, the tang of practiced coquetry, and the halo of one man's approval.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Rich widows are the only secondhand goods that sell at first-class prices.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is easier for a woman to be a good wife than a good mother. A widow has two duties with contrary obligations: she is a mother and she must exercise paternal authority. Few woman are strong enough to understand and to play this role.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It is better to be the widow of a hero than the wife of a coward.
quotes.author: Dolores Ibarruri

quotes.quote: The comfortable estate of widowhood is the only hope that keeps up a wife's spirits.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: I hosted a funeral today. He was my husband. I should be sad but I'm relieved. I was a wife of an alcoholic and now I'm a widow of a cancer patient.
quotes.author: Ilajna

quotes.quote: She is a left over then, she is a left over now. Transition from being a divorcee to a widow helped her earn some respect in the society.
quotes.author: Kazuya Gordo

quotes.quote: The real hero is the widow who garlands his photo frame with the same spirit that she showed while exchanging it on their wedding day..
quotes.author: Miwyanka

quotes.quote: Colourless clothes, colourless world, and colourful pictures. Widow's life.
quotes.author: Chahak Muryani

quotes.quote: Drying a widow's tears is one of the most dangerous occupations known to man.
quotes.author: DOROTHY DIX

quotes.quote: Widow is a harsh and hurtful word. It comes from the Sanskrit and it means empty. I have been empty too long.
quotes.author: Lynn Caine

quotes.quote: One can with dignity be wife and widow but once.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Widows are far better than brides. They don't tell, they won't yell, they don't swell, they rarely smell, and they're grateful as hell.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: A widow's refusal of a lover is seldom so explicit as to exclude hope.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: For many women, becoming a widow does not just mean the heartache of losing a husband, but often losing everything else as well.
quotes.author: Cherie Blair

quotes.quote: May a man live well-enough and long-enough, to leave many joyful widows behind him.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Nothing is respectfully amazing than a man who finds no shame to tell the world how grateful he is for all the love and sacrifices his woman made.
quotes.author: Himmilicious

quotes.quote: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Behind every successful man is a woman, behind her is his wife.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: My wife has a slight impediment in her speech. Every now and then she stops to breathe.
quotes.author: Jimmy Durante

quotes.quote: Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A wife is a gift bestowed upon man to reconcile him to the loss of paradise.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
quotes.author: Harold MacMillan

quotes.quote: One never realizes how different a husband and wife can be until they begin to pack for a trip.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: That is, the wife must care for what the husband cares for if he is to remain resolute.
quotes.author: Mother Jones

quotes.quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: If you would have a good wife, marry one who has been a good daughter.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: My spouse is my shield, my spouse is my strength.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: There is one thing more exasperating than a wife who can cook and won't, and that's a wife who can't cook and will.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A wife is the joy of a man's heart.
quotes.author: Talmud

quotes.quote: If you want your wife to listen to you, then talk to another woman; she will be all ears.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Nothing flatters a man as much as the happiness of his wife; he is always proud of himself as the source of it.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I have learned that only two things are necessary to keep one's wife happy. First, let her think she's having her own way. And second, let her have it.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: A faithful and loving wife is the jewel of a marriage.
quotes.author: Lamar Cole

quotes.quote: A woman who knows how to compose a soup or a salad that is perfectly harmonious in flavor ought to be clever at mixing together the sweet and harsh elements of a man's, and she will understand how to charm and keep forever her husband's heart and soul.
quotes.author: Berjane

quotes.quote: A man's wife has more power over him than the state has.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: A wife is like a children's movie; always under-appreciated and without either, life would be incomplete.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: There is no spectacle on earth more appealing than that of a beautiful woman in the act of cooking dinner for someone she loves.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: That's what a good wife does, keeps your dreams alive even when you don't believe anymore.
quotes.author: Michael J. Sullivan

quotes.quote: The best thing a girl can be is a good wife and mother. It is a girl's highest calling.
quotes.author: Nancy E. Turner

quotes.quote: When a wife has a good husband, it is easily seen on her face.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A wife is essential to great longevity; she is the receptacle of half a man's cares, and two-thirds of his ill-humor.
quotes.author: Charles Reade

quotes.quote: Wifi is the umbical cord of modern world.
quotes.author: Kammpan Sharma

quotes.quote: Relationship are like Wifi strong when connected weak if locked in passwords.
quotes.author: Anu Catz

quotes.quote: Faith is like WiFi. It is invisible but it has the power to connect you to what you need.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: God is like a WiFi, Jesus is the password and God's blessings is the data. Get the password and access the data on the Wifi.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: God's wifi connection makes us connected to heavenly world absolutely free of cost, luckily.
quotes.author: Archana Deep Singh

quotes.quote: Success is like WiFi. Found everywhere. Connected, if have a password called harwork.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A day without you is like a year without wifi.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In many parts of the world being able to download information on a smartphone tablet or laptop in a few seconds is the norm. In Silicon Valley wireless high-speed Internet connections are more ubiquitous than Starbucks.
quotes.author: Tae Yoo

quotes.quote: There is no Wifi in love yet it has the strongest connection.
quotes.author: Surya

quotes.quote: Solution are like Wifi they are available everywhere. It's you who gonna decide to Turn it on or off.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Wireless technology is creating entrepreneurship on a small scale that allows a single woman to set up a business in a small village or a single farmer or fisherman to access and disseminate market information in order to get the best price for their products.
quotes.author: Peggy Johnson

quotes.quote: Wireless is the largest information, communication, and technology platform in history, and mobile broadband is transforming how we can deliver educational materials and experiences to all students. The technology now exists to support learning on a massive scale and advance the 21st century skills needed to compete in the global economy.
quotes.author: Peggy Johnson

quotes.quote: To be happy in this world, first you need a cell phone and then you need an airplane. Then you're truly wireless.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: There's nothing special about wireless networks except that wireless capacity is sometimes less than what you can get, for example, from optical fiber.
quotes.author: Vint Cerf

quotes.quote: When wireless is fully applied the earth will be converted into a huge brain, capable of response in every one of its parts.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Wilderness is a necessity there must be places for human beings to satisfy their souls.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The wilderness is a place of an encounter with the creator.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: In the wilderness is the salvation of the world.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover will be yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: If wilderness is outlawed, only outlaws can save wilderness.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Many people go into the wilderness to experience it, and if they experience it in comfort, there's very little in a literary sense for them to write about.
quotes.author: Tim Cahill

quotes.quote: Wilderness without wildlife is just scenery.
quotes.author: Lois Crisler

quotes.quote: The wilderness provides an environment for a child's inner life to develop because it requires him to be constantly aware of his surroundings.
quotes.author: Leslie Stephen

quotes.quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Wilderness is harder and harder to find these days on this beautiful planet, and we're abusing our planet to the point of almost no return.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: One man practicing kindness in the wilderness is worth all the temples this world pulls.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: When it comes to wilderness animals we have to make an effort to preserve what areas we can that they can be themselves in. Its come to a point though, clearly, where some species have to be cared for by humans if they are not going to disappear altogether.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.quote: In truth wilderness is a state of mind and heart. Very little exists now in actuality.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Wilderness gave us knowledge. Wilderness made us human. We came from here. Perhaps that is why so many of us feel a strong bond to this land called serengeti; it is the land of our youth.
quotes.author: Boyd Norton

quotes.quote: The wilderness is a place that every believer has to experience to be molded for their divine purpose.
quotes.author: E'yen A. Gardner

quotes.quote: The reason we need wilderness is because we are really wild animals. Every man needs a place he can go, to go crazy in peace. Only then can we return to man's other life, to the other way, to the order and sanity and beauty of what will somewhere be, unless all visions are false, the human community.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The idea of wilderness needs no defense, it only needs defenders.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: In wilderness I sense the miracle of life, and behind it our scientific accomplishments fade to trivia.
quotes.author: Charles A. Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Wilderness touches the heart, mind and soul of each individual in a way known only to himself.
quotes.author: Michael Frome

quotes.quote: It is a real wilderness, and those who go there should not feel too safe.
quotes.author: Ursula K Le Guin

quotes.quote: Without wilderness, we will eventually lose the capacity to understand America. Our drive, our ruggedness, our unquenchable optimism and zeal and Ã©lan go back to the challenges of the untrammeled wilderness.
quotes.author: Harvey Broome

quotes.quote: The farther one gets into the wilderness, the greater is the attraction of its lonely freedom.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A definition is the enclosing a wilderness of idea within a wall of words.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: You may feel like a voice in the wilderness, but it is your voice we are waiting to hear...you are the determining factor.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: In the wilderness, we experience the faithfulness of God.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Love of wilderness is more than a hunger for what is always beyond reach. It is also an expression of loyalty to the earth, the earth which bore us and sustains us, the only home we shall ever know, the only paradise we ever need if only we had the eyes to see.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The wilderness holds answers to questions man has not yet learned to ask.
quotes.author: Nancy Newhall

quotes.quote: Wildness is the preservation of the world.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The wildlife and its habitat cannot speak, so we must and we will.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Managing wildlife? It's wild! It don't need managing, leave it alone.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: Wildlife is decreasing in the jungles, but it is increasing in the towns.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Wildlife is something which man cannot construct. Once it is gone, it is gone forever. Man can rebuild a pyramid, but he can't rebuild ecology, or a giraffe.
quotes.author: Joy Adamson

quotes.quote: If you can reach out and touch and love and be with wildlife, you will forever be changed, and you will want to make the world a better place. Terri Irwin
quotes.author: Terri Irwin

quotes.quote: The rules of wildlife are simple and clear, which is not the case for men.
quotes.author: Laurent Baheux

quotes.quote: If we can teach people about wildlife, they will be touched. Share my wildlife with me. Because humans want to save things that they love.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.quote: Each species is a masterpiece, a creation assembled with extreme care and genius.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: To observe the wild animals in the natural settings one have to become wild to achieve specific goal.
quotes.author: Muhammad Awais

quotes.quote: Seeing wildlife is like seeing celebrities, only better.
quotes.author: Tanja Andrews

quotes.quote: Born a wildlife warrior, die a wildlife warrior.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.quote: A peculiar virtue in wildlife ethics is that the hunter ordinarily has no gallery to applaud or disapprove of his conduct
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Eating wildlife is probably not the smartest thing that we can do in terms of maintaining the integrity of natural systems.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: When wildlife damages agriculture we eliminate the wildlife. Rather we should eliminate agriculture when it damages wildlife.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: Wildlife needs wilderness-not just to survive, but also to live freely. Sadly, many species struggle to survive due to increased human activity and expansion into habitats they call home.
quotes.author: Zoe Helene

quotes.quote: Whenever we encounter wild animals in nature, we must only ever show kindness and compassion.
quotes.author: Paul Oxton

quotes.quote: There is just something spectacular about seeing wildlife in its natural environment that thrills us and helps us better understand the exotic cats in our care.
quotes.author: Arun Kejriwal

quotes.quote: Our lifestyle, our wildlife, our land and our water remain critical to our definition of Wyoming and to our economic future.
quotes.author: Dave Freudenthal

quotes.quote: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: Will minus intellect constitutes vulgarity.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Will power defeats all powers.
quotes.author: Aftab Alam

quotes.quote: Will is not unfrequently weakness.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Will is the dynamic soul-force.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: Will is intention favored by emotions.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: A man's measure is his will.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Will is wish, and liberty is power.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Your will shall decide your destiny.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The will to act is a renewable resource.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: The will must be stronger than the skill.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Willpower is steam for life's locomotion.
quotes.author: Praveen Kumar

quotes.quote: Collective will supplants individual whim.
quotes.author: Samuel P. Huntington

quotes.quote: Will localizes us; thought universalizes us.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Willful blindness sees no end of damage done.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Will is to grace as the horse is to the rider.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The strength of will is the grace of survival.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Free will is to mind what chance is to matter.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: When the will is ready the feet are light.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The will of the world is never the will of God.
quotes.author: William Hamilton

quotes.quote: Will cannot be quenched against its will.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: The will of man is the will of God.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: A man of God in the will of God is immortal until His work is done.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: Do what you will, only do something.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: The will of the people is the best law.
quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.quote: To love is to will the good of the other.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Willpower is nothing but willingness to do.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Destiny is our will, and our will is nature.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If there is a good will, there is great way.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Willingly no one chooses the yoke of slavery.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Willpower is steam for life's locomotion.
quotes.author: Praveen Kumar

quotes.quote: The forthputting of willpower is a means of strengthening willpower. The will becomes strong by exercise. To stick to a thing till you are master is a test of intellectual discipline and power.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: A willing spirit, a determined effort.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: For a great willpower, no road has length!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It's just a matter of willpower. The day you decide it's over, it's over. You never get over it.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: In todays world, you need to have courage and strong willpower to make things happen.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Most of life's actions are within our reach, but decisions take willpower.
quotes.author: Robert McKee

quotes.quote: You must be willing, determined and persistent to achieve your goals.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The concept of fate is an open insult against man's willpower!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Willpower is nothing but willingness to do.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Willpower is the shortest shortcut to success.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a great talent without great will power.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Will power is to the mind like a strong blind man who carries on his shoulders a lame man who can see.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: It's amazing how willpower can build walls.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Willpower is essential to the accomplishment of anything worthwhile.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Will and intellect are one and the same.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: People do not lack strength; they lack will.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: In the absence of willpower the most complete collection of virtues and talents is wholly worthless.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Freedom is will-power to define my path.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A man can do all things if he but wills them.
quotes.author: Leon Battista Alberti

quotes.quote: Next to courage, willpower is the most important thing in politics.
quotes.author: Paul Johnson

quotes.quote: If freedom is short of weapons, we must compensate with willpower.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: The will is your most important asset. If you lose it, you have lost everything.
quotes.author: Dele Ayo Bankole

quotes.quote: I have discovered in life that there are ways of getting almost anywhere you want to go, if you really want to go.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: You don't find will power, you create it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Our tendency is to be strong, self-sufficient, and dependent on our own willpower, but rather than try harder, we should reach out to the God who is all powerful.
quotes.author: John Townsend

quotes.quote: Once you reach the brink of your will power, you have two options either give up, or keep going. That decision decides whether you'll reach your goal.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Willpower isn't just a skill. It's a muscle, like the muscles in your arms or legs, and it gets tired as it works harder, so there's less power left over for other things.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: When people have a willpower failure, it's because they haven't anticipated a situation that's going to come along.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: the wind is scary during a tornado or in life in general...never know when a gust is going to come in your direction and change everything.
quotes.author: David Walsh

quotes.quote: A light wind swept over the corn, and all nature laughed in the sunshine.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: The wind shows us how close to the edge we are.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: The wind whispered secrets in its own incomprehensible language.
quotes.author: Tracy Rees

quotes.quote: I hear the howl of the wind that brings the long drear storm on its heavy wings.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: The wind is us it gathers and remembers all our voices, then sends them talking and telling through the leaves and the fields.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: You find out the strength of a wind by trying to walk against it, not by lying down.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The morning wind spreads its fresh smell. We must get up and take that in, that wind that lets us live. Breathe before it's gone.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The winds that never moderation knew, Afraid to blow too much, too faintly blew; Or out of breath with joy, could not enlarge Their straighten'd lungs or conscious of their charge.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: I hear the wind among the trees Playing the celestial symphonies; I see the branches downward bent, Like keys of some great instrument.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The wind blows on us all, but it's how you set your sail that makes the difference.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The winds of grace are always blowing, but you have to raise the sail.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: The wind makes you ache is some place that is deeper than your bones. It may be that it touches something old in the human soul, a chord of race memory that says Migrate or die - migrate or die.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Wind feeds the fire, and wind extinguishes: The flames are nourished by a gentle breeze, Yet, if it stronger grows, they sink and die.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The rain came down upon my head unshelter'd. And the wind rendered me mad and deaf and blind.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: If the winds of fortune are temporarily blowing against you, remember that you can harness them and make them carry you toward your definite purpose, through the use of your imagination.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The wind plays its own music.
quotes.author: Bert McCoy

quotes.quote: When the wind is blowing and the sleet or rain is driving against the dark windows, I love to sit by the fire, thinking of what I have read in books of voyage and travel.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: It is the set of the sails, not the direction of the wind that determines which way we will go.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Listen! the wind is rising, and the air is wild with leaves, we have had our summer evenings, now for October eves!
quotes.author: Humbert Wolfe

quotes.quote: The very winds whispered in soothing accents, and maternal Nature bade me weep no more.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: The cool wind blew in my face and all at once I felt as if I had shed dullness from myself. Before me lay a long gray line with a black mark down the center. The birds were singing. It was spring.
quotes.author: Burl Ives

quotes.quote: There are many winds full of anger, and lust and greed. They move the rubbish around, but the solid mountain of our true nature stays where it's always been.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Wherever wind visits, there it freshens the air; wherever wisdom visits, there it freshens the mind!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Every wind is fare when we are flying from misfortune.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Wind is what happens when air falls in love with itself.
quotes.author: Barry Webster

quotes.quote: If the wind rises it can push us against the flood when it comes.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A strong wind was blowing and it felt really very cold and seemed so unfamiliar and bizarre. But the trees remembered me. They bowed gently in the breez and called me nearer, welcoming me.
quotes.author: Debalina Haldar

quotes.quote: A great wind is blowing, and that gives you either imagination or a headache.
quotes.author: Catherine the Great

quotes.quote: A wind has blown the rain away and blown the sky away and all the leaves away, and the trees stand. I think, I too, have known autumn too long.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Are windmills always this beautiful? I asked me. Me replied, 'Not if it is grey and windy, and you are tied to one of it's blades!
quotes.author: Prachi Blue

quotes.quote: There are, indeed, few merrier spectacles than that of many windmills bickering together in a fresh breeze over a woody country; their halting alacrity of movement, their pleasant business, making bread all day with uncouth gesticulation; their air, gigantically human, as of a creature half alive, put a spirit of romance into the tamest landscape.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: An unfree mind is like a windmill inside a bell jar.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When the wind of change blows, some people build walls, some build windmills.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A windmill is eternally at work to accomplish one end, although it shifts with every variation of the weathercock, and assums ten different positions in a day.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Wind blows. You can set a wall against it, you can build up a windmill. The choice is yours.
quotes.author: Russ

quotes.quote: Love is that to life, what wind is to a windmill.
quotes.author: Kazi Shams

quotes.quote: Windmill or no windmill, he said life would go on as it has always gone on—that is, badly.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Windmills, which are used in the great plains of Holland and North Germany to supply the want of falling water, afford another instance of the action of velocity. The sails are driven by air in motion - by wind.
quotes.author: Hermann von Helmholtz

quotes.quote: There are times when each of us has to have some gumption to take a stand as to what we wish to preserve or change in order to maintain our self-respect and not be as 'a reed shaken with the wind' (Matt. 11:7) . . . . We lose much credibility and strength, and we risk being weighed on an uneven balance, when, Don Quixote-like, we go around 'tilting windmills.'
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Those who believe that we have reached the limit of business progress and employment opportunity in this country are like the farmer who had two windmills and pulled one down because he was afraid there was not enough wind for both.
quotes.author: morris s.tremaine

quotes.quote: If the windmill should prove too formidable, said he, from the threshold, I may see what can be done with the wind.
quotes.author: Rafael Sabatini

quotes.quote: There isn't a single windmill owner in Holland who doesn't have a second job, for when there is no wind.
quotes.author: Johnny Ball

quotes.quote: Pray, look better, sir... those things yonder are no giants, but windmills.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: The slope takes you to the windmill, but effort takes you nowhere.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: I had rather live with cheese and garlic in a windmill.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You cannot make a windmill go with a pair of bellows.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Tilting at windmills hurts you more than the windmills.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: I knew that one day I would come to this point that I would make something so outrageous and so ambitious that... it'd be that Don Quixote feeling, that I'd have to tilt at a windmill. Sometimes you've got to do it. That's the only way you can do things.
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.quote: If one day I look out from my cabin's porch and see a row of windmills spinning in the distance, I won't curse them. I will praise them. It will mean we are finally getting somewhere.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: You know what happens when windmills collapse into the sea? A splash.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: I don't take on a fight just for a fight. I don't tilt at windmills.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.quote: My best advice: win little battles. Get in the habit of winning, of shipping, of having customers that can't live without you. Once you've demonstrated you know how to do the art, then go after the windmills.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Windmills, remember, if you fight with them... may swing round their huge arms and cast you down into the mire!
quotes.author: Edmond Rostand

quotes.quote: We used to have two windmills at our place back home. We had to tear one of 'em down - there wasn't enough wind to turn 'em both.
quotes.author: Max Evans

quotes.quote: Our windmill was ruined. Our spirits were at their lowest. But, Napoleon seemed... triumphant.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Why don't you ever fly through the windmill again? That's a sure crowd pleaser.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: I'm flopping around like a windmill and he barely scratched me. Better avoid a direct hit.
quotes.author: Hiroshi Hashimoto

quotes.quote: Mini-golf is a lot like life. It can be difficult. It can be rewarding. And there are windmills.
quotes.author: Charles Wachter

quotes.quote: If I'm mad, Willie, and everyone seems to think I am, then I've the right to tilt at the odd windmill or two.
quotes.author: Ian Mackintosh

quotes.quote: You have the nicest window, you know? None of the others can even compete. It's not flashy like the others, or bleary—your window gives off this nice, quiet light.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: The windows of the houses – even if the house is ramshackle – are always beautiful because windows represent light!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The window of opportunity opens and closes as fast as a camera's shutter.
quotes.author: Warren Criswell

quotes.quote: If you want the people to understand you, invite them to your life and let them see the world from your window!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: All the windows of my heart I open to the day.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: There is a window from one heart to another heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The windows of my soul I throw wide open to the sun.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Open the window of your mind. Allow the fresh air, new lights and new truths to enter.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Enlarge your windows till you get a window where you can see the whole universe with one look!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: My favorite journey is looking out the window.
quotes.author: Edward Gorey

quotes.quote: A breeze, a forgotten summer, a smile, all can fit into a storefront window.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Set wide the window. Let me drink the day.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: It is not possible for a house to own a spirit without owning windows with flowers!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Throw open your window and let the scenery of clouds and sky enter your room!
quotes.author: Yosa Buson

quotes.quote: The window of her sadness was so vast that it almost opened a path to her soul.
quotes.author: Ondjaki

quotes.quote: I feel that it is healthier to look out at the world through a window than through a mirror. Otherwise, all you see is yourself and whatever is behind you.
quotes.author: Bill Withers

quotes.quote: When I look out my window / Many sights to see / And when I look in my window / So many different people to be / That it's strange, so strange.
quotes.author: Donovan

quotes.quote: I let fall the windows of mine eyes.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Your eyes are windows to your dreams; Your ears are windows to your mind; You nose is the door to your heart you can win over any man with just your smell.
quotes.author: Siddharth Katragadda

quotes.quote: The windows of my soul are made of one way glass, don't bother looking into my eyes If there's something you want to know just ask.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: I removed the window because, while I used to spend all my time looking out through windows wishing to be outside, I now live there all the time.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: A window covered with raindrops interests me more than a photograph of a famous person.
quotes.author: Saul Leiter

quotes.quote: Better keep yourself clean and bright; you are the window through which you must see the world.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: In my head there are several windows, that I do know, but perhaps it is always the same one, open variously on the parading universe.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: We are all prisoners but some of us are in cells with windows and some without.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: From the same window, you keep seeing the same view!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Don't waste a minute not being happy. If one window closes, run to the next window or break down a door.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: If it's reality you want, I suggest you look out the window.
quotes.author: Peter Stamm

quotes.quote: Rich windows that exclude the light, And passages that lead to nothing.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Wine is bottled poetry.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Beer is made by men, wine by God.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Wine is the most healthful and most hygienic of beverages.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: I like on the table,when we're speaking,the light of a bottleof intelligent wine.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Aw I don't wanta go to no such thing, I just wanta drink in alleys.'...But you'll miss all that, just for some old wine.'There's wisdom in wine, goddam it!' I yelled. 'Have a shot!'
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: In wine, there's truth.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: There are thousands of wines that can take over our minds. Don't think all ecstasies are the same!
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: [I]t is the wine that leads me on,the wild winethat sets the wisest man to singat the top of his lungs,laugh like a fool _ it drives theman to dancing... it eventempts him to blurt out storiesbetter never told.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: This is one of the disadvantages of wine, it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Wine makes all things possible.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Wine makes every meal an occasion, every table more elegant, every day more civilized.
quotes.author: Andre Simon

quotes.quote: Wine is like the incarnation--it is both divine and human
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: A bottle of wine begs to be shared; I have never met a miserly wine lover.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: White wine is like electricity. Red wine looks and tastes like a liquified beefsteak.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Great wine works wonders and is itself one
quotes.author: Edward Steinberg

quotes.quote: WINE! Because these problems aren't going to forget themselves!
quotes.author: Comic Strip Mama

quotes.quote: A German wine label is one of the things life's too short for.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: O, wine!, the truth-serum so potent that all those who wish to live happy lives should abstain from drinking it entirely!... except of course when they are alone.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: Wine is just a conversation waiting to happen.
quotes.author: Jessica Altieri

quotes.quote: Wine is one of the most complex of all beverages: the fruit of a soil, climate, and vintage, digested by a fungus through a process guided by the culture, vision, and skill of an individual man or woman.
quotes.author: Neel Burton

quotes.quote: Wine is a gateway drug to environmentalism.
quotes.author: Katherine Cole

quotes.quote: It is not the wine that makes us drunk, but the one who brings it and fills the glass.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Life is too short to drink bad wine
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Either give me more wine or leave me alone.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Wine is one of the most civilized things in the world and one of the most natural things of the world that has been brought to the greatest perfection, and it offers a greater range for enjoyment and appreciation than, possibly, any other purely sensory thing.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: If we sip the wine, we find dreams coming upon us out of the imminent night
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: This is one of the disadvantages of wine; it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: To take wine into our mouths is to savor a droplet of the river of human history.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: From wine what sudden friendship springs!
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Of all my accomplishments I may have achieved during the war, I am proudest of the fact that I never lost a wing man.
quotes.author: Colonel Erich Hartmann

quotes.quote: The man who enters combat encased in solid armor plate, but lacking the essential of self-confidence, is far more exposed and naked to death than the individual who subjects himself to battle shorn of any protection but his own skill, his own belief in himself and in his wing men. Righteousness is necessary for one's peace of mind, perhaps, but it is a poor substitute for agility with a thunderbolt and a resolution to meet the enemy under any conditions and against any odds.
quotes.author: Robert S. Johnson

quotes.quote: I feel the need, the need for speed.
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.quote: Mr. Green Sweater looks normal, but his wing man looks hard-core bad boy,” said Vee. “Emits a certain don’t-mess-with-me signal. Tell me he doesn’t look like Dracula’s spawn. Tell me I’m imagining things.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: Lynn looks up at him to see if he's serious. "What?" he asks her. "If anybody is gonna put Carter's head through the wall, it should be me." EJ eyes snap open, and he scoots away from me slowly. I'll remember this, Wing man!
quotes.author: Brent Crawford

quotes.quote: Strength and skill are happy comrades.
quotes.author: Maud Lindsay

quotes.quote: A trusty comrade is always of use; and a chronicler still more so.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: An utterly fearless man is a far more dangerous comrade than a coward.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Colleagues share food. Wingmen share fate.
quotes.author: Indian Air Force advert

quotes.quote: Success and failure. We think of them as opposites, but they're really not. They're companions - the hero and the sidekick.
quotes.author: Laurence Shames

quotes.quote: It was my view that no kill was worth the life of a wingman. . . . Pilots in my unit who lost wingmen on this basis were prohibited from leading a [section]. The were made to fly as wingman, instead.
quotes.author: Erich Hartmann

quotes.quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Our words have wings, but fly not where we would.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Wings are not only for birds; they are also for minds. Human potential stops at some point somewhere beyond infinity.
quotes.author: Toller Cranston

quotes.quote: The wings of transformation are born of patience and struggle.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Our wings are small but the ripples of the heart are infinite.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: You cannot fly like an eagle with the wings of a wren.
quotes.author: William Henry Hudson

quotes.quote: Even angels must find their wings too heavy sometimes.
quotes.author: Helen Van Slyke

quotes.quote: Birds have wings; they're free; they can fly where they want when they want. They have the kind of mobility many people envy.
quotes.author: Roger Tory Peterson

quotes.quote: Go to the edge of the cliff and jump off. Build your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Carry your wings of hope so high in the sky that there is no room left for disappointments.
quotes.author: Heenashree Khandelwal

quotes.quote: His wings were failing, but he refused to fall without a struggle.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr

quotes.quote: A broken wing simply means, you have to find another way to fly. Have a wonderful day people.
quotes.author: Kerry Katona

quotes.quote: Spread your wings of love and fly in someone's sky of dream and imagination.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: We all have wings, but they have not been of any avail to us and if we could tear them off, we would do so.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Wings are freedom only when they are wide open in flight. On one's back they are a heavy weight.
quotes.author: Marina Tsvetaeva

quotes.quote: The reason birds can fly and we can't is simply because they have perfect faith, for to have faith is to have wings.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: With wings, the space between the lines is less,We had to run so much while on the defensive that we came up short offensively.
quotes.author: Patrick Kluivert

quotes.quote: When the stormy winds of life threaten to knock you down, may you have the courage to spread your wings and fly!
quotes.author: Lance Wubbels

quotes.quote: No bird can fly without opening its wings, and no one can love without exposing their hearts.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: Wings are like dreams. Before each flight, a bird takes a small jump, a leap of faith, believing that its wings will work. That jump can only be made with rock solid feet.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: We were all born with wings. In times of doubt: spread them.
quotes.author: Kevin Myers

quotes.quote: A bird does not fly because it has wings; it has wings because it flies.
quotes.author: Robert Ardrey

quotes.quote: Wings was a blessing, but it was also very difficult. Whenever you do situation comedy, no matter how excellent the execution and we had a great cast and great writers but the format is somewhat limited.
quotes.author: Tim Daly

quotes.quote: Wings are a constraint that makes it possible to fly.
quotes.author: Robert Bringhurst

quotes.quote: You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Flying without feathers is not easy; my wings have no feathers.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Keep up your faith to go high and fly, even after so many pains and sorrow. You can turn from a caterpillar to a butterfly. Life gives you a second change: a call to grow.
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.quote: Until you spread your wings, you'll have no idea how far you can fly.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: You learn how to be a gracious winner and an outstanding loser.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.quote: There are always new, grander challenges to confront, and a true winner will embrace each one.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: My teacher once told me. No one is perfect that is why pencils have erasers.
quotes.author: Mahesh Bhatt

quotes.quote: A winner is someone who recognizes his God-given talents, works his tail off to develop them into skills, and uses these skills to accomplish his goals
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Lucky people get opportunities; brave people create opportunities; and winners are those that convert problems into opportunities.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's not whether you win or lose, it's how you play the game.
quotes.author: Grantland Rice

quotes.quote: I'm a winner, I play to win, I want to make good things go on around me.
quotes.author: David Ortiz

quotes.quote: Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.quote: A champion needs a motivation above and beyond winning.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Winners are naturally bullish.
quotes.author: Merrill Lynch

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi Jr.

quotes.quote: If you want to find the real competition, just look in the mirror. After awhile you'll see your rivals scrambling for second place.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It's easy to win. Anybody can win.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: You can't be a winner and be afraid to lose.
quotes.author: Charles Lynch

quotes.quote: When you win, say nothing. When you lose, say less.
quotes.author: Paul Brown

quotes.quote: Winning is the most important thing in my life, after breathing. Breathing first, winning next.
quotes.author: George Steinbrenner

quotes.quote: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: A winner never stops trying.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: Winners know they are not perpect. They respect their weaknesses while making the most of their strenghts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you aren't getting rejected on a daily basis, then your goals aren't ambitious enough.
quotes.author: Chris Dixon

quotes.quote: Show me a gracious loser and I'll show you a failure.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: If you even dream of beating me, you'd better wake up and apologize
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: It's easy to have faith in yourself and have discipline when you're a winner, when you're number one. What you got to have is faith and discipline when you're not a winner.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Losing feels worse than winning feels good.
quotes.author: Vin Scully

quotes.quote: The key is not the will to win everybody has that. It is the will to prepare to win that is important.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Winning starts with beginning.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Winning is not everything,but the effort to win is.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Winning is a state of mind that embraces everything you do.
quotes.author: Bryce Courtenay

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, but losing is nothing.
quotes.author: Red Symons

quotes.quote: Winning isn't getting ahead of others. It's getting ahead of yourself.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: Don't believe that winning is really everything. It's more important to stand for something. If you don't stand for something, what do you win
quotes.author: Lane Kirkland

quotes.quote: Winning is everything. The only ones who remember you when you come second are your wife and your dog.
quotes.author: Damon Hill

quotes.quote: Winning means being unafraid to lose.
quotes.author: Fran Tarkenton

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything. It's the only thing.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Winning is only half of it. Having fun winning is the other half.
quotes.author: Bum Phillips

quotes.quote: Winning may not be everything, but losing has little to recommend it.
quotes.author: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.quote: We count on winning. And if we lose, don't beef. And the best way to prevent beefing is - don't lose.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: The key to winning is poise under stress.
quotes.author: Paul Brown

quotes.quote: Winning is nice if you don't lose your integrity in the process.
quotes.author: Arnold Horshak

quotes.quote: Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, but it beats anything that comes in second.
quotes.author: Paul Bryant

quotes.quote: Winning doesn't always mean being first. Winning means you're doing better than you've ever done before.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.quote: Winning is all in the attitude!
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Winning is a habit.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: Winning is like shaving - you do it every day or you wind up looking like a bum.
quotes.author: Jack Kemp

quotes.quote: Winning is the most important thing in my life, after breathing. Breathing first, winning next.
quotes.author: George Steinbrenner

quotes.quote: Winning is really about the DECISIONS you make and the ACTIONS you take as you play the game!
quotes.author: Billy Cox

quotes.quote: Winning tastes good.
quotes.author: Jean Claude Killy

quotes.quote: Winning becomes easier over time as the cornerstones of confidence become habits.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: The hardest thing about winning is trying to do so without losing something of greater importance.
quotes.author: PETE ABRAMS

quotes.quote: Winning is not a sometime thing; It's an all the time thing. You don't win once in a while; you don't do things right once in a while; you do them right all the time.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Winning is the science of being totally prepared.
quotes.author: George Allen

quotes.quote: The art of winning in business is in working hard - not taking things too seriously.
quotes.author: Albert Green Hubbard

quotes.quote: If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: When it comes to winning, you need the skill and the will.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: No winter lasts forever; no spring skips its turn.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: If Winter comes, can Spring be far behind?
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Let us love winter, for it is the spring of genius.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: The winter solstice has always been special to me as a barren darkness that gives birth to a verdant future beyond imagination, a time of pain and withdrawal that produces something joyfully inconceivable, like a monarch butterfly masterfully extracting itself from the confines of its cocoon, bursting forth into unexpected glory.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Winter is the time for comfort, for good food and warmth, for the touch of a friendly hand and for a talk beside the fire: it is the time for home.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: The heart can get really cold if all you've known is winter.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Saenz

quotes.quote: Winter is not a season, it's a celebration.
quotes.author: Anamika Mishra

quotes.quote: He who marvels at the beauty of the world in summer will find equal cause for wonder and admiration in winter.... In winter the stars seem to have rekindled their fires, the moon achieves a fuller triumph, and the heavens wear a look of a more exalted simplicity.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Nature looks dead in winter because her life is gathered into her heart. She withers the plant down to the root that she may grow it up again fairer and stronger. She calls her family together within her inmost home to prepare them for being scattered abroad upon the face of the earth.
quotes.author: Hugh Macmillan

quotes.quote: There is a privacy about it which no other season gives you.... In spring, summer and fall people sort of have an open season on each other; only in the winter, in the country, can you have longer, quiet stretches when you can savor belonging to yourself.
quotes.author: Ruth Stout

quotes.quote: I prefer winter and Fall, when you feel the bone structure of the landscape - the loneliness of it, the dead feeling of winter. Something waits beneath it, the whole story doesn't show.
quotes.author: Andrew Wyeth

quotes.quote: Every mile is two in winter.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Winter bites with its teeth or lashes with its tail.
quotes.author: Montenegrin Proverb

quotes.quote: Spring, summer, and fall fill us with hope; winter alone reminds us of the human condition.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: How many lessons of faith and beauty we should lose, if there were no winter in our year!
quotes.author: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quotes.quote: Many human beings say that they enjoy the winter, but what they really enjoy is feeling proof against it.
quotes.author: Richard Adams

quotes.quote: Welcome, winter. Your late dawns and chilled breath make me lazy, but I love you nonetheless.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Winter forms our character and brings out our best.
quotes.author: Tom Allen

quotes.quote: Perhaps I am a bear, or some hibernating animal underneath, for the instinct to be half asleep all winter is so strong in me.
quotes.author: Anne Morrough Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Winter is on my head, but eternal spring is in my heart.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The color of springtime is in the flowers; the color of winter is in the imagination.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Winter, a lingering season, is a time to gather golden moments, embark upon a sentimental journey, and enjoy every idle hour.
quotes.author: John Boswell

quotes.quote: In a way Winter is the real Spring - the time when the inner things happen, the resurgence of nature.
quotes.author: Edna O'Brien

quotes.quote: Winter is the time of promise because there is so little to do - or because you can now and then permit yourself the luxury of thinking so.
quotes.author: Stanley Crawford

quotes.quote: In seed time learn, in harvest teach, in winter enjoy.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: I like these cold, gray winter days. Days like these let you savor a bad mood.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Blow, blow, thou winter wind, thou art not so unkind as man's ingratitude.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Common sense is genius dressed in its working clothes.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Deal with the faults of others as gently as your own.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Justice is truth in action.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: A new broom sweeps clean but an old broom knows the corners.
quotes.author: Virgin Islander (on friendship)

quotes.quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and he'll eat forever.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Silence is often misinterpreted but never misquoted.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The wise understand by themselves; fools follow the reports of others.
quotes.author: Tibetan (on wisdom)

quotes.quote: When our imperfect judgments are aggregated in the right way, our collective intelligence is often excellent.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: The goal of human nature, of any nature is blessedness. If we do not reach this goal, it is a sign that we are headed in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Raimon Pannikar

quotes.quote: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: One should speak little with others and much with oneself.
quotes.author: Danish (on the conduct of life)

quotes.quote: When you say one thing, the clever person understands three.
quotes.author: Chinese (on wisdom)

quotes.quote: The riches that are in the heart cannot be stolen.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: The only thing we can know is that we know nothing and that is the highest flight of human wisdom.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy
