quotes.quote: The young man knows the rules, but the old man knows the exceptions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Plan your life like you will live forever, and live your life like you will die the next day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Proverbs are short sentences drawn from long experience.
quotes.author: Cervantes

quotes.quote: Desires are brought to live depending on one’s wisdom. Wisdom gives direction to desires.
quotes.author: Takuan Soho

quotes.quote: Wisdom is ofttimes nearer when we stoop than when we soar.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: A proverb is one man's wit and all men's wisdom.
quotes.author: Lord John Russell

quotes.quote: A blind person who sees is better than a seeing person who is blind.
quotes.author: Iranian (on wisdom)

quotes.quote: A proverb is a short sentence based on long experience.
quotes.author: American (on proverbs)

quotes.quote: Economy is the wealth of the poor and the wisdom of the rich.
quotes.author: French (on thrift)

quotes.quote: Even a fish wouldn't get into trouble if it kept its mouth shut.
quotes.author: Korean (on common sense)

quotes.quote: He that respects himself is safe from others.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: He who flees at the right time can fight again.
quotes.author: Marcus Trentius Varro

quotes.quote: A crown's no cure for a headache.
quotes.author: English (on basic truths)

quotes.quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Hope and wishes for all that delights will sour in the midst of action not taken and words unsaid.
quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

quotes.quote: You should never wish for wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Rachel Cohn

quotes.quote: Plenty of people wish to become devout, but no one wishes to be humble.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: We all have dreams and wishes. The difference is that dreams are there for you to do something with they are a component of hope for with out a dream there is no hope. A wish, however, is simply a desire to have something without doing anything to accomplish it.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We can imprison ourselves with our wants, wishes, and false dreams.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: If wishes were fishes we'd all be throwing nets. If wishes were horses we'd all ride.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: Wishes and wants do not transform a person; actions and reactions do so! Show the world your plans by the actions you take progressively and consistently.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The wishes of an honest man do not stretch beyond what he undoubtedly deserves.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Wishes, like castles in the air, are inexpensive and not taxable.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: A gentleman wishes to be slow to speak and quick to act.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.
quotes.author: Sally Nicholls

quotes.quote: No wise man ever wished to be younger.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Larry Elder

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to wish for what you really want in life. Wishes are possible manifestation of thoughts.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Wishes, like painted landscapes, best delight, Whilst distance recommends them to the sight. Plac'd afar off, they beautiful appear: But show their coarse and nauseous colors near.
quotes.author: Thomas Yalden

quotes.quote: Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Nothing is so common place as to wish to be remarkable.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We often confuse what we wish for with what is.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: What one wishes is to be touched by truth and to be able to interpret that truth so that one may use what one is feeling and experiencing, be it despair or joy, in a way that will add meaning to one's life and will hopefully touch others as well.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: If the wishes came true, they came true in terrible ways. Wishes were dangerous things. That was the idea you got from fairy tales.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: There would be a time, when you will ask for nothing but life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: When wishes are few, the heart is happy. When craving ends, there is peace.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Hopes, wants and wishes, all cast across the night sky with my heart in tow.
quotes.author: Jay Long

quotes.quote: Rather than wishing for change, you first must be prepared to change.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Wishes are sometimes just stories that have nowhere to go.
quotes.author: Yvette Christians

quotes.quote: A necessary skill for achieving that which you desire in your life is the ability to give the task at hand that one last go around.
quotes.author: Josh Hinds

quotes.quote: Wishes don't bring riches; work make things work.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Wishful thinking is not idealism. It is self-indulgence at best and self-exaltation at worst. In either case, it is usually at the expense of others. In other words, it is the opposite of idealism.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: It had been wishful thinking, plain and simple, dangerous for me to indulge in. Hope, happiness and freedom were not in my future.
quotes.author: Maria V. Snyder

quotes.quote: The act of speaking our intentions aloud shifts them from wishful thinking into action.
quotes.author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg

quotes.quote: A goal without real consequences is wishful thinking. Good follow-through doesn't depend on the right intentions. It depends on the right incentives.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Writing what you wished was the most dangerous form of wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: Never act upon wishful thinking. Act without checking the facts, and chances are that you will be swept away along with the mob.
quotes.author: Jim Rogers

quotes.quote: Wishful thinking gives false gods to people who hunger for gods, but those who yearn for a world with no gods are no less likely to fall victim to their own wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Stop the habit of wishful thinking and start the habit of thoughtful wishes.
quotes.author: Mary Martin

quotes.quote: If something is true, no amount of wishful thinking will change it.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: It isn't common sense that is paramount in this world, it's wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: Where there is life there is wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Gerald F. Lieberman

quotes.quote: There is a great deal of wishful thinking in such cases it is the easiest thing of all to deceive ones self.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: People get into the habit of entrusting the things they desire to wishful thinking, and subjecting things they don't desire to exhaustive thinking.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: To me, you can be young in your mind, in the way you think, but if your body don't come with that, then it's wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Bernard Hopkins

quotes.quote: With the first drink comes the truth, with the second drink comes wishful thinking, and with the third drink come the lies
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Unplanned process improvement is wishful thinking.
quotes.author: Watts Humphrey

quotes.quote: Maybe this is wishful thinking, Probably mindless dreaming but if we loved again, I swear I'd love you right,
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Faith is not by wishful thinking, it is what takes root in the heart and shows in one's actions.
quotes.author: Sayyid Qutb

quotes.quote: If you have a dream of writing, that's wishful thinking. If you have a commitment to writing, that's the way to make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Nancy Pickard

quotes.quote: While wishing and hoping makes you a dreamer, acting and doing makes you someone who can turn dreams into reality.
quotes.author: Nan S. Russell

quotes.quote: Wishing does not make a poor man rich.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Great minds have purposes, others have wishes.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: A man will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body - the wishbone.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A wish is a desire without an attempt.
quotes.author: Farmer Digest

quotes.quote: Wishing consumes as much energy as planning.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water. Don't let yourself indulge in vain wishes.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Many of us spend half of our time wishing for things we could have if we didn't spend half our time wishing.
quotes.author: Alexander Woollcott

quotes.quote: Wishes won't wash dishes.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Work while others are wishing.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: If wishes were horses beggars would ride.
quotes.author: Joanne Harris

quotes.quote: The wishing gate opens into nothing.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Wishing of all strategies, is the worst.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: Work will win when wishy washy wishing won't.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: To a resolute mind, wishing to do is the first step toward doing. But if we do not wish to do a thing it becomes impossible.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: I don't believe that wishing works. I think we get the things we work for.
quotes.author: Brendan Fraser

quotes.quote: Wishing of all employments is the worst.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Wishing of all strategies, is the worst.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: A man, when he wishes, is the master of his fate.
quotes.author: Jose Ferrer

quotes.quote: My only wish is that my wishes be at rest.
quotes.author: Ruckett

quotes.quote: Some people develop a wishbone where their backbone should be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We are never further from what we wish than when we believe that we have what we wished for.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: When we get to wishing a great deal for ourselves, whatever we get soon turns into mere limitation and exclusion.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: We would often be sorry if our wishes were granted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: For adults, wishing is a sign of thinking something is not possible.
quotes.author: Alan Robert Neal

quotes.quote: Don't waste too much time wishing, hoping, and being envious; it'll make you bugnutty.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: Wanting and wishing are very different.
quotes.author: Jonathan Friesen

quotes.quote: Wishing for something without tirelessly working for it, is like trying to drive a car that has no fuel in it.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: I don't have the time to wish for the things that I positively desire in life because I am always busy working to attain them.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: The habit of wishing is only for those who aren't hungry enough for success.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Wit is more necessary than beauty; and I think no young woman ugly that has it, and no handsome woman agreeable without it.
quotes.author: William Wycherley

quotes.quote: Wit ought to be a glorious treat like caviar; never spread it about like marmalade.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Wit consists in knowing the resemblance of things that differ, and the difference of things that are alike.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Wit - the salt with which the American humorist spoils his intellectual cookery by leaving it out.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Every witticism is an inexact thought; that which is perfectly true is imperfectly witty.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: The wit knows that his place is at the tail of a procession.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Wit is a dangerous weapon, even to the possessor, if he knows not how to use it discreetly.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote:
Great wits are to madness near allied
And thin partitions do their bounds divide
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Wit is the salt of conversation, not the food.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Nothing is more curious than the almost savage hostility that humor excites in those who lack it.
quotes.author: George Saintsbury

quotes.quote: Thy wit is a very bitter sweeting; it is a most sharp sauce.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: No matter how much restriction civilization imposes on the individual, he nevertheless finds some way to circumvent it. Wit is the best safety valve modern man has evolved; the more civilization, the more repression, the more need there is for wit.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Common sense and a sense of humor are the same thing, moving at different speeds. A sense of humor is just common sense, dancing.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Wit is educated insolence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Wit is a form of force that leaves the limbs at rest.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Wit has truth in it; wise-cracking is simply calisthenics with words.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: There is a wisdom of the head, andâ€¦ there is a wisdom of the heart.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Intelligence is a way of thinking, not a choice of words.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A wit in the society of stupid people is like a damp lucifer match, the brilliant properties of which are, for the time, neutralized by the unignitable qualities of the atmosphere in which it has been misplaced.
quotes.author: Charles William Day

quotes.quote: Wit is the appearance, the external flash of imagination. Thus its divinity, and the witty character of mysticism.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: Wit is something more than a gymnastic trick of the intellect; true wit implies a beam of thought into the essence of a question, a flash that lights up a situation. Wit suggests the delicate but delightful play of a rapier in the hands of a master.
quotes.author: Arthur Lynch

quotes.quote: A man with a sharp wit. Someone ought to take it away from him before he cuts himself.
quotes.author: Peter da Silva

quotes.quote: The pendulum of the mind oscillates between sense and nonsense, not between right and wrong.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: The well of true wit is truth itself.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: If a man's wit be wandering, let him study the mathematics.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Wit is a treacherous dart. It is perhaps the only weapon with which it is possible to stab oneself in one's own back.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Boca

quotes.quote: Wit is a sword; it is meant to make people feel the point as well as see it.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Anybody that fears and detests witchcraft is not happy with science and technology.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Best Witchcraft is Geometry to the magician's mind - His ordinary acts are feats to thinking of mankind.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Witchcraft involves being willing to understand and embrace your true self. It is about exploring your light and learning to celebrate your darkness.
quotes.author: Dacha Avelin

quotes.quote: There must have been good grounds for belief in witchcraft; otherwise Parliament would not have legislated against it.
quotes.author: Edward Coke

quotes.quote: In Witchcraft, each of us must reveal our own truth.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: Giving up witchcraft is, in effect, giving up the Bible.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: If we cannot shape our destiny there is no such thing as witchcraft.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.quote: Well, as everyone knows, once witchcraft gets started, there's no stopping it.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bulgakov

quotes.quote: No witchcraft, no enemy action had silenced the rebirth of new life in this stricken world. The people had done it themselves.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: Witchcraft had once been widely used before cursed by the society. I see today the society presumes technology will have a different treatment.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Witchcraft is, and was, not... for everyone. Unless you have an attraction to the occult, a sense of wonder, a feeling that you can slip for a few minutes out of the world into the world of faery, it is of no use to you.
quotes.author: Gerald Gardner

quotes.quote: Witchcraft ... is a spiritual path. You walk it for nourishment of the soul, to commune with the life force of the universe, and to thereby better know your own life.
quotes.author: Christopher Penczak

quotes.quote: Witchcraft offers the model of a religion of poetry, not theology. It presents metaphors, not doctrines, and leaves open the possibility of reconciliation of science and religion, of many ways of knowing.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: Witchcraft is all about living to the heights and depths of life as a way of worship.
quotes.author: Ly De Angeles

quotes.quote: Witchcraft is the art of the Fallen Angels, the Watchers and the Children of Cain. It is the art of encircling the shadows of darkness and light to serve your will and create through your own being.
quotes.author: Michael Ford

quotes.quote: Witchcraft is seeing a resurgence among queer-identified young people seeking a powerful identity that celebrates the freedom to choose who you are.
quotes.author: Moira Donovan

quotes.quote: Part of the process of witchcraft is finding our power, seeing where we can apply our energy and agency in order to make change.
quotes.author: Amanda Yates Garcia

quotes.quote: The biggest form of witchcraft is denying someone information.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: You ever want to see real witchcraft, you watch people protecting their comfort, their beliefs.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: People always ask me about the intent of witchcraft and what it is used for. The answer in 'white' covens is simple: it is to use the powers for good amongst the circle and its friends.
quotes.author: Vivianne Crowley

quotes.quote: Real art must always involve some witchcraft.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: Be the witness of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: No one bears witness for the witness.
quotes.author: Paul Celan

quotes.quote: To be human you must bear witness to justice.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the Gods.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: We are here to witness the creation and to abet it.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: When you listen to a witness, you become a witness.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Witness your thoughts. Your thoughts are attachments.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Every believer is a witness whether he wants to be or not.
quotes.author: Donald Barnhouse

quotes.quote: Creation lives, grows, and multiplies; man is but a witness.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Relax, let go. But remember only one thing: You are a witness.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: You are now about to witness the strength of street knowledge.
quotes.author: Schoolly D

quotes.quote: History is the witness that testifies to the passing of time; it illumines reality, vitalizes memory, provides guidance in daily life, and brings us tidings of antiquity.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Writers obviously have to bear witness to the harsh face of the age.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Who has witnessed one free and unconstrained act of yours, has witnessed all.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: You never know how much a man can't remember until he is called as a witness.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A credible witness to truth and to the values of the Gospel is urgently needed.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Remain a witness to your emotions as if from a great distance an eagles eye view .
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Whenever we witness art in a building, we are aware of an energy contained by it.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: Everyone has been a witness sometime - It doesn't change it if you don't believe.
quotes.author: Todd Rundgren

quotes.quote: Life isn't something you possess. It's something you take part in, and you witness.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.quote: Awake. Be the witness of your thoughts. You are what observes, not what you observe.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Your life is a witness to the world of a loving savior and His redemptive plan for man.
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: There is freedom when you realize that you are just a witness to all that is happening.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Photography is a witness against the mistaken opinion that art is an imitation of nature.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: The witness of solid moral character to a righteous way of life must never be underestimated.
quotes.author: Arthur F. Holmes

quotes.quote: There is no witness so terrible and no accuser so powerful as conscience which dwells within us.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Learn to become more of a witness, create more watchfulness. Let each act, each thought, be seen.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Let everyone witness how many different cards fortune has up her sleeve when she wants to ruin a man.
quotes.author: Benvenuto Cellini

quotes.quote: We need to witness our own limits transgressed, and some life pasturing freely where we never wander.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: To be a witness means to live in such a way that one's life would not make sense if God did not exist.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Many a witty inspiration is like the surprising reunion of befriended thoughts after a long separation.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: Witty inspirations are the proverbs of the educated.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: To be witty is not enough. One must possess sufficient wit to avoid having too much of it.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Generally speaking, there is more wit than talent in the world. Society swarms with witty people who lack talent.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: You can pretend to be serious; but you can't pretend to be witty.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.quote: A witty saying proves nothing.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Next to being witty, the best thing is being able to quote another's wit.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Wit is the appearance, the external flash of imagination. Thus its divinity, and the witty character of mysticism.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: People who can't be witty exert themselves to be devout and affectionate.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: One cannot be always laughing at a man without now and then stumbling on something witty.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Humor is mankind's greatest blessing.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Humor is an antidote to all ills.
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: Being funny, it turns out, is like being a bank. It's a confidence trick. As long as everyone believes in you, you are fine.
quotes.author: Evan Davis

quotes.quote: If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you really are.
quotes.author: H.N. Turteltaub

quotes.quote: Every habit makes our hand more witty, and out wit more handy.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A man might befriend a wolf, even break a wolf, but no man could truly tame a wolf.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: She slept with wolves without fear, for the wolves knew a lion was among them.
quotes.author: R.M. Drake

quotes.quote: Wolves were everywhere. In politics, on thrones, in beds. They cut their teeth on history and grew fat on war.
quotes.author: Roshani Chokshi

quotes.quote: The wolves in the woods have sharp teeth and long claws, but it's the wolf inside who will tear you apart.
quotes.author: Jennifer Donnelly

quotes.quote: Everyone knew there were wolves in the mountains, but they seldom came near the village - the modern wolves were the offspring of ancestors that had survived because they had learned that human meat had sharp edges.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Throw me to the wolves and I will return, leading the pack.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I am not a wolf in sheep’s clothing, I’m a wolf in wolf’s clothing.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: If you live among wolves you have to act like a wolf.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: Wolves and people were not natural enemies. The humans’ relationship with other animals established their rivalry with wolves.
quotes.author: Jon T. Coleman

quotes.quote: Wolves don't perform in a circus, and people with a mind of their own, don't perform in a circus either.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: To a distant goal, like the grey wolves grey.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: As the wolves ran, drawing nearer to their prey.
quotes.author: James E. Hyler II

quotes.quote: The wolves were in a tragic scene Things falling apart at the seams.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: In freedom, wolves are grown, but deal with them is short: In grass, in ice, in snow, -- A wolf is always shot.
quotes.author: Anna Akhmatova

quotes.quote: Wolves with wolves are never savage.
quotes.author: James Clerk Maxwell

quotes.quote: Fierce as the proling wolves at close of day, and swift as eagles in pursuit of prey.
quotes.author: Thomas Parnell

quotes.quote: To the wolves, you left me to the wolves. Thought it was me and you against the world but you left me to the wolves.
quotes.author: Anberlin

quotes.quote: The wolf is the arch type of ravin, the beast of waste and desolation.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The tiger and the lion may be more powerful but the wolf does not perform in the circus.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The wolves in the uniform with the license to do that.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: The wolf that one hears is worse than the orc that one fears.
quotes.author: J R R Tolkien

quotes.quote: Where there are sheep, the wolves are never very far away.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: In the calm, deep waters of the mind, the wolf waits.
quotes.author: F.T. McKinstry

quotes.quote: As wolves love lambs so lovers love their loves.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: When one runs with the wolves, one must howl with the pack.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: A wolf is no less a wolf because he's dressed in sheepskin and the devil is no less the devil because he's dressed as an angel.
quotes.author: Lecrae

quotes.quote: The wolf on the hill is not as hungry as the wolf climbing the hill.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: The wolf will never lose sleep, worrying about the feelings of sheep. But no-one ever told the sheep, that they outnumber the wolves.
quotes.author: Bray Wyatt

quotes.quote: The black wolf's curse awakes every time that a full moon points in the middle of the sky.
quotes.author: Pet Torres

quotes.quote: The wolf may fight the bear but the rabbit always looses.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Womanhood is a whole different thing from girlhood. Girlhood is a gift...Womanhood is a choice.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: A woman's rank lies in the fulness of her womanhood: Therein alone she is royal.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Do not live someone else's life and someone else's idea of what womanhood is. Womanhood is you. Womanhood is everything that's inside of you.
quotes.author: Viola Davis

quotes.quote: My ideal of womanhood has always been the pioneer woman who fought and worked at her husband's side. She bore the children, kept the home fires burning; she was the hub of the family, the planner and the dreamer.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Womanhood is a flourishing flower.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The idea of perfect womanhood is perfect independence.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Womanhood is something you don't consider until it hits you.
quotes.author: Laura Marling

quotes.quote: Anything may happen when womanhood has ceased to be a protected occupation.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The heart of true womanhood knows where its own sphere is, and never seeks to stray beyond it!
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The true worth of a race must be measured by the character of its womanhood.
quotes.author: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.quote: The true aim of female education should be, not a development of one or two, but all the faculties of the human soul, because no perfect womanhood is developed by imperfect culture.
quotes.author: Frances Watkins Harper

quotes.quote: It is against womanhood to be forward in their own wishes.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Real Womanhood isn't a function of becoming a great mother, but of being loved by your Great Father.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: Womanhood is the great fact in her life; wifehood and motherhood are but incidental relations.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: The sanctity of womanhood is incompatible with social liberty and social claims; and for a woman emancipation means corruption.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Pure womanhood plus priesthood means exaltation. But womanhood without priesthood, or priesthood without pure womanhood doesn't spell exaltation.
quotes.author: Harold B. Lee

quotes.quote: The best things about womanhood might possibly even be the conversations. The chatting. The gabbing. The whispering. The hands-on-hips eye-rolling. The yukking-it up.
quotes.author: Katherine Center

quotes.quote: The ultimate meaning of true womanhood is this: It is a distinctive calling of God to display the glory of his Son in ways that would not be displayed if there were no womanhood.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: God made man stronger but not necessarily more intelligent. He gave women intuition and femininity. And, used properly, that combination easily jumbles the brain of any man I've ever met.
quotes.author: Farrah Fawcett

quotes.quote: Men have desired, and justly, that women should learn from their confessions in regard to the conflict between man and woman. But woman, because of the conventional conception of womanly purity, has been intimidated from conceding to men a deep insight into her erotic life experiences.
quotes.author: Ellen Key

quotes.quote: Authentic femininity is a combination of class, tenderness and virtue. When a woman possesses these traits, a man will naturally want to be more of a gentleman around her.
quotes.author: Jason Evert

quotes.quote: Women are called womanly only when they regard themselves as existing solely for the use of men.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the shadow cast by every famous man is a feminine victim.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Women are never stronger than when they arm themselves with their weaknesses.
quotes.author: Madame Marie du Deffand

quotes.quote: The feminine vanity case is the grave of masculine illusions.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: No man is as anti-feminist as a really feminine woman.
quotes.author: Frank Oconnor

quotes.quote: Those of us who embrace the feminine know its strength.
quotes.author: Betsy Cornwell

quotes.quote: To be womanly always; to be discouraged never.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The true meaning of feminism is this: to use your strong womanly image to gain strong results in society.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.quote: A strong woman understands that the gifts such as logic, decisiveness, and strength are just as feminine as intuition and emotional connection. She values and uses all of her gifts.
quotes.author: Nancy Rathburn

quotes.quote: The essence of femininity is to absolutely love being a woman.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: Sexuality and femininity is an accumulation of age and wisdom and comfort in your own skin.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: We need women who are so strong they can be gentle, so educated they can be humble, so fierce they can be compassionate, so passionate they can be rational, and so disciplined they can be free.
quotes.author: Kavita Ramdas

quotes.quote: Every woman who heals herself helps heal all the women who came before her, and all those who come after her.
quotes.author: Christiane Northrup

quotes.quote: A man of fine perceptions is more truly feminine than a merely sentimental woman.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: In effective womanly beauty form is more than face, and manner more than either.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: As a result of the feminist revolution, feminine becomes an abusive epithet.
quotes.author: Wyndham Lewis

quotes.quote: A woman who walks in purpose doesn't have to chase people or opportunities. Her light causes people and opportunities to pursue her.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: You can still be strong and feminine.
quotes.author: Shannon Tweed

quotes.quote: Every phase of our life belongs to us. The moon does not, except in appearance, lose her first thin, luminous curve, nor her silvery crescent, in rounding to her full. The woman is still both child and girl, in the completeness of womanly character
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: Feminism has nothing at all to do with being feminine. Feminine means accentuating the womanly attributes that make women deliciously different from men. The feminine woman enjoys her right to be a woman. She has a positive outlook on life. She knows she is a person with her own identity and that she can seek fulfillment in the career of her choice, including that of traditional wife and mother.
quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.quote: If family and society tell you its unfeminine, not really womanly, to be aggressive, to speak up, to have strong opinions, to take up space, then women won't trust their own voice, because to be heard and to be influential, you've got to have a way to sing out with passion and love and self-trust - to sing out your song for everyone to hear.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lesser

quotes.quote: We need to understand that femininity is not weakness. And our society, for some reason, equates the two.
quotes.author: Jessca Chastain

quotes.quote: The emotional, sexual, and psychological stereotyping of females begins when the doctor says, â€œIt's a girl.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: Fearless gentleness is the most beautiful of feminine attractions born of modesty and love.
quotes.author: Clara Lucas Balfour

quotes.quote: In every form of womanly, love something motherly, love also comes to light.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A woman who is not feminine is a monster in creation.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Missing Sewell

quotes.quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: Women get the last word in every argument. Anything a man says after that is the beginning of a new argument.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: A woman has to live her life, or live to repent not having lived it.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I'd much rather be a woman than a man. Women can cry, they can wear cute clothes, and they're the first to be rescued off sinking ships.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: In our society, the women who break down barriers are those who ignore limits.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: Women want love to be a novel, men a short story.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: Women do not find it difficult nowadays to behave like men, but they often find it extremely difficult to behave like gentlemen.
quotes.author: Compton Mackenzie

quotes.quote: I am sick of women who love one. Women who hate one are much more interesting.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Women are made to be loved, not understood.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Women are never stronger than when they arm themselves with their weaknesses.
quotes.author: Madame Marie du Deffand

quotes.quote: It's simple. Women only nag when they feel unappreciated.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernieres

quotes.quote: If women were particular about men's characters, they would never get married at all.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I think today women are very scared to celebrate themselves, because then they just get labeled.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.quote: Women today have more of an overview of their lives and how marriage is or is not a part of it.
quotes.author: Helen Reddy

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Women desire six things: They want their husbands to be brave, wise, rich, generous, obedient to wife, and lively in bed.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: A woman's guess is much more accurate than a man's certainty.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Whatever women do they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Women have simple tastes. They get pleasure out of the conversation of children in arms and men in love.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Women are incredible in groups together. Terrifying. Men have nothing on them.
quotes.author: Michael Hutchence

quotes.quote: Women are naturally secretive, and they like to do their own secreting.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Women defend themselves by attacking, just as they attack by sudden and strange surrenders.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: there is no tool for development more effective than the empowerment of women.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: Woman must not accept; she must challenge. She must not be awed by that which has been built up around her; she must reverence that woman in her which struggles for expression.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.quote: Women's empowerment is intertwined with respect for human rights.
quotes.author: Mahnaz Afkhami

quotes.quote: Educate a man and you educate an individual. Educate a woman and you educate a family.
quotes.author: A. Cripps

quotes.quote: The empowered woman is powerful beyond measure and beautiful beyond description.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If women understood and exercised their power they could remake the world.
quotes.author: Emily Taft Douglas

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Men, their rights, and nothing more; women, their rights, and nothing less.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: I think women are foolish to pretend they are equal to men, they are far superior and always have been.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: Women are leaders everywhere you look -- from the CEO who runs a Fortune 500 company to the housewife who raises her children and heads her household. Our country was built by strong women, and we will continue to break down walls and defy stereotypes.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: Women have served all these centuries as looking glasses possessing the magic and delicious power of reflecting the figure of a man at twice its natural size.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Don't just stand for the success of other women - insist on it.
quotes.author: Gail Blanke

quotes.quote: When she stopped conforming to the conventional picture of femininity she finally began to enjoy being a woman.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: No country can ever truly flourish if it stifles the potential of its women and deprives itself of the contributions of half of its citizens.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Women will only have true equality when men share with them the responsibility of bringing up the next generation.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: When women participate in the economy, everyone benefits.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: We need women at all levels, including the top, to change the dynamic, reshape the conversation, to make sure women's voices are heard and heeded, not overlooked and ignored.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Women are the real architects of society.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: If women are expected to do the same work as men, we must teach them the same things.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I do not wish [women] to have power over men; but over themselves.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Women are the largest untapped reservoir of talent in the world.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Whether women are better than men I cannot say -- but I can say they are certainly no worse.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Women have always been the strong ones of the world. The men are always seeking from women a little pillow to put their heads down on. They are always longing for the mother who held them as infants.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I hope the fathers and mothers of little girls will look at them and say 'yes, women can.'
quotes.author: Dilma Roussete

quotes.quote: The education and empowerment of women throughout the world cannot fail to result in a more caring, tolerant, just and peaceful life for all.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Women are not the problem. They're the solution.
quotes.author: Sheryl Wudunn

quotes.quote: Wonder is from surprise, and surprise stops with experience.
quotes.author: Robert South

quotes.quote: Wondering is healthy. Broadens the mind. Opens you up to all sorts of stray thoughts and possibilities.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: Wonder is the desire for knowledge.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Wonder is the basis of worship
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Wonder implies the desire to learn.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Wonder is involuntary praise.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Wonder is the heaviest element on the periodic table. Even a tiny fleck of it stops time.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: Men love to wonder and that is the seed of our science.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All understading begins in wonder.
quotes.author: Johan Wolfgang Von Goethe

quotes.quote: The wonder is always new that any sane man can be a sailor
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The significance which is in unity is an eternal wonder.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: To wonder is to begin to understand.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Wonder is not a Pollyanna stance, not a denial of reality; wonder is an acknowledgment of the power of the mind to transform.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: From wonder into wonder existence opens.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you enjoy living, it is not difficult to keep the sense of wonder.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: No wonder is greater than any other wonder, and if once explained ceases to be a wonder.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Wonder is the precondition for all wisdom.
quotes.author: Christian Wiman

quotes.quote: The world will never starve for want of wonders, but for want of wonder.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Always be on the lookout for the presence of wonder.
quotes.author: E.B White

quotes.quote: Wonder is the feeling of the philosopher, and philosophy begins in wonder.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The wonder is what you can make a paradise out of.
quotes.author: Eva Hoffman

quotes.quote: The less you reveal the more people can wonder.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: The larger the island of knowledge, the longer the shoreline of wonder.
quotes.author: Ralph Washington Sockman

quotes.quote: Wonder is the first of all passion.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Wonder is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: He who wonders discovers that this in itself is wonder.
quotes.author: M. C. Escher

quotes.quote: We carry within us, the wonders we seek around us.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: All wonder is the effect of novelty on ignorance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: A wonderful thing about true laughter is that it just destroys any kind of system of dividing people.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: Some of the most wonderful people are the ones who don't fit into boxes.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The mind is a wonderful servant, but a terrible master.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Youth is such a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It is wonderful how much time good people spend fighting the devil. If they would only expend the same amount of energy loving their fellow men, the devil would die in his own tracks of ennui.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Religion is a strange, wonderful thing. More crimes have been committed in the name of righteousness than any other notion
quotes.author: Tom T. Hall

quotes.quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time, who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done, if we are always doing.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The closing of a door can bring blessed privacy and comfort - the opening, terror. Conversely, the closing of a door can be a sad and final thing - the opening a wonderfully joyous moment.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: A wonderful fact to reflect upon, that every human creature is constituted to be that profound secret and mystery to every other.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Wonder is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Keep interested in others, keep interested in the wide and wonderful world. Then in a spiritual sense you will always be young
quotes.author: Fredric March

quotes.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It was wonderful to find America, but it would have been more wonderful to miss it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is a wonderful thing to talk about, or to read about in history books - but it is terrible when one has to live it.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: Women have a wonderful instinct about things. They can discover everything except the obvious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: He who can no longer pause to wonder and stand rapt in awe, is as good as dead; his eyes are closed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: All of us have wonders hidden in our breasts, only needing circumstances to evoke them.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man’s desire to understand.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: The larger the island of knowledge, the longer the shoreline of wonder.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: There are no mistakes in life, only lessons. There is no such thing as a negative experience, only opportunities to grow, learn and advance along the road of self-mastery. From struggle comes strength. Even pain can be a wonderful teacher.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: I have great belief in the fact that whenever there is chaos, it creates wonderful thinking. I consider chaos a gift.
quotes.author: Septima Clark

quotes.quote: The more clearly we can focus our attention on the wonders and realities of the universe about us, the less taste we shall have for destruction.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: It is a curious thing. that every creed promises a paradise which will be absolutely uninhabitable for anyone of civilized taste.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: To be curious about that which is not one's concern while still in ignorance of oneself is ridiculous.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Curiosity is a kernel of the forbidden fruit, which still sticketh in the throat of a natural man, sometimes to the danger of his choking.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
quotes.author: Linus Pauling

quotes.quote: Be curious, learn and read as much as you can about food. Don't worry about making money. Focus on learning at various venues before you settle down for a steady position.
quotes.author: Rocco DiSpirito

quotes.quote: One of the greatest things about playing a villain is people wondering when hes going to make his comeback.
quotes.author: Michael Mcmillian

quotes.quote: Heredity is what sets the parents of a teenager wondering about each other
quotes.author: Laurence J Peter

quotes.quote: If you catch yourself wondering why you want more of the world and you're not satisfied with God, it's because you have a spiritual problem.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Curious people who have become accustomed to think that one cannot sustain the moral of the army without giving it the freedom to shed blood from time to time.
quotes.author: Moshe Sharett

quotes.quote: The human being is a most curious creature. He thinks he has got one soul, and he has got dozens.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: So we all embark wondering what lies over the horizon, what's around the next bend. And isn't that, in the end, what drives us?
quotes.author: Blake Crouch

quotes.quote: A sense of curiosity is nature's original school of education.
quotes.author: Smiley Blanton

quotes.quote: Inside every older person is a younger person wondering what happened
quotes.author: Jennifer Yane

quotes.quote: Curiosity is lying in wait for every secret.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It may be that we're not seeing the wonder in life because all we're doing is wondering how we're going to survive life.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the forerunner of discovery.
quotes.author: Richard Duke

quotes.quote: Looking back and wondering if it could have worked eventually hurts more than trying and failing.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: The worst thing about war was the sitting around and wondering what you were doing morally
quotes.author: Paul Fussell

quotes.quote: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Is there any stab as deep as wondering where and how much you failed those you loved.
quotes.author: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quotes.quote: The longer the waiting, the longer the wondering.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: All thinking begins with wondering
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: If the stones that we walked on could talk, they would surely tell our story.
quotes.author: Nico J. Genes

quotes.quote: For through wondering human beings now and in the beginning have been led to philosophizing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Crazy people don't sit around wondering if they're nuts
quotes.author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quotes.quote: Joy in the universe, and keen curiosity about it all - that has been my religion.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: The brain cannot learn without wondering, listening, and making connections while your myelin part of your brain develops and grows
quotes.author: Sage Canny

quotes.quote: Meditation is wondering. It is both wondering and wonder.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: If you're curious, you'll probably be a good journalist because we follow our curiosity like cats.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: The woods are never solitary--they are full of whispering, beckoning, friendly life. But the sea is a mighty soul, forever moaning of some great, unshareable sorrow, which shuts it up into itself for all eternity.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: She might have melted a heart of stone, but nothing can melt a heart of wood.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Wood feeds the fire which burns it.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Wood burns faster when you have to cut and chop it yourself.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: Wood burns because it has the proper stuff in it; and a man becomes famous because he has the proper stuff in him.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: A bad historian is even more dangerous than dead documentary wood.
quotes.author: Norman Davies

quotes.quote: Use what talent you possess: the woods would be very silent if no birds sang except those that sang best.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: A tree without roots is just a piece of wood.
quotes.author: Marco Pierre White

quotes.quote: The woods decay, the woods decay and fallâ€¦
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Nature soothes us. Nature heals us, and something more, the woods are a place of power. Any woods that are still surviving on this planet, those are powerful areas to have kept themselves free from the encroachment of the industrial societies of our earth.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: The whole wood seemed running now, running hard, hunting, chasing, closing in round something or - somebody? In panic, he began to run too, aimlessly, he knew not whither.
quotes.author: Kenneth Grahame

quotes.quote: In the woods we return to reason and faith.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When the uncarved wood is split, its parts are put to use. When the sage is put to use, he becomes the head.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Wood carving is such an amazing skill and very underrated; once you cut it, it's hard to go back.
quotes.author: Jonathan Anderson

quotes.quote: The woods always look different at night...as if the daytime trees and flowers and stones had gone to bed and sent slightly more ominous versions of themselves to take their places.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: To dwellers in a wood, almost every species of tree has its voice as well as its feature.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: The woods seemed all answer and healing and more than enough to live for.
quotes.author: Josephine Winslow Johnson

quotes.quote: As the woods are the same, the trees standing in their places, the rocks and the earth... they are always different too, as lights and shadows and seasons and moods pass through them.
quotes.author: Emily Carr

quotes.quote: Glorious are the woods in their latest gold and crimson, Yet our full-leaved willows are in the freshest green. Such a kindly autumn, so mercifully dealing With the growths of summer, I never yet have seen.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: Wood is universally beautiful to man. It is the most humanly intimate of all materials.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Crooked wood burns just as well as straight.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: That fire is best, which is made of drie and wet wood. For wet and greene wood is discommodious; and so are coales, because they make the head heavie and dry up naturall moysture.
quotes.author: William Vaughan

quotes.quote: For the mind does not require filling like a bottle, but rather, like wood, it only requires kindling to create in it an impulse to think independently and an ardent desire for the truth.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: As I go through the woods now, so many oak and other leaves have fallen the rustling noise somewhat disturbs my musing.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Ultimately, literature is nothing but carpentry. With both you are working with reality, a material just as hard as wood.
quotes.author: Garbriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Wood is one of the greatest and most necessary things in the world which people need and cannot do without,
quotes.author: Joachim Radkau

quotes.quote: Wood is a natural material that has marked human culture—not only in the 'Wood Age' of the past but right down to the present day.
quotes.author: Joachim Radkau

quotes.quote: Fallen wood... has a little organic connection with the growing tree as the cast-off skin has with the snake.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Wood finished in glistening black lacquer is the very best; but even unfinished wood, as it darkens and the grain grows more subtle with the years acquires an inexplicable power to calm and soothe.
quotes.author: Junichiro Tanizaki

quotes.quote: Over the years Woodstock got glorified and romanticised and became the event that symbolised Utopia. It's the last page of our collective memory of the age of innocence. Then things turned ugly and would never be the same again.
quotes.author: Ang Lee

quotes.quote: Describing Woodstock as the 'big bang,' I think that's a great way to describe it, because the important thing about it wasn't how many people were there or that it was a lot of truly wonderful music that got played.
quotes.author: David Crosby

quotes.quote: But when I played Woodstock, I'll never forget that moment looking out over the hundreds of thousands of people, the sea of humanity, seeing all those people united in such a unique way. It just touched me in a way that I'll never forget.
quotes.author: Edgar Winter

quotes.quote: Woodstock was not about sex, drugs, and rock and roll. It was about spirituality, about love, about sharing, about helping each other, living in peace and harmony.
quotes.author: Richie Havens

quotes.quote: We can't recreate Woodstock, nor do we want to. We want to turn its notoriety into a place where we can shape controlled, scaled-down musical events of all sorts.
quotes.author: Alan Gerry

quotes.quote: The only reason Woodstock was necessary is because they didn't have iTunes.
quotes.author: Daniel Tosh

quotes.quote: When they said "Make love, not war" at Woodstock, they never imagined that one would become as dangerous as the other.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Even Woodstock turned out to be a disaster. Everybody was stuck in the mud and people got sick.
quotes.author: Johnny Rivers

quotes.quote: This isn't the Democratic party of our fathers and grandfathers. This is the party of Woodstock hippies. I was at Woodstock--I built the stage. And when everything fell apart, and people were fighting for peanut butter sandwiches, it was the National Guard who came in and saved the same people who were protesting them. So when Hillary Clinton a few years ago wanted to build a Woodstock memorial, I said it should be a statue of a National Guardsman feeding a crying hippie.
quotes.author: John Ratzenberger

quotes.quote: The Boston Globe: The Woodstock Music and Art Festival will surely go down in history as a mass event of great and positive significance in the life of the country ... That this many young people could assemble so peaceably and with such good humor in a mile-square area ... speaks volumes about their dedication to the ideal of respect for the dignity of the individual ... In a nation beset with a crescendo of violence, this is a vibrantly hopeful sign. If violence is infectious, so, happily, is nonviolence.
quotes.author: Michael Lang

quotes.quote: He dreamed of amassing musicians from all over the world in Woodstock and they would sit in a field in a circle and play and play. It didn't matter what key or tempo or what melody, they would keep on playing through their discordance until they found a common language.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: You know that song, 'Woodstock.' It says 'We are stardust.' And we are. We come from stardust. Everything on earth is just ashes.
quotes.author: Priscille Sibley

quotes.quote: Woodstock was both a peaceful protest and a global celebration.
quotes.author: Richie Havens

quotes.quote: Woodstock happened in August 1969, long before the Internet and mobile phones made it possible to communicate instantly with anyone, anywhere. It was a time when we werent able to witness world events or the horrors of war live on 24-hour news channels.
quotes.author: Richie Havens

quotes.quote: Though it's frequently portrayed as this crazy, unbridled festival of rain-soaked, stoned hippies dancing in the mud, Woodstock was obviously much more than that - or we wouldn't still be talking about it in 2009. People of all ages and colors came together in the fields of Max Yasgur's farm.
quotes.author: Richie Havens

quotes.quote: You went to Woodstock and all that trash, your generation is fading fast.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: Woodstock was a business. A very poorly run business.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.quote: Describing something as the 'Woodstock of...' has taken to mean a one-of-a-kind historic gathering.
quotes.author: Steve Blank

quotes.quote: I should have been conceived during Woodstock; it’s in my blood: that burning desire to turn an absolute on its head and see what’s underneath. I’m as random as I can be and as responsible as I should be. Attempting to fuse the two makes for interesting days.
quotes.author: Chila Woychik

quotes.quote: I've always felt like if I was going to be born any other time that it would be during the '60s or definitely during Woodstock.
quotes.author: Dan Fogler

quotes.quote: I know about Woodstock probably as much as your average person who is over 30, where I'd know Jimi Hendrix, Janis Joplin, Grateful Dead.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: I'm higher than a hippie at Woodstock
quotes.author: Ray Hudson

quotes.quote: I was at Woodstock. In the mud.
quotes.author: Louis Gossett Jr.

quotes.quote: The right word is always a power, and communicates its definiteness to our action.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Words are soldiers of fortune, hired by different ideas.
quotes.author: Maxwell Bodenheim

quotes.quote: Words are but the signs of ideas.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Every word is like an unnecessary stain on silence and nothingness.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: It does not require many words to speak the truth.
quotes.author: Chief Joseph

quotes.quote: Words, as is well known, are the great foes of reality.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: All the great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A word is not a crystal, transparent and unchanged; it is the skin of a living thought and may vary greatly in color and content according to the circumstances and time in which it is used.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Words are the great temptation.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Words are potent weapons for all causes, good or bad.
quotes.author: Manly Hall

quotes.quote: Words once spoke can never be recall'd.
quotes.author: Wentworth Dillon

quotes.quote: It is a world of words that creates a world of things.
quotes.author: J. M. Coetzee

quotes.quote: Do not say a little in many words but a great deal in a few.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: A word to the wise ain't necessary, it's the stupid ones that need the advice.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Guard well your thoughts when alone and your words when accompanied.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Words can hurt you. In the larger world, it frames how people think about you, and it can hurt you in lots of little, subtle ways.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: Words mean things. When you put them together they speak. Yes, sometimes they flatten out and nothing they say is real, and that is one kind of magic. But sometimes a vision will rip up from them and shriek and clank wings clear as the sweat smudge on the paper under your thumb. And that is another kind.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: The written word has this advantage, that it lasts and can await the time when it is allowed to take effect.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Because even the smallest of words can be the ones to hurt you, or save you.
quotes.author: Natsuki Takaya

quotes.quote: We cannot always control our thoughts, but we can control our words, and repetition impresses the subconscious, and we are then master of the situation.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: The words of the world want to make sentences.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: Words which enlighten some darken others.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Sweet words are like honey, a little may refresh, but too much gluts the stomach.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: Sometimes words are harder than blows.
quotes.author: Zinedine Zidane

quotes.quote: No man weighs his words who has but a moment to live.
quotes.author: Philip Moeller

quotes.quote: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Words used carelessly, as if they did not matter in any serious way, often allowed otherwise well-guarded truths to seep through.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Words may show a man's wit but actions his meaning.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A word in earnest is as good as a speech.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Words are singularly the most powerful force available to humanity. We can choose to use this force constructively with words of encouragement, or destructively using words of despair. Words have energy and power with the ability to help, to heal, to hinder, to hurt, to harm, to humiliate and to humble.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: Think twice before you speak, because your words and influence will plant the seed of either success or failure in the mind of another.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Of all sad words of tongue or pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Words can be like X-rays if you use them properly -- they'll go through anything. You read and you're pierced.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: We are masters of the unsaid words, but slaves of those we let slip out.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A vocabulary of truth and simplicity will be of service throughout your life.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: But if thought corrupts language, language can also corrupt thought.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: If you wish to know the mind of a man, listen to his words.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: All our words from loose using have lost their edge.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: You have it easily in your power to increase the sum total of this world's happiness now. How? By giving a few words of sincere appreciation to someone who is lonely or discouraged. Perhaps you will forget tomorrow the kind words you say today, but the recipient may cherish them over a lifetime.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: All our words are but crumbs that fall down from the feast of the mind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: "As we must account for every idle word, so must we account for every idle silence.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Colors fade, temples crumble, empires fall, but wise words endure.
quotes.author: Edward Thorndike

quotes.quote: Oaths are but words, and words but wind.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Words are only painted fire; a look is the fire itself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Words travel as swiftly as desire, so it is possible to send a message of love without them.
quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

quotes.quote: A blow with a word strikes deeper than a blow with a sword.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: A powerful agent is the right word. Whenever we come upon one of those intensely right words... the resulting effect is physical as well as spiritual, and electrically prompt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A thousand words will not leave so deep an impression as one deed.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: One great use of words is to hide our thoughts.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Words so innocent and powerless as they are, as standing in a dictionary, how potent for good and evil they become in the hands of one who knows how to combine them.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: So difficult it is to show the various meanings and imperfections of words when we have nothing else but words to do it with.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: One of the hardest things in life is having words in your heart that you can't utter.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: The right word may be effective, but no word was ever as effective as a rightly timed pause.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Words may show a man's wit, but actions his meaning.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Words are pegs to hang ideas on.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Our words have wings, but fly not where we would.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A word is not a crystal, transparent and unchanged, it is the skin of a living thought and may vary greatly in color and content according to the circumstances and the time in which it is used.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Developing a good work ethics is key. Apply yourself at whatever you do, whether you're a janitor or taking your first summer job because that work ethics will be reflected in everything you do in life.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.quote: Do more than is required. What is the distance between someone who achieves their goals consistently and those who spend their lives and careers merely following? The extra mile.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: William Patten

quotes.quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid of hard work. Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Don’t let others discourage you or tell you that you can’t do it. In my day I was told women didn’t go into chemistry. I saw no reason why we couldn’t.
quotes.author: Gertrude B. Elion

quotes.quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment which gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase. Take the first step in faith. You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Follow effective actions with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Happiness is the real sense of fulfillment that comes from hard work.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbara

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: I would visualize things coming to me. It would just make me feel better. Visualization works if you work hard. That’s the thing. You can’t just visualize and go eat a sandwich.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: I’m a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If I had eight hours to chop down a tree, I’d spend six hours sharpening my ax.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If you don’t pay appropriate attention to what has your attention, it will take more of your attention than it deserves.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: If you think you can, or you think you can’t – you’re right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: If you want to make an easy job seem mighty hard, just keep putting off doing it.
quotes.author: Olin Miller

quotes.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing to do, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It ain’t as bad as you think. It will look better in the morning.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the inessentials.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee
