quotes.quote: It isn’t the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it’s the pebble in your shoe.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can’t live long enough to make them all yourselves.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Choices and decisions must be supported by your passion, resolve and a productive work ethic. If these meet opportunity - your success has finally come!
quotes.author: Archibald Marwizi

quotes.quote: A can-do attitude, a positive personality, and a strong work ethic are still the primary ingredients for success at Nordstrom.
quotes.author: Robert Spector

quotes.quote: Do not worry about who get the credit or praise of the work done. Continue work to give your best.Your reward may come unexpected.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty

quotes.quote: Face your problems head on. Do what you have to do to take care of it. Develop a good work ethic.
quotes.author: George Chuvalo

quotes.quote: Every beautiful mind has great dreams, but rarely is anyone ever ready to work hard for their dreams.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: You have to have a work ethic, and you have to be educated in what you're doing. You have to take it seriously. It doesn't mean that everything you do has to be serious. But you've got to have the tools.
quotes.author: Jakob Dylan

quotes.quote: All roads that lead to success have to pass through hard work boulevard at some point.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: I have a work ethic. If I say I'm going to do something, I do it.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: We didn't have a lot when I was growing up, and it's the best thing that happened to me because I appreciate everything. I developed a strong work ethic, and I don't take anything for granted.
quotes.author: Sarah-Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: I never took the work less than serious, my work ethic is ingrained in me. But I've always had a sense of humor about myself.
quotes.author: George Hamilton

quotes.quote: Developing a good work ethic is a key to success. Apply yourself at whatever you do, whether you're a janitor or taking your first summer job, because that work ethic will be reflected in everything you do in life.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: I never feared about my skills because I put in the work. Work ethic eliminates fear. So if you put forth the work, what are you fearing? You know what you're capable of doing and what you're not.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Professionalism shouldn't be defined by a persons paycheck, role or title. It should be defined by a persons work ethic.
quotes.author: Janna Cachola

quotes.quote: You can work really hard in your job and make a living. You can work really hard on yourself and make a fortune. Love your life, and leave a legacy worth remembering.
quotes.author: Dan Miller

quotes.quote: It's just the way we are, the way we were raised. Our work ethic was everything, and that never left us. We like to work hard, and we like to try to do everything 100 percent.
quotes.author: Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen

quotes.quote: There is never just one thing that leads to success for anyone. I feel it's always a combination of passion, dedication, hard work, and being in the right place at the right time.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: Some people dream of success while others wake up and work hard at it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Working hard is great, being lazy sometimes is great, but failed potential is the worst.
quotes.author: Campbell Scott

quotes.quote: Everyone talks about age, but it's not about age. It's about work ethic. Winning never gets old.
quotes.author: Lisa Leslie

quotes.quote: I believe work is good. There is dignity in work. I also believe that a hard-work ethic forges strong leaders.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Live by the creed that a strong work ethic, playing by the rules, and doing things the right way will bring about opportunities for success and, ultimately, happiness.
quotes.author: Nick Saban

quotes.quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Success is a function of persistence and doggedness and the willingness to work hard for twenty-two minutes to make sense of something that most people would give up on after thirty seconds.
quotes.author: Alan Schoenfeld

quotes.quote: I think that anything that you do, any accomplishment that you make, you have to work for. I can tell you that hard work pays off. It's not just a clichÃ©.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.quote: The first qualification for success in my view is a strong work ethic.
quotes.author: Henry Ford II

quotes.quote: I was taught a very strong work ethic that included punctuality, which I've always felt is a sign of respect for others.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: A good work ethic is not so much a concern for hard work but rather one for responsibility. There have been a great many men and women who have in fact used work or hustle or selfish ambition as an escape from real responsibility, an escape from purpose. In matters such as these, the hard worker is just as dysfunctional as the sloth.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Have a clear plan or strategy to translate your success philosophy into desired results. Adopt an effective work ethic, with a laser-focus and requisite execution strategies to produce results.
quotes.author: Archibald Marwizi

quotes.quote: I do not believe in excuses. I believe in hard work as the prime solvent of life's problems.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.quote: You work hard for your income, and that hard work is what fuels the economy.
quotes.author: Emily Oster

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: Work hard and wait for the fulfillment of future events.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but should get you pretty near.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
quotes.author: Iain Duncan Smith

quotes.quote: If you work hard enough and assert yourself, and use your mind and imagination, you can shape the world to your desires.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Work, continuous work, and hard work, is the only way to accomplish results that last.
quotes.author: Hamilton Holt

quotes.quote: For every two minutes of glamour, there are eight hours of hard work.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better.
quotes.author: Paul Coffey

quotes.quote: I think hard work is what gets most people to the top.
quotes.author: Rupert Sheldrake

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas Alwa Edison

quotes.quote: If you really believe in what you're doing, work hard, take nothing personally and if something blocks one route, find another. Never give up.
quotes.author: Laurie Notaro

quotes.quote: Hard work keeps the wrinkles out of the mind and spirit.
quotes.author: Helena Rubinstein

quotes.quote: Hard work doesn't guarantee success, but improves its chances.
quotes.author: B. J. Gupta

quotes.quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Whether you dream big or dream small, chances are your dream will come true if you believe in it and really work hard on it.
quotes.author: Nabil N. Jamal

quotes.quote: A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: Success is reserved for you if you persevere; it's not deserved by you if you are indolent!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Don't give up; try again. Be still and work it out till your good becomes the best! Dream high above the sky!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: What separates a weak dreamer and a great dreamer is who is wishing and waiting or who is willing and working.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: The person that works the hardest wins.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Hard work is painful when life is devoid of purpose. But when you live for something greater than yourself and the gratification of your own ego, then hard work becomes a labor of love.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you've come.
quotes.author: Ian Knabel

quotes.quote: Believing in progress does not mean believing that any progress has yet been made.
quotes.author: Franz Kafk

quotes.quote: Progress changes consciousness, and when people's consciousness changes, then their awareness of what is possible changes as well a virtuous circle.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Every step of progress which the world has made has been from scaffold to scaffold, and from stake to stake.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: A work in progress. And the possibilities are endless.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Eulberg

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: If you want to progress in your life and grow, act not to react.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: All progress depends on the unreasonable man.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you've come.
quotes.author: Ian Knabel

quotes.quote: The progress of the world depends almost entirely upon education.
quotes.author: George Eastman

quotes.quote: The test of our progress is not whether we add more to the abundance of those who have much; it is whether we provide enough for those who have too little.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Progress always involves risks. You can't steal second base and keep your foot on first.
quotes.author: Freddie Wilcox

quotes.quote: A work-in-progress generates its own energy field. You, the artist or entrepreneur, are pouring love into the work; you are suffusing it with passion and intention and hope.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. Let us move forward with strong and active faith.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To achieve progress nature alone counts, and the eye is trained through contact with her. It becomes concentric by looking and working.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Those who do not move, do not notice their chains.
quotes.author: Rosa Luxemburg

quotes.quote: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: All progress is based upon a universal innate desire on the part of every organism to live beyond its income.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Progress is not an illusion; it happens, but it is slow and invariably disappointing.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: All creativity is a work in progress.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: The world is moving so fast these days that the man who says it can't be done is generally interrupted by someone doing it.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Progress, however, of the best kind, is comparatively slow. Great results cannot be achieved at once; and we must be satisfied to advance in life as we walk, step by step.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Human beings are works in progress that mistakenly think they're finished.
quotes.author: Daniel Gilbert

quotes.quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: There's always a work in progress be it in the mind, the soul, the heart, or in your hands.
quotes.author: Rick Howse

quotes.quote: Do not get rid of your earliest work; do not undo and rework your first efforts. It is good to be able to see progress.
quotes.author: Mary Klotz

quotes.quote: Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Progress is not achieved by luck or accident, but by working on yourself daily.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: If progress is to be steady we must have long term guides extending far ahead.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: What I know is, is that if you do work that you love, and the work fulfills you, the rest will come.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The most important thing to remember about drunks is that drunks are far more intelligent than non-drunks- they spend a lot of time talking in pubs, unlike workaholics who concentrate on their careers and ambitions, who never develop their higher spiritual values, who never explore the insides of their head like a drunk does.
quotes.author: Shane MacGowan

quotes.quote: Work is a substitute religious experience for many workaholics.
quotes.author: Mary Daly

quotes.quote: You’re not going to go far unless you’re a workaholic.
quotes.author: Sloan Wilson

quotes.quote: Workaholics aren't heroes. They don't save the day, they just use it up. The real hero is home because she figured out a faster way.
quotes.author: Jason Fried

quotes.quote: Each person's drive to overwork is unique, and doing too much numbs every workaholic's emotions differently. Sometimes overwork numbs depression, sometimes anger, sometimes envy, sometimes sexuality. Or the overworker runs herself ragged in a race for attention.
quotes.author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quotes.quote: The workaholics have done immense harm to the world. And the greatest harm they have done is that they have deprived life of its moments of celebration and festivity. It is because of them that there is so little festivity in the world, and every day it is becoming more and more dull and dreary and miserable.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Workaholics are addicted to activity; super achievers are committed to results.
quotes.author: Charles Garfield

quotes.quote: Workaholics don't actually accomplish more than nonworkaholics. They may claim to be perfectionists, but that just mean they're wasting time fixating on inconsequential details instead of moving on to the next task.
quotes.author: David Heinemeier Hansson

quotes.quote: If you enjoy being at work more than being at home it doesn't mean you are a workaholic, it simply means you are in love with your work and you worship it.
quotes.author: honeya

quotes.quote: He was a typical workaholic, driven to succeed and willing to put in the hours to do so. It didn't leave much time for a social life.
quotes.author: Lynsay Sands

quotes.quote: Like most arts, the link between the mind and the pen can chain you like an enslaved workaholic. Even on an intended vacation you suddenly have this killer urge to record whatever the vacation may teach.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Man the life of a workaholic...You either on ya work or just workin on it.
quotes.author: Big Sean

quotes.quote: The workaholic maintains a frantic schedule. He is consistently preoccupied with performance. He finds it difficult to refuse additional responsibilities. He is unable to relax. If someone you know exhibits these characteristics, he or she is probably a workaholic.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: Working hard is a fool's anthem, getting others to work for you is the motto for every successful man.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: For workaholics, all the eggs of self-esteem are in the basket of work.
quotes.author: Judith M Bardwick

quotes.quote: The best workers, like the happiest livers, look upon their work as a kind of game: the harder they play the more enjoyable it becomes.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Every worker should know that by working, he is releasing the nature of God in him. He is becoming creative just like God is creative.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: A good worker knows how to be seen, yet remain invisible. They achieved invisibility by never showing up how good they are. But some people hate it & jealousy is evident.
quotes.author: Lea Rivera Caguingin

quotes.quote: Very few restaurant workers could even dream of eating in the restaurants they work in. Many do not make a living wage.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: The finest workers in stone are not copper or steel tools, but the gentle touches of air and water working at their leisure with a liberal allowance of time.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We farm workers are closest to food production. We were the first to recognize the serious health hazards of agriculture pesticides to both consumers and ourselves.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: Mature workers are less impulsive, less reactive, more creative and more centered.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra.

quotes.quote: Till a society remembers and starts caring for its forgotten poor workers, it will remain to be a cruel and tinpot society!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I reject the idea that any job is too hard or too dirty for American workers to do. American workers just expect and demand to be paid a decent wage.
quotes.author: Jan C. Ting

quotes.quote: Younger workers should have more freedom to build their retirement nest egg.
quotes.author: Gresham Barett

quotes.quote: By welcoming eager, talented workers, we expand America's potential for growth, and our competitive culture of invention and possibility.
quotes.author: Ron Conway

quotes.quote: Workers must participate in progress to enjoy their work and take pride in its product.
quotes.author: George W. Romney

quotes.quote: If you want creative workers, give them enough time to play.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: A worker in the rural reconstruction must have: The body of an athlete, The attitude of a teacher, The mind of a scientist, The heart of a missionary, The spirit of a crusader.
quotes.author: Jimmy Yen

quotes.quote: The vision is really about empowering workers, giving them all the information about what's going on so they can do a lot more than they've done in the past.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Smart workers leave biologically toxic jobs at the earliest opportunity.
quotes.author: Steven Maggie

quotes.quote: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Workers come to America to fill jobs unwanted by Americans, but they are staying and they are not going home.
quotes.author: Kit Bond

quotes.quote: By and large, mothers and housewives are the only workers who do not have regular time off. They are the great vacationless class.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.
quotes.author: J.G. Holland

quotes.quote: I've got a theory that if you give 100 percent all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: Nobody ever drowned in his own sweat.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on. Being successful means that you're working hard and walking your walk every day. You can only live your dream by working hard towards it. That's living your dream.
quotes.author: Marlon Wayans

quotes.quote: Working hard is very important. You're not going to get anywhere without working extremely hard.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: Keep working hard and you can get anything that you want.
quotes.author: Aaliyah

quotes.quote: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: When I was young, I observed that nine out of ten things I did were failures. So I did ten times more work.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The heights by great men reached and kept were not attained by sudden flight, but they while their companions slept, were toiling upward in the night.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: It's blood, sweat, sometimes tears.
quotes.author: Bob Hayes

quotes.quote: If you shoot for the stars and hit the moon, it's OK. But you've got to shoot for something. A lot of people don't even shoot.
quotes.author: Robert Townsend

quotes.quote: The finest workers in stone are not copper or steel tools, but the gentle touches of air and water working at their leisure with a liberal allowance of time.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I think that my biggest attribute to any success that I have had is hard work. There really is no substitute for working hard.
quotes.author: Maria Bartiromo

quotes.quote: Don't ever, ever, believe anyone who tells you that you can just get by, by doing the easiest thing possible. Because there's always somebody behind you who really wants to do what you're doing. And they're going to work harder than you if you're not working hard.
quotes.author: Maria Bartiromo

quotes.quote: Difficult things take a long time, impossible things a little longer.
quotes.author: Andre A. Jackson

quotes.quote: Retirement kills more people than hard work ever did.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: If the power to do hard work is not a skill, it's the best possible substitute for it.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Hard work brings prosperity; playing around brings poverty.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: To bring one's self to a frame of mind and to the proper energy to accomplish things that require plain hard work continuously is the one big battle that everyone has. When this battle is won for all time, then everything is easy.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Buckner

quotes.quote: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
quotes.author: Margaret M. Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: No matter how hard you work to bring yourself up, there's someone out there working just as hard, to put you down.
quotes.author: Dr. Dre

quotes.quote: You really have to work hard and apply yourself and by applying yourself and working hard and being diligent, you can achieve success.
quotes.author: Julie Benz

quotes.quote: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
quotes.author: Byron Dorgan

quotes.quote: No human being will work hard at anything unless they believe that they are working for competence.
quotes.author: William Glasser

quotes.quote: If you don't make mistakes, you're not working on hard enough problems. And that's a big mistake.
quotes.author: Frank Wilczek

quotes.quote: Any workout which does not involve a certain minimum of danger or responsibility does not improve the body - it just wears it out.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Exercise is like an addiction. Once you're in it, you feel like your body needs it.
quotes.author: Elsa Pataky

quotes.quote: I feel better in my mind when I work out. It makes everything better.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: SO WHEN I'M WORKING OUT I DO THINGS EXTREME.
quotes.author: Taylor Dayne

quotes.quote: I'm not into working out. My philosophy: No pain, no pain.
quotes.author: Carol Leifer

quotes.quote: Exercise: the more serious you are, the more fun it becomes.
quotes.author: Wong Yu Jin

quotes.quote: Your body is worth every ounce of workout you put in it.
quotes.author: Wong Yu Jin

quotes.quote: Exercise keeps me occupied, which is good for my mental health.
quotes.author: Gail Porter

quotes.quote: Any way to make a workout feel like playtime is great.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: You need to be dedicated to your workout, whatever you choose.
quotes.author: Tracy Anderson

quotes.quote: Exercise is labor without weariness.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Exercise is bunk. If you are healthy you don't need it. If you are sick you shouldn't take it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It is exercise alone that supports the spirits,and keeps the mind in vigor
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Exercise is good for your mind, body, and soul.
quotes.author: Susie Michelle Cortright

quotes.quote: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being,while movement and methodical physical exercise save it and preserve it.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: When it comes to health, diet is the Queen, but exercise is the King.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: Exercise because it's good for you even if every step weighs a thousand pounds.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We were made to exercise. We feel better.
quotes.author: Bob Greene

quotes.quote: Those who think they have not time for bodily exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
quotes.author: Edward Stanley

quotes.quote: If the body be feeble, the mind will not be strong.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Exercise is a dirty word. Everytime I say it, I wash out my mouth with chocolate.
quotes.author: Judy Davenport

quotes.quote: I consider exercise vulgar. It makes people smell.
quotes.author: Alec Thorton

quotes.quote: I have to exercise early in the morning, before my brain figures out what the hell I'm doing.
quotes.author: Marsha Doble

quotes.quote: Movement is a medicine for creatingchange in a person's physical,emotional, and mental states.
quotes.author: Carol Welch

quotes.quote: It is wonderful how the mind is stirred and quickenedinto activity by brisk bodily exercise.
quotes.author: Pliny The Younger

quotes.quote: Physical activity is an excellent stress-buster and provides otherhealth benefits as well. It also can improve your mood and self image.
quotes.author: Jon Wickham

quotes.quote: We do not stop exercising because we grow old?we grow old because we stop exercising.
quotes.author: Dr. Kenneth Cooper

quotes.quote: There are no bad exercises, only bad technique.
quotes.author: Dave Tate

quotes.quote: Five guys on the court working together can achieve more than five talented individuals who come and go as individuals.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: The combined results of several people working together is often much more effective than could be that of an individual scientist working alone.
quotes.author: John Bardeen

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Teamwork makes the dream work.
quotes.author: Bang Gae

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the secret that makes common people achieve uncommon results.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Onuoha

quotes.quote: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of others.
quotes.author: Norman Shidle

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: TEAMWORK: A few harmless flakes working together can unleash an avalanche of destruction.
quotes.author: Justin Sewell

quotes.quote: The nice thing about teamwork is that you always have others on your side.
quotes.author: Margaret Carty

quotes.quote: Teamwork divides the task and multiplies the success.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cooperation is the thorough conviction that nobody can get there unless everybody gets there.
quotes.author: Virginia Burden

quotes.quote: Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Remember, teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: I invite everyone to choose forgiveness rather than division, teamwork over personal ambition.
quotes.author: Jean-Francois Cope

quotes.quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Collaboration allows teachers to capture each other's fund of collective intelligence.
quotes.author: Mike Schmoker

quotes.quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Few things in life are less efficient than a group of people trying to write a sentence. The advantage of this method is that you end up with something for which you will not be personally blamed.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: No one can whistle a symphony. It takes a whole orchestra to play it.
quotes.author: H.E. Luccock

quotes.quote: In union there is strength.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: You can't stay in your corner of the forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: In order to have a winner, the team must have a feeling of unity;every player must put the team first-ahead of personal glory.
quotes.author: Paul William "Bear" Bryant

quotes.quote: None of us is as smart as all of us.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as "one-man show" in a winning team.
quotes.author: Jose B. Cabajar

quotes.quote: Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: If everyone helps to hold up the sky, then one person does not become tired.
quotes.author: Askhari Johnson Hodari

quotes.quote: Many hands make light work.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: My mother told me that fear is not an option. I always told that women are stronger, so I believed it.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: I always believed that one woman’s success can only help another woman’s success.
quotes.author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: A confident woman, a woman who truly knows her worth and her power is a force to be reckoned with.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Be the kind of woman that makes other woman want to be you.
quotes.author: Topaz

quotes.quote: The working lady was no longer a contradiction in terms but a new social phenomenon, emblematic of rapid developments.
quotes.author: Emma Liggins

quotes.quote: She's a small-town, hard-working woman just trying to make a living working three jobs.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: A hard working woman and a bone tired man now that old sun steals across a dusty floor.
quotes.author: Kate Wolf

quotes.quote: She was a hard working woman true as one could be.
quotes.author: Bradley Barn Sessions

quotes.quote: I need a hard working woman with respect who will this for everybody who ain't made it yet.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: If your shoes refuse to shine and your legs don't walk in line and tomorrow is just some other time That's just the woman working on you.
quotes.author: Céline Dion

quotes.quote: They oughta' run your picture in a magazine 'Cause you're the hardest working woman I've ever seen.
quotes.author: Sammy Kershaw

quotes.quote: Got a hard working woman, works hard all day long. Got a hard working woman, she works hard all the time. She's a hard working woman, I call her that gal of mine.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.quote: A dedication to the independent woman to the one working hard for hers.
quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

quotes.quote: Before feminism, work was largely defined as what men did or would do. Thus, a working woman was someone who labored outside the home for money, masculine-style.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: A successful woman is one who can build a firm foundation w bricks others have thrown at her.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The perfect woman, you see is a working-woman; not an idler; not a fine lady; but one who uses her hands and her head and her heart for the good of others.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: What's so great about working with really funny women is that vanity comes second. Whatever makes it real and funny, they're going to go for, and it's just great.
quotes.author: Paul Feig

quotes.quote: A working woman could save a few shillings a week, and then every five weeks she'd come in and we'd cut her hair. She could shampoo it under the shower, swing it and dry it off or just let it dry by itself. It changed the lives of many young girls who'd never had the opportunity to be styled like that before.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Behind every working woman is an enormous pile of unwashed laundry.
quotes.author: Barbara Dale

quotes.quote: It's hard to be a woman. You must think like a man, act like a lady, look like a young girl, and work like a horse.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's important for women to work. They need to keep their independence, to keep earning and being challenged.
quotes.author: Tamara Mellon

quotes.quote: The perfect woman, you see is a working woman; not an idler; not a fine lady; but one who uses her hands and her head and her heart for the good of others.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: There is no force more powerful than a woman determined to rise.
quotes.author: Bosa Sebele

quotes.quote: A strong woman builds her own world. She is one who is wise enough to know that it will attract the man she will gladly share it with.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: The goal is to find a gym that fits your schedule so working out is easier for you, and you'll have few excuses for skipping.
quotes.author: Angie Hicks

quotes.quote: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.Â
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You have to train your mind like you train your body.
quotes.author: Bruce Jenner

quotes.quote: The vision of a champion is someone who is bent over, drenched in sweat, at the point of exhaustion, when no one else is watching.
quotes.author: Anson Dorrance

quotes.quote: Your health account, your bank account, they're the same thing. The more you put in, the more you can take out. Exercise is king and nutrition is queen. Together you have a kingdom.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: Your mind will quit 100 times before your body ever does. Feel the pain and do it anyway.
quotes.author: Larissa Reis

quotes.quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you stay consistent with working out, you start to look good, which also leads to feeling good from the inside to the outside.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.Â
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, â€˜Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life a champion.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryin

quotes.quote: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.Â
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Don't show up late. Don't try to slide out early. Don't cheat your rep counts. And, definitely, don't hold back. Leave it all in the gym.
quotes.author: Gunnar Peterson

quotes.quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.Â
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.quote: Even if you don't have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body.Â
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.quote: Every time you work out you strengthen your body. Every time you don't you weaken it.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Exercise is life in motion. MOVE to LIVE!
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.Â
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.Â
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You're going to have to let it hurt. Let it suck. The harder you work, the better you will look. Your appearance isn't parallel to how heavy you lift, it's parallel to how hard you work.
quotes.author: Joe Manganiello

quotes.quote: You're only one workout away from a good mood.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No one ever drowned in sweat.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.author: Bill Loguidice

quotes.quote: Not only are squats not bad for the knees, every legitimate research study on this subject has shown that squats improve knee stability and therefore help reduce the risk of injuries.
quotes.author: Charles Poliquin

quotes.quote: When people tell me they can't afford to join a gym, I tell them to go outside; planet Earth is a gym and we're already members. Run, climb, sweat, and enjoy all of the natural wonder that is available to you.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: It's not what you do in the gym that makes you fit, it's what you do all day.
quotes.author: Bonnie Pfiester

quotes.quote: Just because the summer is over doesn't mean that we should stop working out to keep ourselves in shape. Staying in shape is primarily for your health, and not just to look good on the outside.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: I will sacrifice whatever is necessary to be the best.
quotes.author: J.J. Watt

quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: If you ever lack the motivation to train then think what happens to your minds and body when you don't.
quotes.author: Shifu Yan Lei

quotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Greg Plitt

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: It is a shame for a woman to grow old without ever seeing the strength and beauty of which her body is capable.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: A fit, healthy bodyâ€”that is the best fashion statement.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: You shall gain, but you shall pay with sweat, blood, and vomit.
quotes.author: Pavel Tsatsouline

quotes.quote: The reason fat men are good natured is they can neither fight nor run.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A bear, however hard he tries, grows tubby without exercise.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: There's no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Von Humboldt

quotes.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you keep on eating unhealthy food than no matter how many weight loss tips you follow, you are likely to retain weight and become obese. If only you start eating healthy food, you will be pleasantly surprised how easy it is to lose weight.
quotes.author: Subodh Gupta

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
quotes.author: Norman R. Augustine

quotes.quote: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.quote: In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.
quotes.author: Rich Froning Jr.

quotes.quote: Becoming healthy is the best decision I have ever made.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The real workout starts when you want to stop.
quotes.author: Lazar Angelov

quotes.quote: We don't stop exercising because we grow old. We grow old because we stop exercising.
quotes.author: Mike Banks

quotes.quote: Getting fit is all about mind over matter. I don't mind, so it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Adam Hargreaves

quotes.quote: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: For me, exercise is more than just physical â€“ it's therapeutic.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: I would not swap the World Cup title for any accolade. But I could imagine that quite a few would swap every accolade for a World Cup title.
quotes.author: Toni Kroos

quotes.quote: Winning an official World Cup with the South African team had become my burning ambition.
quotes.author: AB de Villiers

quotes.quote: The dream of every footballer and why we train and work is to reach the top, and a World Cup is the top.
quotes.author: Giovani Dos Santos

quotes.quote: Winning the World Cup is something that will always be inside your mind and inside your body.
quotes.author: Juan Mata

quotes.quote: The World Cup was a huge frustration because I had prepared really hard for it. But in the World Cup there is no formula, no recipe for success.
quotes.author: Kaka

quotes.quote: Argentina is my country, my family, my way of expressing myself. I would trade all of my records for the World Cup trophy.
quotes.author: Lionel Messi

quotes.quote: The World Cup is a very important way to measure the good players, and the great ones. It is a test of a great player.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: You've got to believe you're going to win, and I believe we'll win the World Cup until the final whistle blows and we're knocked out.
quotes.author: Peter Shilton

quotes.quote: I always assumed that everyone knew no country would ever be awarded a World Cup without pricey gifts exchanging hands under the tables.
quotes.author: Rabih Alameddine

quotes.quote: We have a great sense of togetherness. It is our team spirit that has taken us to this World Cup.
quotes.author: Robbie Keane

quotes.quote: Winning the World Cup is the proudest moment of my life. ... I couldn't control my tears of joy.
quotes.author: Sachin Tendulkar

quotes.quote: The main lesson I learned from 2015 is that a World Cup doesn't define a player's career.
quotes.author: AB de Villiers

quotes.quote: The first one is your first World Cup, so you go into it with a lot of pressure, trying to take it all in, but you are just so focused.
quotes.author: Alex Scott

quotes.quote: It’s not the will to win, but the will to prepare to win that makes the difference.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: Success is not winning the World Cup. It may be a goal in your mind but success is having a team that is improving all the time.
quotes.author: Berti Vogts

quotes.quote: The World Cup is as big as it gets.
quotes.author: Christian Pulisic

quotes.quote: Your love makes me strong, your hate makes me unstoppable!
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: At the World Cup, it's the very top level. It's going to be tougher.
quotes.author: Gareth Barry

quotes.quote: You have to show up in the World Cup, and in the World Cup anything can happen.
quotes.author: Lionel Messi

quotes.quote: Winning the World Cup was a dream come true.
quotes.author: Miroslav Klose

quotes.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: There's more chance of me flying Concorde to the moon blindfolded than there is of you taking Wales to the World Cup.
quotes.author: Robbie Savage

quotes.quote: God gives gifts to everyone, some can write, some can dance. He gave me the skill to play football and I am making the most of it.
quotes.author: Ronaldinho

quotes.quote: I’ve never scored a goal in my life without getting a pass from someone else.
quotes.author: Abby Wambach

quotes.quote: Maybe they hate me, because I’m too good.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: The problem with me is I always think I should've done better. I felt that after the World Cup final and through my whole career.
quotes.author: Jonny Wilkinson

quotes.quote: World peace begins with inner peace.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Individual peace is the unit of world peace.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: World peace is one project that we have to do together.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: World peace is the most essential outer realization of our time.
quotes.author: Anodea Judith

quotes.quote: If you want to have world peace, go to your house and love your family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: World peace will never come until the passion of supremacy is combated.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Before we find world peace, we gotta find peace in the war on the streets.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: World peace will never be stable until enough of us find inner peace to stabilize it.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Without changing one's self, without peace in one's self, world peace is not possible.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Once we have this inner peace, world peace can be achieved in the twinkling of an eye.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Unless souls are saved, nothing is saved; there can be no world peace without soul peace.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: If we do not work for individual transformation, talking about world peace is just entertainment.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: Peaceful coexistence cannot be limited to the powerful countries if we want to ensure world peace.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: World peace and brotherhood are based on a common understanding of the contributions and cultures of all races and creeds.
quotes.author: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.quote: If we want world peace, we must break the vicious circle of violence and reprisal, of an eye for an eye, of endless hate.
quotes.author: Alfred-Maurice de Zayas

quotes.quote: World peace is no longer some pie-in-the-sky thing, because no single person or country is going to solve it on their own.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: If man does find the solution for world peace it will be the most revolutionary reversal of his record we have ever known.
quotes.author: George C. Marshall

quotes.quote: The basis of world peace is the teaching which runs through almost all the great religions of the world. Love thy neighbor as thyself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If world peace is to be established, peace in the individual must be established first. Transcendental Meditation directly brings peace in the individual life.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: It is essential for world peace that the world religions make peace with each other. If they don't, we can hardly expect the nations of the world to lay down their arms.
quotes.author: Thomas Keating

quotes.quote: World peace, like community peace, does not require that each man love his neighbor - it requires only that they live together with mutual tolerance, submitting their disputes to a just and peaceful settlement.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Having a mind that is open to everything and attached to nothing seems to me to be one of the most basic principles that you can adopt to contribute to individual and world peace.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: There can be no peace in the world so long as a large proportion of the population lack the necessities of life and believe that a change of the political and economic system will make them available. World peace must be based on world plenty.
quotes.author: John Boyd Orr

quotes.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: To have world peace, we all have to have a healthy understanding of what is necessary to bring World Peace. It's not something that will be dropped on our laps. We have to work for it.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: If you want to have world peace - peace in your family, peace in your town and peace in your own bedroom - you simply begin with whatever creates peace within yourself. This vibration will go out from you in waves, and these waves have a very positive impact on the world.
quotes.author: Christiane Northrup

quotes.quote: World peace is not something that can be realized simply by politicians signing treaties, or by business leaders creating economic cooperation. True and lasting peace will be realized only by forging bonds of trust between people at the deepest level, in the depths of their very lives.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: World peace through nonviolent means is neither absurd nor unattainable. All other methods have failed. Thus we must begin anew. Nonviolence is a good starting point. Those of us who believe in this method can be voices of reason, sanity, and understanding amid the voices of violence, hatred, and emotion. We can very well set a mood of peace out of which a system of peace can be built.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The structure of world peace cannot be the work of one man or one party or one nation. It must be a peace which rests on the cooperative effort of the whole world.
quotes.author: Franklin Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The gap between the rich and the poor is the most dangerous threat to world peace we have.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Worry is most often a prideful way of thinking that you have more control over life and its circumstances than you actually do.
quotes.author: June Hunt

quotes.quote: Be more concerned with what you can do for others than what others can do for you. You'll be surprised at the results.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: If you worried about falling off the bike, you'd never get on.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.quote: Worrying is carrying tomorrow's load with today's strength carrying two days at once. It is moving into tomorrow ahead of time. Worrying doesn't empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Worrying about past regrets does nothing to change the past. Your future is where your focus should be.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Being worried is a sign of being afraid, so stop worrying because God is always there to protect us.
quotes.author: Mitch Alapan

quotes.quote: People are concerned, here again, about life, and haven't given a whole lot of attention to how you make fathers responsible for the lives they bring into the world.
quotes.author: Birch Bayh

quotes.quote: Opportunities present themselves and you have to enjoy the ride. All of us get so worried about the next step that we don't enjoy the moment we're in right now.
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.quote: Worry is stressing about a situation that may or may not occur and it's always in the negative sense.
quotes.author: Rob Liano

quotes.quote: Worrying does not empty tomorrow of its trials, but it often empties today of its triumphs. Worrying accomplishes nothing.
quotes.author: O.S. Hawkins

quotes.quote: If we are worried about the future, then we must look today at the upbringing of children.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: You are not worried about scoring; you are worried about winning the game.
quotes.author: Michael Redd

quotes.quote: Worrying is a waste of time. It doesn't change anything. It messes with your mind and steals your happiness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People are so worried about being accepted that it causes them to lose themselves and in turn, lose moments.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Worry is a thin stream of fear trickling through the mind. If encouraged, it cuts a channel into which all other thoughts are drained.
quotes.author: Arthur Somers Roche

quotes.quote: Worry about going out there and making your own legacy.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quotes.quote: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: There is a great difference between worry and concern. A worried person sees a problem, and a concerned person solves a problem.
quotes.author: Harold Stephens

quotes.quote: If you're not worried that you're pricing it too cheap, you're not pricing it cheap enough.
quotes.author: Roy H Williams

quotes.quote: A day of worry is more exhausting than a week of work.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Do not worry at being worried; but accept worry peacefully. Difficult but not impossible.
quotes.author: Johnny Appleseed

quotes.quote: Worry is the interest paid by those who borrow trouble.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Worried thought prevents practical thought which could prevent worried thought.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Worry is interest paid on trouble before it comes due.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: Worries come and worries go. They challenge us and make us Grow!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Worry is perhaps the most useless emotion; it is the product of guilt after the time for action has passed.
quotes.author: Charbel Tadros

quotes.quote: Worrying is like a rocking chair, it gives you something to do, but it doesn't get you anywhere
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We remain unnecessarily worried. All worries are futile because that which is going to happen is going to happen.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Concern should drive us into action and not into a depression. No man is free who cannot control himself.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: If a problem is fixable, if a situation is such that you can do something about it, then there is no need to worry. If it's not fixable, then there is no help in worrying. There is no benefit in worrying whatsoever.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: People become attached to their burdens sometimes more than the burdens are attached to them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Let our advance worrying become advance thinking and planning.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you believe that feeling bad or worrying long enough will change a past or future event, then you are residing on another planet with a different reality system.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The only thing you will ever accomplish by worrying is to elevate your stress levels.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Worry a little bit every day and in a lifetime you will lose a couple of years. If something is wrong, fix it if you can. But train yourself not to worry. Worry never fixes anything.
quotes.author: Mary Hemingway

quotes.quote: Worry is a thin stream of fear trickling through the mind. If encouraged, it cuts a channel into which all other thoughts are drained.
quotes.author: Arthur Somers Roche

quotes.quote: He is rich who owns the day, and no one owns the day who allows it to be invaded with fret and anxiety.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The more you pray, the less you'll panic. The more you worship, the less you worry. You'll feel more patient and less pressured.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Worry often gives a small thing a big shadow.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: If you can't sleep, then get up and do something instead of lying there worrying. It's the worry that gets you, not the lack of sleep.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Do not anticipate trouble, or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Happy is the man who has broken the chains which hurt the mind, and has given up worrying once and for all.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The mind that is anxious about future events is miserable.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Present fears are less than horrible imaginings.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: How much pain have cost us the evils that have never happened.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Worrying about it takes precious time and attention away from your priorities and increases your feelings of dissatisfaction about life.
quotes.author: Christina Winsey-Rudd

quotes.quote: My life has been full of terrible misfortunes most of which never happened.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There is a great difference between worry and concern. A worried person sees a problem, and a concerned person solves a problem.
quotes.author: Harold Stephens

quotes.quote: There is nothing that wastes the body like worry, and one who has any faith in God should be ashamed to worry about anything whatsoever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Therefore do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Sufficient for the day is its own trouble.
quotes.author: Matthew 6:34

quotes.quote: And which of you by being anxious can add a single hour to his span of life?
quotes.author: Luke 12:25

quotes.quote: Anxiety in a man's heart weighs him down, but a good word makes him glad.
quotes.author: Proverbs 12:25

quotes.quote: If your teeth are clenched and your fists are clenched, your lifespan is probably clenched.
quotes.author: Adabella Radici

quotes.quote: Whatever is going to happen will happen, whether we worry or not.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Worship is transcendent wonder.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Real worship is that of the heart.
quotes.author: Henry Allen Ironside

quotes.quote: Worship is love responding to love.
quotes.author: Judson Cornwall

quotes.quote: Worship comes from a thankful heart.
quotes.author: Chris Tomlin

quotes.quote: Worship is adoring contemplation of God.
quotes.author: R. A. Torrey

quotes.quote: The worship of power is an old religion.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Worship is admiration becoming adoration.
quotes.author: Matt Papa

quotes.quote: Worship is when we give God His breath back.
quotes.author: Louie Giglio

quotes.quote: The worship of safety emasculates greatness.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Worship is a way of seeing the world in the light of God.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: It is only when men begin to worship that they begin to grow.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: We need worship for our spirit, fellowship for our soul and committed subservience for our body.
quotes.author: Larry Norman

quotes.quote: To worship the product and ignore its development leads to dilettantism and reaction.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: He who desires to worship God must harbor no childish illusions about the matter but bravely renounce his liberty and humanity.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bakunin

quotes.quote: When we really worship anything, we love not only its clearness but its obscurity. We exult in its very invisibility.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The instinct to worship is hardly less strong than the instinct to eat.
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: Genius worship is the inevitable sign of an uncreative age.
quotes.author: Clive Bell

quotes.quote: We worship education but hate learning. We worship success but hate the successful. We worship fame but hate the famous.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: True worship doesn't keep looking at its watch.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: The man who worships mere wealth is a snob.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: If worship bores you, you are not ready for heaven.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Worship renews the spirit as sleep renews the body.
quotes.author: Richard Clarke Cabot

quotes.quote: Worship your heroes from afar; contact withers them.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Worship is giving God the best that He has given you.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Real worship involves waiting.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Worship is an attitude expressed.
quotes.author: Judson Cornwall

quotes.quote: Worship the Silent Space in you.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: We worship God through our questions.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Worship is the launching pad for life.
quotes.author: Rosaria Champagne Butterfield

quotes.quote: In worship, God imparts himself to us.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The worst time is always the present.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: The worst of lusts is vanity.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: The worst is feeling worthless.
quotes.author: Donald Glover

quotes.quote: Let the worst come to the worst.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: The worst decision is indecision.
quotes.author: Ryan Harwood

quotes.quote: Silence can be the worst ridicule.
quotes.author: Helen Nielsen

quotes.quote: Poverty is the worst form of death.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Gossip is the worst form of judging.
quotes.author: Nathan Eldon Tanner

quotes.quote: The worst pain in the world is shame.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: Mankind's worst enemy is fear of work.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The worst hatred is that of relatives.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: The worst deluded are the self-deluded.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Being afraid is the worst sin there is.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Belmondo

quotes.quote: The worst prison would be a closed heart.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The worst happens when you least expect it.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The worst happens, and life still goes on.
quotes.author: Alan Weisman

quotes.quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The worst thing about cynicism is its truth.
quotes.author: Ethel Mumford

quotes.quote: The worst evils are those that never arrive.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The worst thing is a rainy day with no laughs
quotes.author: Jameis Winston

quotes.quote: The worst of all deceptions is self-deception.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The worst disability in life is a bad attitude.
quotes.author: SupaNova Slom

quotes.quote: The worst guilt is to accept an unearned guilt.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The worst ruler is one who cannot rule himself.
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote: Our worst pain is confined within our own skin.
quotes.author: Charles Frazier

quotes.quote: The worst of all diseases is a nervous ability.
quotes.author: Edward Dyson

quotes.quote: Man's worst enemies are boredom and discontent.
quotes.author: George W. Buck

quotes.quote: The future is the worst thing about the present.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: The worst thing you can do with money is save it.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: Nothing in the affairs of men is worthy of great anxiety.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Anything that is worth pursuing is going to require us to suffer, just a little bit.
quotes.author: Chris Burkard

quotes.quote: O wise man! Give your wealth only to the worthy and never to others. The water of the sea received by the clouds is always sweet.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Self worth sets the standard that life meets.
quotes.author: Jewel

quotes.quote: He doesn't need to be reminded you're great.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: If a man thinks he is not conceited, he is very conceited indeed.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Not everything worth keeping has to be useful.
quotes.author: Cynthia Lord

quotes.quote: The difference between being mediocre and achieving excellence is you.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Don't let people treat you like a cigarette, they only use you when they're bored and step on you when they're done. Be like drugs, let them die for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is nothing so rewarding as to make people realize that they are worthwhile in this world.
quotes.author: Bob Anderson

quotes.quote: Deal with yourself as a individual, worthy of respect and make everyone else deal with you the same way.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Make today worth remembering.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: To be worthy does not mean to be perfect.
quotes.author: Gerrit W. Gong

quotes.quote: Start with big dreams and make life worth living.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Be a worthy worker and work will come.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: When you confer a benefit on those worthy of it, you confer a favor on all.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: He that loves to be flattered is worthy o' the flatterer.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Don't work for recognition, but do work worthy of recognition.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: It is up to us to live up to the legacy that was left for us, and to leave a legacy that is worthy of our children and of future generations.
quotes.author: Christine Gregoire

quotes.quote: Sometimes the hardest part of the journey is believing you're worthy of the trip.
quotes.author: Glenn Beck

quotes.quote: Self-worth comes from one thing - thinking that you are worthy.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: We cannot think of being acceptable to others until we have first proven acceptable to ourselves.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: No temporary chaos is worth your sanity. Just knowing that whatever happens, it happens to the best of them too
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: It is a worthy reward for his efforts over many years. He is a man who does his job solidly and responsibly.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don't need the approval of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: God's wrath is his righteousness reacting against unrighteousness.
quotes.author: J.I. Packer

quotes.quote: The break would never come as long as fear could turn to wrath.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Take heed of the wrath of a mighty man, and the tumult of the people.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Dangerous is wrath concealed. Hatred proclaimed doth lose its chance of wreaking vengeance.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Men often make up in wrath what they want in reason.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: The wrath of God is a way of saying that I have been living in a way that is contrary to the love that is God. Anyone who begins to live and grow away from God, who lives away from what is good, is turning his life toward wrath.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: To seek to extinguish anger utterly is but a bravery of the Stoics. We have better oracles: 'Be angry, but sin not.' 'Let not the sun go down upon your wrath.'
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Wrath brings mortal men their gravest hurt.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Hastiness is the beginning of wrath, and its end repentance.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: I may never let go of my wrath, my anger, but I will always have the last laugh.
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.quote: The wrath of God pales beside that of man.
quotes.author: Félix José Palma

quotes.quote: Hate is the wrath of the weak.
quotes.author: Alphonse Daudet

quotes.quote: Beware the wrath of a patient adversary.
quotes.author: John C. Calhoun

quotes.quote: The wrath that on conviction subsides into mildness, is the wrath of a generous mind.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: We must use the wrath of nature as our teacher.
quotes.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quotes.quote: Tis said that wrath is the last thing in a man to grow old.
quotes.author: Alcaeus

quotes.quote: The wrath of God lies sleeping. It was hid a million years before men were and only men have the power to wake it.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: You must have anger, as rightful wrath is what makes you create your own ethical standards.
quotes.author: Kamal Haasan

quotes.quote: A background of wrath, which can be stirred up to the murderous infernal pitch, does lie in every man.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
quotes.author: Proverbs 15:1

quotes.quote: Hasty wrath and heedless hazardy do breed repentance late and lasting infamy.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: was angry with my friend: I told my wrath, my wrath did end. I was angry with my foe: I told it not, my wrath did grow.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The wrath of the lion is the wisdom of God.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Beyond this place of wrath and tears looms but the horror of the shade.
quotes.author: William Ernest Henley

quotes.quote: He who conquers his wrath overcomes his greatest enemy.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: We deserve punishment and get forgiveness; we deserve God's wrath and get God's love.
quotes.author: Phillip Yancey

quotes.quote: That day of wrath, that dreadful day. When heaven and earth shall pass away.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: A people's wrath voiced abroad bringeth grave Danger, no less than public curse pronounced.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Never on me let such wrath lay hold, as the wrath you cherish, you whose valor causes harm!
quotes.author: A.T. Murray

quotes.quote: A God without wrath brought human beings without sin into a kingdom without judgment through ministrations of a Christ without a cross.
quotes.author: H. Richard Niebuhr

quotes.quote: There's no drama like wrestling.
quotes.author: Andy Kaufman

quotes.quote: Being a wrestler is like walking on the treadmill of life. You get off it and it just keeps going.
quotes.author: Randy Savage

quotes.quote: Wrestling is ballet with violence.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: As we advance in life it becomes more and more difficult, but in fighting the difficulties the inmost strength of the heart is developed.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: There are no pleasures in a fight but some of my fights have been a pleasure to win.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: It's a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired - you quit when the gorilla is tired.
quotes.author: Robert Strauss

quotes.quote: We shall heal our wounds, collect our dead and continue fighting.
quotes.author: Mao Tse-Tung

quotes.quote: You will never be entirely comfortable. This is the truth behind the champion â€“ he is always fighting something. To do otherwise is to settle.
quotes.author: Julien Smith

quotes.quote: When you become a professional wrestler, your name becomes company property.
quotes.author: Bill Goldberg

quotes.quote: Wrestling teaches you nothing comes easy. Nothing in life comes easy, so you have to work at it.
quotes.author: Mike Sullivan

quotes.quote: The only thing that matters in wrestling are your teeth and your testicles. Anything else, keep wrestling, stop whining.
quotes.author: Gary Dierks

quotes.quote: Every fighter has one fight that makes or breaks him.
quotes.author: Elia Kazan

quotes.quote: There's a moment in fighting when strength of muscle ain't everything because enemy has already given you enough energy to gain the victory.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: t's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Win if you can, lose if you must, but always cheat.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Wrestling is a team sport, and an individual sport all rolled into one.
quotes.author: William Baldwin

quotes.quote: Wrestlers compete as individuals, Yet the Sport Builds comradery like no other.
quotes.author: Cael Sanderson

quotes.quote: A defeated wrestler never tires of wrestling again.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Take a strong wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as strong. Take a quick wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as quick. Take a technical wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as technical. No matter what kind of wrestler, everyone is afraid of getting tired. It's those who learn to perform when they're tired that find success.
quotes.author: Jay Robinson

quotes.quote: Wrestlers are a bunch of wanna-be football players.
quotes.author: Brian Bosworth

quotes.quote: Wrestlers are all pretty busted-up by the ends of their careers.
quotes.author: Mickey Rourke

quotes.quote: Take a quick wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as quick. Take a technical wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as technical. No matter what kind of wrestler, everyone is afraid of getting tired. It's those who learn to perform when they're tired that find success.
quotes.author: J. Robinson

quotes.quote: You know a lot of times wrestlers get too full of themselves. They can't separate themselves from the characters. They get used to the excitement, the energy, the lifestyle and the money and with a lot of these guys, when it stops, they self-destruct.
quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

quotes.quote: Being challenged in life is inevitable, being defeated is optional.
