quotes.author: Roger Crawford

quotes.quote: A fighter can always recover, and you never know what they're going to come back with.
quotes.author: Holly Holm

quotes.quote: Once you've wrestled, everything in life is easy.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: The mind is the most important thing of the big picture and no one has a stronger mindset than amateur wrestlers.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: Never wrestle with a strong man nor bring a rich man to court.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: No activity I know is more of a confidence builder and the same at time more humility training than wrestling.
quotes.author: James Leach

quotes.quote: Wrestling is ballet with violence.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Wrestling teaches you nothing comes easy. Nothing in life comes easy, so you have to work at it.
quotes.author: Mike Sullivan

quotes.quote: Wrestling needs to be about the art form again. It needs to be about painting a picture and having a really good match.
quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

quotes.quote: No matter what kind of wrestler, everyone is afraid of getting tired.
quotes.author: J. Robinson

quotes.quote: Everything I do is to become better, the best ever and I'm not going to stop.
quotes.author: Dolph Ziggler

quotes.quote: Wrestling is a team sport, and an individual sport all rolled into one.
quotes.author: William Baldwin

quotes.quote: When the day comes when you don't believe in yourself, there's the door. Get the hell out.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: Pain is nothing compared to what it feels like to quit. Give everything you got today for tomorrow may never come.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: If your goal isn't to be on top, then you don't deserve to be here.
quotes.author: Big E Langston

quotes.quote: Once you've wrestled, everything else in life is easy.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: Whether fighting or spitting, my discipline is unforgiving!
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: It's a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired - you quit when the gorilla is tired.
quotes.author: Robert Strauss

quotes.quote: Blood, sweat and respect. The first two you give. The last you earn. Give it. Earn it.
quotes.author: The Rock

quotes.quote: Always remember the pain of defeat, and never let it happen again.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: You can run I will chase you. You can hide I will find you. We're gonna fight and I'm gonna hurt you.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: It makes you remember every time that even the best can lose. One mistake can change everything.
quotes.author: Georges St. Pierre

quotes.quote: Win if you can, lose is you must, but ALWAYS cheat!.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: The pain of preparation is nothing like the pain of losing.
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.quote: Never Back Down and Never Quit.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: There's no drama like wrestling.
quotes.author: Kane

quotes.quote: Never wrestle with a strong man nor bring a rich man to court.
quotes.author: Latvian Proverb

quotes.quote: You've got to get obsessed and stay obsessed.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: Success isn't always about greatness, it's about consistency.
quotes.author: The Rock

quotes.quote: Determination is the strength needed to succeed.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: If you are afraid to fail, you will never succeed.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: The most important thing about being in wrestling is that you have to connect with the crowd, connect with the fans, and you either want them to love you, or to hate you. Either way, so long as they're reacting to what you're doing.
quotes.author: Chris Jericho

quotes.quote: The years wrinkle our skin, but lack of enthusiasm wrinkles our soul.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Don't think of it as wrinkles. Think of ot as relaxed-fit skin.
quotes.author: Cathy Crimmins

quotes.quote: Wrinkles are engraved smiles.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable. There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: If you don't have wrinkles, you haven't laughed enough.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The only things that old age comes standard with: grey hair and wrinkles. Wisdom and intellect are earned.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: With time we will all stop fighting pimples and start fighting wrinkles.
quotes.author: Moffat Machingura

quotes.quote: Injuries heal, but wrinkles are the scars of time.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: The best people are the good old wrinkled people with a sparkle in their eye, a wink when you walk by or a toothless smile saying you are doing just fine.
quotes.author: Robert Wesley Miller

quotes.quote: If God had to give a woman wrinkles, He might at least have put them on the soles of her feet.
quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quotes.quote: Wrinkles are hereditary. Parents get them from their children.
quotes.author: Doris Day

quotes.quote: Age imprints more wrinkles in the mind than it does on the face.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Take care that old age does not wrinkle your spirit even more than your face.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Wrinkles are ditches that the gods have dug for our tears.
quotes.author: Emile Augier

quotes.quote: Wrinkles on the brow are the imprints of exploits.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: Years wrinkle the skin. Giving up wrinkles the soul.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Wrinkles ought to be worn as a badge of honour, as a mark of survival if not wisdom.
quotes.author: Mal Fletcher

quotes.quote: That fair face will as years roll on lose its beauty, and old age will bring its wrinkles to the brow.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The latest wrinkle is on wrinkles. There is a widespread belief that women can't grow old in television news.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: Wrinkles happen to human beings.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Hard work keeps the wrinkles out of the mind and spirit.
quotes.author: Helena Rubinstein

quotes.quote: Your wrinkles either show that you're nasty, cranky, and senile, or that you're always smiling.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: There is no wrinkle-free life.
quotes.author: Paul Henderson

quotes.quote: Politeness smooths wrinkles.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Age does not bring you wisdom, age brings you wrinkles.
quotes.author: Estelle Getty

quotes.quote: The heart has no wrinkles.
quotes.author: Marie de Rabutin-Chantal, marquise de Sevigne

quotes.quote: There's always the new wrinkle. One must keep one's eyes always open.
quotes.author: George Peppard

quotes.quote: Beauty breeds beauty, truth triggers truth. The cure for writer's block is therefore to read.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: For a creative writer possession of the truth is less important than emotional sincerity.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The role of a writer is not to say what we all can say, but what we are unable to say.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: A writer is someone who can make a riddle out of an answer
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: No tears in the writer, no tears in the reader. No surprise in the writer, no surprise in the reader
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The main engagement of the writer is towards truthfulness; therefore he must keep his mind and his judgement free
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roy

quotes.quote: To gain your own voice, you have to forget about having it heard.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: The writer is the engineer of the human soul.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: The good writers touch life often. The mediocre ones run a quick hand over her. The bad ones rape her and leave her for the flies.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: My idea of a writer: someone interested in everything
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The great liberty of the fictional writer is to let the imagination out of the traces and see it gallop off over the horizon.
quotes.author: Will Self

quotes.quote: Write. Rewrite. When not writing or rewriting, read. I know of no shortcuts.
quotes.author: Larry L. King

quotes.quote: If I'd learned nothing else, it was this: If you want to be a great writer, be a man. If you can't be a man, write like one
quotes.author: Julianna Baggott

quotes.quote: The purpose of a writer is to keep civilization from destroying itself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The writer operates at a peculiar crossroads where time and place and eternity somehow meet. His problem is to find that location
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: A word is not the same with one writer as with another. One tears it from his guts. The other pulls it out of his overcoat pocket.
quotes.author: Charles Peguy

quotes.quote: You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: As a writer, the best mindset is to be unafraid
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: The universe is made of stories, not of atoms.
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: The writer must earn money in order to be able to live and to write, but he must by no means live and write for the purpose of making money.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: In utter loneliness a writer tries to explain the inexplicable.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: When a writer becomes a reader of his or her own work, a lot can go wrong. It's like do-it-yourself dentistry
quotes.author: William Collins

quotes.quote: A good writer possesses not only his own spirit but also the spirit of his friends.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I don't care if a reader hates one of my stories, just as long as he finishes the book.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: One of my rules is never explain. A writer is a lot like a magician, if you explain how the trick works then a lot of the magic turns mundane
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: As a writer, you should not judge, you should understand.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The writing career is not a romantic one. The writer's life may be colorful, but his work itself is rather drab.
quotes.author: Mary Roberts Rinehart

quotes.quote: Style is that which indicates how the writer takes himself and what he is saying. It is the mind skating circles around itself as it moves forward
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Read a thousand books, and your words will flow like a river.
quotes.author: Lisa See

quotes.quote: A non-writing writer is a monster courting insanity.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The secret of good writing is to say an old thing in a new way or to say a new thing in an old way.
quotes.author: Richard Harding Davis

quotes.quote: Writing is like driving at night in the fog. You can only see as far as your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E.L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: Writing is always a process of discovery. I never know the end, or even the events on the next page, until they happen. There's a constant interplay between the imagining and shaping of the story.
quotes.author: Kim Edwards

quotes.quote: The Six Golden Rules of Writing: Read, read, read, and write, write, write.
quotes.author: Ernest Gaines

quotes.quote: The desire to write grows with writing.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Writing the art of communicating thoughts to the mind, through the eye is the great invention of the world.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Writing is easy. All you have to do is cross out the wrong words.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Writing is a struggle against silence.
quotes.author: Carlos Fuentes

quotes.quote: Writing is a way of talking without being interrupted.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Writing is an exploration. You start from nothing and learn as you go.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: Writing is like breathing, it's possible to learn to do it well, but the point is to do it no matter what.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Write. Rewrite. When not writing or rewriting, read. I know of no shortcuts.
quotes.author: Larry L. King

quotes.quote: Writing is a process, a journey into memory and the soul.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Writing is really a way of thinking not just feeling but thinking about things that are disparate, unresolved, mysterious, problematic or just sweet.
quotes.author: Toni Morisson

quotes.quote: Write the kind of story you would like to read. People will give you all sorts of advice about writing, but if you are not writing something you like, no one else will like it either.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.quote: If the writing is honest it cannot be separated from the man who wrote it.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: All writing comes by the grace of God.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Almost all good writing begins with terrible first efforts. You need to start somewhere.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Planning to write is not writing. Outlining, researching, talking to people about what you're doing, none of that is writing. Writing is writing.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: You fail only if you stop writing.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: An essential element for good writing is a good ear: One must listen to the sound of one's own prose.
quotes.author: Barbara Tuchman

quotes.quote: Exercise the writing muscle every day, even if it is only a letter, notes, a title list, a character sketch, a journal entry. Writers are like dancers, like athletes. Without that exercise, the muscles seize up.
quotes.author: Jane Yolen

quotes.quote: By writing much, one learns to write well.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Writing is 1 percent inspiration, and 99 percent elimination.
quotes.author: Louise Brooks

quotes.quote: Good writing is a kind of skating which carries off the performer where he would not go.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of bad writing to get to a little good writing.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Best advice on writing I've ever received. Finish.
quotes.author: Peter Mayle

quotes.quote: For me, writing is exploration; and most of the time, I'm surprised where the journey takes me.
quotes.author: Jack Dann

quotes.quote: Writing is communication, not self-expression. Nobody in this world wants to read your diary except your mother.
quotes.author: Richard Peck

quotes.quote: There is no great writing, only great rewriting.
quotes.author: Justice Brandeis

quotes.quote: Writing is a way of talking without being interrupted.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: The picture alone, without the written word, leaves half the story untold.
quotes.author: James Lafferty

quotes.quote: The very ink with which history is written is merely fluid prejudice.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Writing is a delicious agony.
quotes.author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quotes.quote: Writing, the art of communicating thoughts to the mind through the eye, is the great invention of the world enabling us to converse with the dead, the absent, and the unborn, at all distances of time and space.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There are two good rules which ought to be written on every heart never to believe anything bad about anybody unless you positively know it to be true; never to tell even that unless you feel that it is absolutely necessary and that God is listening while you tell it.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Writing is a mysterious activity.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: If there's a book you really want to read, but it hasn't been written yet, then you must write it.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Writing is like breathing, it's possible to learn to do it well, but the point is to do it no matter what.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Writing a story or a novel is one way of discovering sequence in experience, of stumbling upon cause and effect in the happenings of a writer's own life.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: Writing means sharing. It's part of the human condition to want to share things thoughts, ideas, opinions.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Great poetry is always written by somebody straining to go beyond what he can do.
quotes.author: Stephen Spender

quotes.quote: Every secret of a writer's soul, every experience of his life, every quality of his mind is written large in his works.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The reason why so few good books are written is that so few people who can write know anything.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Somewhere it is written that parents who are critical of other people's children and publicly admit they can do better are asking for it.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Poetry remembers that it was an oral art before it was a written art.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: A well written life is almost as rare as a well spent one.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become a goal until it is written.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: A composer knows that music is written by human beings for human beings and that music is a continuation of life, not something separated from it.
quotes.author: Hanns Eisler

quotes.quote: It is only what is written upon the soul of man that will survive the wreck of time.
quotes.author: Francis J. Grimke

quotes.quote: The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: People with clear, written goals, accomplish far more in a shorter period of time than people without them could ever imagine.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Writing is a very focused form of meditation. Just as good as sitting in a lotus position.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: Poetry can be written only because it has been written.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The secret of good writing is to say an old thing in a new way or a new thing in an old way.
quotes.author: Richard Harding Davis

quotes.quote: It must essentially remain a novel of adolescence written by a retarded adolescent.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Everything written is as good as it is dramatic. It need not declare itself in form, but it is drama or nothing.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A perfect poem is impossible. Once it had been written, the world would end.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: It is better to suffer wrong than to do it, and happier to be sometimes cheated than not to trust.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing. The worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A man in the wrong may more easily be convinced than one half right.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Nothing is right or wrong. It's all an interpretation of which lens we are looking through.
quotes.author: Tarun Sharma

quotes.quote: There are some ideas so wrong that only a very intelligent person could believe in them.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: To persist in doing wrong extenuates not the wrong, but makes it much more heavy.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Standing up for whats wrong, is like intentional standing in line to be executed.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: The wrong idea has taken root in the world. And the idea is this: there just might be lives out there that matter less than other lives.
quotes.author: Greg Boyle

quotes.quote: The eternal difference between right and wrong does not fluctuate, it is immutable.
quotes.author: Patrick Henry

quotes.quote: Right and wrong has never been obscure. It is as clear as the future.
quotes.author: Andreas Laurencius

quotes.quote: When you see something that is wrong, there is something that has to be right.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with things taking time.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: Never do a wrong thing to make a friend or to keep one.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Making a wrong decision is understandable. Refusing to search continually for learning is not.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is better to be irresponsible and right, than to be responsible and wrong.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The wrong step becomes the right step once you take it.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: If you are going to do something wrong at least enjoy it.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: You are not just for the right or left, but for what is right over the wrong.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: When you have the right, doesn't mean that you are right.
quotes.author: Farah Ezzatie

quotes.quote: He who commits a wrong will himself inevitably see the writing on the wall, though the world may not count him guilty.
quotes.author: Martin Tupper

quotes.quote: You can't do wrong right, but you can do right wrong.
quotes.author: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.quote: To go beyond is as wrong as to fall short.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: To do a great right do a little wrong.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is better to do the wrong thing that to do nothing.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: One day he'll realize he is and was wrong. But that's for him to figure out. You can't change people or make them realize things they don't want to see.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: It is wrong to assume that men of immense wealth are always happy.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: A wrong-doer is often a man that has left something undone, not always he that has done something.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

quotes.quote: You got to go down a lot of wrong roads to find the right one.
quotes.author: Bob Parsons

quotes.quote: Nation will rise against nation and kingdom against kingdom. These are the beginnings of sorrows.
quotes.author: Cynthia Harrod-Eagles

quotes.quote: Wars of pen and ink often lead to wars of cannon and bayonets.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: The old men were still running the country. The politicians who had caused millions of deaths were now celebrating, as if they had done something wonderful.
quotes.author: Ken Follett

quotes.quote: The belief in the possibility of a short decisive war appears to be one of the most ancient and dangerous of human illusions.
quotes.author: Robert Wilson Lynd

quotes.quote: War will exist until that distant day when the conscientious objector enjoys the same reputation and prestige that the warrior does today.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: War is a brutal and fierce means of pacification; it means the suppression of resistance by the destruction or enslavement of the conquered.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: History teaches that wars begin when governments believe the price of aggression is cheap.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Casualties many; Percentage of dead not known; Combat efficiency; we are winning.
quotes.author: David M. Shoup

quotes.quote: Never think that war, no matter how necessary, nor how justified, is not a crime.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: War is mainly a catalogue of blunders.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: War is an ugly thing, but not the ugliest of things. The decayed and degraded state of moral and patriotic feeling which thinks that nothing is worth war is much worse.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: War demands sacrifice of the people. It gives only suffering in return.
quotes.author: Frederic Clemson Howe

quotes.quote: Those who ignore history's lessons in the ultimate folly of war are forced to do more than relive them, they may be forced to die by them.
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.quote: War is an admission of failure.
quotes.author: K. J. Parker

quotes.quote: There is nothing that war has ever achieved that we could not better achieve without it.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: Weakness and ambivalence lead to war.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.quote: Force and fraud are in war the two cardinal virtues.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: This is a war universe. War all the time. That is its nature. There may be other universes based on all sorts of other principles, but ours seems to be based on war and games.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: All wars are follies, very expensive and very mischievous ones.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: All war is a symptom of man's failure as a thinking animal.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: There has been no war without atrocity. War is atrocity, pure and simple: only greed, nationalism and faith help us pretend otherwise.
quotes.author: Michael Marshall

quotes.quote: Wars do not end wars any more than an extraordinarily large conflagration does away with the fire hazard.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: There never was a good war, or a bad peace.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The tragedy of war is that it uses man's best to do man's worst.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The act of war is the last option of a democracy.
quotes.author: Joseph C. Wilson

quotes.quote: War is behavior with roots in the single cell of the primeval seas. Eat whatever you touch or it will eat you.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: War is what happens when language fails.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: We have war when at least one of the parties to a conflict wants something more than it wants peace.
quotes.author: Jeane Kirkpatrick

quotes.quote: The great rich nation had made triumphant war, suffered enough for poignancy but not enough for bitterness - hence the carnival, the feasting, the triumph.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
